summary: Imagine Castlevania meets The Bachelor in this hilarious and enthralling genre mashup that will satisfy your (blood)lust. Will Drac find “Love at First Bite,” or will he discover “Love Sucks”? Tune in to find out!

name: Royale Archer VR
summary: Use your bow to defeat the enemy and challenge the harder stage with summoning allies, setting traps, and using magic!

name: Rococo
summary:
"A world of forbidden sweets beckons beyond the wall of sleep..."

Rococo is a tiny spook-em-up from the Haunted-PS1 community.

name: Robot Wants Kitty
summary: The first game in the "Robot Wants" series.

name: Robot Wants Kitty
summary: A remake of the classic mini-metroidvania for iOS and Android.

name: Robot Wants Puppy
summary: The second game in the "Robot Wants" series.

name: Robot Wants Fishy
summary: The third game in the "Robot Wants" series.

name: Robot Wants Ice Cream
summary: The fourth and final game in the "Robot Wants" series.

name: Rocketing
summary: Rocketing is a 1vs1 Arcade Battle Game. You and your Friends Job is to get the other one Down by throwing Stones at them and their Platform. It can either be played offline Splitscreen or Online

name: Robsu e o Caminho da Água
summary: My "first game", made entirely in the RPG MAKER VX ACE, with some puzzles and children's level puzzles because I don't want to waste my figures with such a simple game

name: Rockman 8 Metal Heroes Famicom
summary: Rockman 8 FC for short, is a fanmade 8-bit version of Mega Man 8 for PC. Like Rockman 7 Famicom before, it is a recreation of the normal game, except sprites and backgrounds are converted to the normal 8-bit format, so it is like the past Mega Man games. Due to this, there are no FMVs.

name: Royal Tower Defense
summary:
Lands of orcs have expanded in the last few decades and defined new borders. New borders which are dangerously close to us...

They depleted resources on theirs lands and it's only a matter of time before they try to put their hands on our Kingdom. Diplomats were already send to peacefully ask orcs to back off, but they’ve never returned. The sign was clear - there is no place for negotiations…

name: Root of Evil: Origins
summary: Horror Survival, You're trapped in your uncles house and you must escape!

name: Rolling Gunner Over Power
summary:
Navigate across 6 stages blanketed in a hail of bullets from an unceasing onslaught of enemies and screen-filling bosses
Choose from 3 different STORK ships to pilot, each with unique attributes and firing patterns
Multiple difficulty settings allow players of all skill levels to jump in and enjoy a true bullet hell experience
Save Replays and use Training mode to master the Rolling Gun and learn the intricacies of each stage
A pulse-pounding, high-energy original soundtrack composed by COSIO (Space Invaders Extreme, Groove Coaster) perfectly complements the gameplay
Beautifully animated cutscenes marry gameplay and story
A challenging risk v reward point system will have seasoned players shooting for the top of the in-game leaderboard

name: Robotfindskitten
summary: Robotfindskitten is a "Zen simulation", originally written by Leonard Richardson for MS-DOS. It is a free video game with an ASCII interface in which the user must find kitten on a field of other random characters.

name: Rogue Sentry
summary: A difficult twin-stick adventure shoot-em-up about a sentry droid who turns rogue to save humanity.

name: Rollie
summary: Rollie is a side-scrolling, action platformer for the Nintendo Entertainment System.

name: Rose of Starcross
summary: Rose of Starcross is a turn-based, story-driven RPG created by a solo developer inspired by Zelda, the Mario RPG series, the MOTHER series, modern indies, and even games like Punch-Out!

name: RocketStarz
summary: Blast of into space and defend the earth from an alien invasion in RocketStarz, a game created by high school students! RocketStarz is a challenging game where you maneuver your way out of tight obstacles and fight your way across the oceans of purple alien animatronics with the help of your trusty shockwave cannon - all while listening to a banging original soundtrack! Be careful cadet, as this mission is not for the faint of heart...

name: Robokill 2: Leviathan Five
summary: Robokill 2 blends classic arcade action with RPG elements. Battle your enemies in this adrenaline packed dual stick shooter, with over 600 rooms spread over 12 different missions and 3 different chapters. More than 25 new enemies, tons of new pickups and powerups and a gripping storyline.

name: Rogueria: Roguelikes X Tactics
summary: Rogueria is a turn-based strategic combat game that focuses on the choice of various combinations and moments. You must collect and grow unfinished heroes, make the right choices from various monsters and various events that block your front, and lead the heroes to their destinations.

name: Road to Adventure!
summary: Help Tommy destroy The Evil Corporation, save the enviroment, the forest and his friends. A beautiful, funny and challenging game awaits!

name: Roller Drama
summary: Play this story-driven adventure game where you live with five Roller Derby athletes as their coach and hopefully friend... yes it’s a sitcom :-) Also manage real-time full-contact matches on skates: team results and life debacles are all part of the story. Performance is a mindset!?!

name: Room to Grow
summary: Tackle thorny problems in this plant pushing puzzle game. Learn to maneuver like a cactus as you grow your way back to the desert!

name: Roark Games: Congressman
summary: Play as an elected congressman. Vote and propose laws, trade favors, build your popularity and prestige. You will have to make tough decisions with unpredictable results. If you play your cards right you will surely climb to power

name: Romeo Must Live
summary: “Romeo Must Live” is a renaissance-period comedy heist Visual Novel and Dating sim. Play as the luckless lothario Romeo Montague as he formulates a mad plan to marry his sweet Juliet without shedding a drop of blood.

name: Rocket Arena: Season 2
summary: Blast your way to victory! Rocket Arena: Season 2 will see the introduction of a new hero (Leef), new maps, events, and exciting outfits to collect, plus tons of incredible unlockables waiting in the Blast Pass!

name: Rocket Arena: Season 3
summary: New Hero, Emotes, Totem Companions, New Blast Pass, and More!

name: RoboCop 2
summary: RoboCop 2 is a platform shooter video game based on the 1990 film of the same name.

name: Rotor
summary: Rotor is a physics-based drone racing arcade providing competitive and fast-paced races through dynamic environments. Fly as fast as you can trying to beat the time or keep up with fast vehicles to shoot the ultimate chase footage.

name: Rocket Fruit
summary:
Rocket Fruit is a free 3D arcade game you can play whenever you want. Use your boost to find your way up through the platforms, and try not to get hit by the knifes.
Well, there are plenty of goals you can reach by collecting the coins you get from boosting through a platform. There are different type of fruits you can buy in the shop, it is always a surprise if you want to buy a fruit, because the shop is random!

name: Role of Hex
summary: Role of Hex is a sci-fi rogue-like base-building game where you are an AI trying to tame the wasteland, a region filled with countless hostile creatures.

name: Roller Coaster Mania
summary:
Roller Coaster Mania is a single player, mouse controlled game in which the player builds and rides roller coasters. 
 
Navigation through the game is mouse controlled and is greatly simplified. The main menu, for example has just three icons, build a roller coaster; ride a pre-made roller coaster; and exit to windows. The build screen is equally simple with three panels in which the player chooses one of the five locations, one of the three styles of coaster each of which has four styles of carriage . 
 
When building a coaster the player selects a track section from the menu and places it onto the active end of the build with the mouse. The game automatically adjusts the pieces of track available depending on the piece that was previously laid and the terrain. Sometimes the player will find that the game offers no track pieces at all, this is usually because the track is about to go through landscape, another section of track, or because the terrain makes it impossible to position the track supports.  
Once a circuit is complete a menu pops up with the options to save the track, test it and to ride it.

name: Rocket Rumble
summary: Rocket Rumble is the racing party game! Combining the best parts of combat racing and fast-paced action fighting games, Rocket Rumble is a 1-4 player party game where a charming cast of animals in rocket suits smash and bash their way across the finish line. Rocket Rumble features single-screen, online multiplayer, and action-packed combat across 9 different obstacle courses.

name: Rocket League Sideswipe
summary:
Car games and soccer collide in Rocket League Sideswipe! Multiplayer car soccer has been reimagined for mobile devices by the makers of the hit game Rocket League. Score goals in fast-paced 2-minute games and customize cars in the Garage. Party up with friends or play online games with players around the world.

Drive supersonic race cars and hit the soccer ball into your opponent’s net to win matches. Already a Rocket League pro? Fly into the air and pull off trick shots, even a flip reset! Dominate the soccer field and race to the top of the car soccer leaderboard by participating in worldwide Ranked Matches. Just want to relax and have fun? Online car soccer in Casual Mode lets you perform your craziest maneuvers without affecting your rank.

Multiplayer soccer games level up with a combination of action-packed soccer and rocket-powered cars. Play online multiplayer games for free and master the game’s intuitive touch controls, perfectly designed for mobile car battle gameplay. Unlock exciting Rocket Pass Cars and Items by playing online and proving yourself in the Arena.

Experience online car game action from anywhere with Rocket League Sideswipe. Play together with friends and become a car soccer hero. Good luck, have fun!

name: Rolling Sky Collection
summary:
Rolling Sky is a ball running game that combines rhythm and fun. 
 
Challenge your speed and showcase your reaction time! Stunning 3D effects, easy to operate, simply steer the ball to dodge the obstacles and conquer the world! 
 
Rolling Sky 2 is a Running Game that combines music and story. 
 
Do you remember that the Parkour's pleasure and excitement through simple fingertips swipe in Rolling Sky? 
The sequel "Rolling Sky 2" will bring you more visual and auditory feasts. Enter an impressive dream journey in the thrilling musical rhythm challenge. 
 
Easy to operate but challenging 
Stunning 3D visual effects 
Abundant game scenes, each scene presents a brand new challenge 
Multiple songs that change along with the game scenes, enjoy the spectacular effects brought by the music 
New Original Music 
Unique Levels & Gameplay with Rich Music & Stories 
A Playable animated Movie that Combines Audio and Visual Adventures

name: Robin: Race!
summary: A superfast 3D third-person cartoon racing game where you run as one of many unique rabbits in 4 beautiful settings and 8 complex levels in singleplayer high score- or time trial-mode, or even in LAN multiplayer versus other players cross-platform on Windows, Linux and Android.

name: Rodent People: Origins
summary: Rodent People: Origins is a VR escape room, in which teams of up to 4 players use their wits to solve innovative, story-driven puzzles to try and break out of a prison cell.

name: Robots Evolved
summary:
Robots Evolved is a free-to-play think-type browser puzzle game based on the board game Ricochet Robots by Alex Randolph. 
Try your best use the fewest moves possible to get the robot(s) to the goal! 
 
You can play random puzzles, find and play a custom made puzzle, create your own puzzle and even participate in our daily and weekly challenges.

name: Rounds
summary: Rounds is a 1v1 rogue-lite shooter where each round gets more intense. The losing player of each round unlocks clever upgrades to create a better build to counter their opponent.

name: Rogue Mansion
summary:
Rogue Mansion is a survival horror game combined with the best of the roguelike genre! Explore a procedurally generated mansion that changes every time you play, and becomes more dangerous and unpredictable according to your level of fear.

Experience the game in different ways, by choosing from multiple unique characters, each with their own equipment, specialist perks, and motivations.

name: Rounded Hills
summary: Rounded Hills is a simple and cute ball jumping game. You need to jump as high as possible to get score points and break the latest highscore. Be careful during landing, because a major impact will end your journey.

name: Romeo & Juliet
summary: Romeo & Juliet is the first Onion Game created entirely by studio head Yoshiro Kimura, who conceived of, designed, and programmed it on his own, including all artwork and sound design. The arcade-like mini-game was created specifically to give away to current fans, and give potential new fans a taste of Onion’s unique style and flavor.

name: Road Fury
summary: Road Fury is an endless 2D shooter. Using a simple navigation system you weave your way through the traffic, overtaking the slower cars on the road and shooting anything in your way. You win coins for each car you destroy, the larger cars offering a bigger reward. Some vehicles may also leave behind power-ups to help you along your way. At the end of each level you'll encounter an end of level boss who's trying to shoot you off the road.

name: RollerBall Fantasy Island
summary: RollerBall Fantasy Island it's an arcade game in which you need to guide a ball through gates in order to pass the level.

name: Romance Detective 2
summary: ROMANCE DETECTIVE 2 is an unfinished visual novel and sequel to romance detective. the story is complete aside from a few short scenes that were left unwritten, and you'll see a lot of sketches in place of final art.

name: Rock 'Em Sock 'Em Robots
summary: GBA fighting game featuring the Rock 'Em Sock 'Em Robots

name: Robotic Worlds
summary: Robotic Worlds is a 3D logic game. Your mission is to free robots trapped in an evil computer labyrinth while avoiding deadly traps. Each robot shares linked controls, so when you move one, you move them all!

name: Rolling Sky 2
summary: Do you remember that the Parkour's pleasure and excitement through simple fingertips swipes in Rolling Sky? The sequel "Rolling Sky 2" will bring you more visual and auditory feasts. Enter a impressive dream journey in the thrilling musical rhythm challenge.

name: Robotech: The Macross Saga HD Edition
summary: Jump into your transformable Veritech fighter and blast your way through the entire legendary 1980s anime series, in a side scrolling shooter that will test the most hardened pilots. Follow the story of the war against the Zentradi, unlocking special characters and etching your name next to the great pilots of the series like Rick Hunter and Roy Fokker.

name: Robbed Money
summary: Robbed Money is a challenging Top Down game in which you play as a guy in a cowboy hat and you have to cheat the sheriff and his charges.

name: Roll
summary: Roll Dice. Get Dopamine. Sit back and relax with this ~SATISFYING~ clicker game turned deckbuilder... or should I say dicebuilder?

name: Route Me Mail and Delivery Co
summary: A new delivery company has arrived on the scene! Route Me Mail and Delivery Co offers only the best in mail and parcel delivery services, 7 days a week! Complete various routes across multiple cities before your work day ends. Memorize your routes and knock them out in record time to become the best Postman that the company has ever seen. Upgrade your Postman's abilities and buy decorations for your house at the Route Me Shop. It's also a good idea to pay off your debts! Collect Hidden Mail and deliver Special Packages to increase your daily payout. Become the ultimate postman.

name: Roundout by Powgi
summary: The latest Powgi game is a mash-up of two popular word puzzles. It’s a kross between Word Wheel and Kriss Kross. Yes, it wheely is! Roundout takes the fast and satisfying word-forming action of Word Wheel and gives it a new, visible goal to work towards. Plus, a free bad joke with every puzzle solved!

name: Rock 'N Racing Bundle 3 in 1
summary: Get ready to enjoy Off Road races with your friends and family!

name: Rock 'N Racing Bundle Grand Prix & Rally
summary: Enjoy 2 games in 1 with this irresistible speed games pack.

name: Rock 'N Racing Bundle Off Road & Grand Prix
summary: Enjoy 2 games in 1 with this irresistible speed games pack!

name: Rock 'N Racing Bundle Off Road & Rally
summary: Enjoy 2 games in 1 with this irresistible speed games pack!

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle
summary: The Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack for the series' latest title "Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIV" is available at last! An all new world of strategy awaits you. Make a display of your strategies on an increasingly worldly stage!

name: Rocket Rabbit - Coin Race
summary: Help Rocket Rabbit race through the hills and tunnels chasing after coins! Go upside down in the rabbit tunnels and defy gravity! Jump to avoid the other running rabbits, sleeping turtles, crawling spiders and climbing groundhogs! Or jump on top of them to earn extra coins! Use coins to buy powerups that will help you last longer and race further! Use cool powerups like invincibility, slo-mo and super speed to enhance your gameplay! Rocket Rabbit is endless racing fun for the entire family!

name: Roulette at Aces Casino
summary: Enjoy Los Vegas style Roulette at Ace’s Vegas Casino! Play on both European and American Roulette tables! Practice your skills and track your bets! Big wins will keep you coming back for more! Play on classic Roulette casino tables or have some fun with Ace’s Casino special Ghost Table! Test your luck and become a Roulette pro at Ace’s Vegas Casino!

name: Roulette
summary: Roulette is an easy to play simulation of the classic casino game where the objective of the game is to bet on the number or a combinations of numbers by placing chips on the table where you think the ball will land after it spins in the wheel. Based on the rules of the classic American roulette game, simply place you chips on the table by either using the joy-con or tapping on the screen. Roulette uses an advanced physics engine that simulates the ball's smooth movement just like the real game. Are you brave enough to try your luck and stacks of chips in one single bet?

name: Robox
summary: Robox is an easy to play fast action, fierce fighting game, with breathtaking graphics that will make you want to play match after match and four rounds of hard-hitting arcade action that will test your boxing skills to the limit and be the ultimate boxing champion.

name: Road 3 Pack
summary:
In this pack you get these three games:
Switchy Road - A simple, yet challenging puzzler to keep you on your toes at home or on the go.
Rally Road - Cross and drift the road in this rally racing game to avoid other cars. Race on the road while trying to earn coins and reach high scores. Pick your favorite race car and free roam the open highway, getting the highest score possible.
Twister Road - Random twisting roads every time you play so you'll never play the same game twice! Endless twisting roads for endless fun!

name: Rocket Jockeys
summary: Ever since 1996, the release of the original Rocket Jockey game, people didn't have the opportunity to run, jump, fly, grab, kill, goal and race to their will in a new rocket jockey game... NO MORE!

name: Rocket Squad
summary: Rocket Squad is a PvP game where you and your team control a single space ship, and must work together to take down the enemy ship!

name: Rohoen Rumble
summary:
The legend begins!

This is a very short bite-size game that includes the Garden as a level.

name: Rolling Cube
summary: Can you help the red cube to sprint toward the end while crowding out another pile of obstacles? By only moving from left to right, the excitement of gameplay can reach beyond your wildest imagination.

name: Roketz
summary:
Roketz is a 360 degree scrolling shoot 'em up. It features gravity environment and thrust-and-turn gameplay similar to the likes of Thrust, Virus, and SubSpace.

Selectable game modes are the usual deathmatch combat mode and a racing mode where the players have to pass given checkpoints as fast as possible.

name: Roketz
summary:
Roketz is a 360 degree scrolling shoot 'em up. It features gravity environment and thrust-and-turn gameplay similar to the likes of Thrust, Virus, and SubSpace.

Selectable game modes are the usual deathmatch combat mode and a racing mode where the players have to pass given checkpoints as fast as possible.

name: Rocket Skates VR
summary: Imagine having a rocket booster strapped to your hands and a hot pair of roller skates on your feed. There is a mountain road in front of you and all you can think about is racing downhills with rocket power. The premise might be simple but the fun is guaranteed.

name: Rockytown
summary: What happened to the people of Rockytown? Have fun at the village fair, with 4 exciting mini-games.

name: Roller Stars
summary: Roller Stars is a 3D casual game where you need to manipulate the ball to destroy buildings and recycle materials.

name: Robot Robert
summary:
Robert the Robot is an action-platformer. A huge and dangerous alien world awaits you. If, of course, you can defeat those who stand in your way, in 2D battles in the style of Contra.

Year 3875, scientists discover a habitable planet and send expedition number three, consisting of one highly technological Robot Robert, a flight lasting 557.7 light-years.

With Earth's signal lost, your goal is to find traces of the first two expeditions and find out what the friendly planet is hiding beneath the surface. Your mission begins in a cave full of riddles, hostile creatures, and dangerous plants

name: Rotate to Find the Difference
summary: Have you ever seen "Find the difference" that does not split the screen and needs to be rotated to play? That's it for this game. It tests your memory and may also help you exercise it. The game has 10 themed worlds, and different objects are generated programmatically, so you can play forever.

name: Rome Reborn: The Colosseum District
summary: Go back in time to visit the Colosseum and nearby sites, including the arches of Constantine and Titus, the Meta Sudans, the Temple of Venus & Rome, the Ludus Magnus, and the Colossus of the Sun. Listen to experts and see panoramas of the sites as they appeared in antiquity and as they look today.

name: Rollback
summary: It's a special challenge to get a chance. Go up to the highest point with simple control. If you make a mistake, try again.

name: Road to Death
summary: Shoot and loot your way through the dark while making it to extraction.

name: Rogue Invader
summary: In Rogue Invader, YOU are the invader attacking the alien horde in this genre-flipping roguelite shooter. 1-Bit black and white old-school art style, with modern touches and HD graphics.

name: Roadpunk
summary: By speeding on the road to get money to buy luxury cars, set records on different roads.

name: Robot Start: Puzzle Game
summary: In this puzzle game, play as an agile robot whose duty is to turn on the facility computers.

name: Roads of Time 2: Odyssey
summary: Roads of Time is a fun strategy game all about adventure and historical discoveries! Save history from collapsing in time!

name: Rogue Masters
summary: Rogue Masters is a 6 player co-op horde survival game with souls-like combat and extensive character customization where you fight Entropy in long-lost civilizations.

name: Rock'n Cow
summary: A survival game with the soul of Rock and Blues. Use a variety of weapons and equipment to defend your farm before it's too late.

name: Rotatex 2
summary: Rotatex 2 is a Ninja cat with spinning, jumping puzzles and parkour!

name: Rocket Panda Panic
summary: It's a Panda-emic! Spreading across the globe causing panic and fear. Only one hero has the courage, power and cuteness to save us all. Join Pandy and his jetpack as they travel the world, protecting us from the critter panda plague.

name: Rogue Card
summary: Rogue Card is a roguelike deck builder, where every run is unique and strategy matters. Set in a randomized fantasy world, where tactical decisions affect the outcome of your whole game.

name: Rooster Rampage
summary: Rooster Rampage is a chicken based zombie shooter. Engage your inner chicken in the single player campaign to fend off hordes of zombies across amazing chicken inspired worlds, or locate a nearby Rampage in action!![

name: Romeow: In the Cracked World
summary: Romeow feels lost without his favorite toy. Go through messy paths and help him find it, so he can take a nap peacefully. Enjoy this minimalist puzzle with him.

name: Roll a Ball With Your Friends
summary: If you have a friends. Let's roll a ball with your friends!!! Exciting Multi Play Roll a Ball Game. I will have over 10 stages. Compare speed of time with friend!

name: Rozalin and the Palace of Flowers
summary: Rozalin and the Palace of Flowers is a yuri visual novel about love between three girls while fighting against a curse.

name: Road Tripper
summary: Solve mysteries, gear up, build and explore! Live the chill life of a hippy scientist.

name: Roball
summary: Space shooter on your own drone. Various types of weapons. Every man for himself.

name: Ronald's Run
summary: Help Ronald use his magic to defeat the crazy nanoos. There are 3 levels to choose from and you can collect as many coins as possible. A fun single-player as Ronald gains experience with every nanoo vanquished.

name: Rogue Sweeper
summary: In addition to the rules of Minesweeper, we will explore the stage by making good use of the items obtained during the exploration. Various treasures are hidden in the treasure chests along the way. Let's collect treasures steadily in the Unique world of gypsy jazz with stages full of surprises!

name: Route 66 Simulator
summary: Have you ever dreamed about leaving everything behind and setting out on epic road trip across the United States? Get a budget, build your car and make your dream come true! Try to survive in the most famous road in the world!

name: Rogue North
summary: A tactical shooter that has you fight to survive against a military occupation as well as a growing nuclear winter. Prepare accordingly, there's a long walk ahead of you.

name: Robotic Learn
summary: Incorporate the role of a robot that aims to go through several puzzles to increase the intelligence and cognitive capacity of Artificial Intelligence to whom it serves.

name: Rocket Stop Incident
summary: Rocket Stop Incident is an atmospheric first-person horror game with puzzle elements.

name: Rollers of the Realm: Reunion
summary:
Rollers of the Realm: Reunion—sequel to the winner of GDC’s prestigious “Best in Play” award in 2014—is a medieval-themed RPG featuring a clever spin on pinball where the ball features attributes similar to a traditional RPG character.

Rollers of the Realm: Reunion features easy-to-learn controls and an adventure-filled game world inspired by classic pinball cabinets. Players will bounce, flip, and dash through physics-based puzzles to progress the story while leveling up a party of misfit heroes on an epic journey to new worlds.

Each character is represented by a ball that offers distinct gameplay modifiers, sizes, stats, and “specials,”—making battles and puzzle-solving a tactical affair where hot-swapping heroes is a must. Sending in a knight to do a mage’s job might not be the smartest move!

name: RomaHeta
summary:
A Hetalia fangame programmed into an English-language game by Kia Lao based on the original Japanese fangame.

Japan creates a new video game. However, an error happens, the error becoming sentient (taking the form of a doppelganger of Japan) and sucks characters into the game. The error is slowly trying to trap them in the game, and sometimes uses his powers to 'infect' people with a virus, causing them to come under his control.

name: Rocket Man
summary:
A unique platformer with twist. While being chased by a giant blob you need to gather fuel and a rocket on the right platform. After this you can fly, over water, to the left platforms to gather jewels.

Given the capabilities of the ZX81 an wonderfull game in "high-res".

name: Robodunk
summary: Cool robots, sky-high dunks, satisfying tackles and explosive weapons! Replayable single player and coop campaign: buy robots, upgrade their stats and unlock tons of new skills. Choose your path among different opponents, traps and rewards.. Up to 4 players versus where every match is different!

name: Rocksmith+
summary: Learn by playing along to your favorite songs featuring real time feedback, customizable pace, and a vast, ever-expanding song library of official recordings all designed to help you express your creativity.

name: Rogue Spirit
summary: Rogue Spirit is a 3D rogue-lite action game with light stealth elements. Play as the Ghost of the Prince of the Kingdom of Midra, possess enemy characters and absorb their unique skills to fight the evil presence that has corrupted your land.

name: Roark's Attack on Titan Fan Game
summary: A complex aerial pvp(player versus player) game with design aspects and characters from the aot manga/anime.

name: Robobo TM
summary: Immerse yourself in a strange world. Shoot all Time Gears to stop the time counter. Find and get all the Buggy Bugs. Update yourself and discover new skills. Save those trapped in the ice and help the Teetaks.

name: Roger Rabbit
summary: Roger Rabbit is the first game in the Crazy Castle series, known in the West as Bugs Bunny's Crazy Castle. The Roger Rabbit version was developed for the Famicom Disk System and released only in Japan.

name: Roguely
summary: Roguely is a fantasy themed, top-down shooter, pixel art, action roguelite with some bullet hell thrown in. Fight and dodge your way through the randomly generated levels to rescue your friends. Find upgrades along the way and save up arcane fragments for permanent blessings from the gods.

name: Romance
summary: Meiji era. The main character is an ambitious novelist. His work is criticized at the redaction, and he is recommended to write romance novels popular with public instead. Hero agrees, but he does not have love experience at all. This is a story of romance birth.

name: Road to Hollow Hills
summary: Road To Hollow Hills is an adventure horror game. Explore the environment, collect useful resources, and customize the abilities of your character in order to survive the Road to Hollow Hills.

name: Roasting Report: A Narcotics Murder
summary:
Detective Lee Kang-wool, who writes mystery during the day and novels at night. Then a female college student came to him.
Called a master of chemical engineering, she asks to find out who killed her beloved junior.
The suspects she brought in, however, reveal that there is another suspect.

name: Roadside Assistance Simulator
summary: Roadside Assistance Simulator is an FPP game that will allow you to prove yourself as a road assistance specialist. Get behind the wheel of your mobile auto repair shop, complete orders and earn money to grow your business.

name: RoboCop: Rogue City
summary: RoboCop: Rogue City is a first-person shooter set in the dystopian world of Old Detroit. Players step into the role of RoboCop, enforcing the law with a mix of brutal combat, investigation, and decision-making. Featuring a story set between RoboCop 2 and 3, the game combines cinematic action, cyberpunk atmosphere, and moral choices.

name: Robot Rogue
summary: Robot Rogue is a turn-based roguelike game featuring skill system. You have 3 skills and each skill have own attack area, attack damage, and cost of use. Cast a best skill on situation, and clear the dungeon!

name: Rogues Adventure
summary: Rogues Adventure is a puzzle platformer adventure game. Each level has a lot of coins, and there are obstacles that are destroyed when you collect the required amount of coins, and then you can go through the level further. Further on the levels, enemy characters appear, which, like obstacles, prevent your hero from advancing along the level. And also there are various traps and other things that can both interfere and help your character.

name: Rooten
summary: There is only you and the Forest. In "Rooten" there are no compulsory tasks, time just goes by, and days pass by independently of you. You can explore the Forest, try to get out, or even do nothing at all. The forest has always been here, and always will be. You won't change it no matter what.

name: Rogue Snow: Everwinter
summary: Six months have passed since the Everwinter began, covering the world in a permanent frost. Now it is up to a lone scavenger to help his camp reach the equator, in hopes of escaping the harsh climate and the roaming monster snowmen known only as the Droves.

name: Rogue Explorer
summary: Pixel Art Hack & Slash Roguelike Action! Do you dare to discover what awaits you deep in the abyss? Explore randomly generated dungeons in a roguelike action experience. Hack and slash enemies, acquire loot, and obtain enhancements to your existing equipment. Start your exploration now!

name: Rocket Bots
summary: Wreck your rivals with a rocket launcher in a fast-paced FPS

name: Roce's Journey
summary: Roce's Journey is a game based on the Sokoban, with 20 different puzzles and 100 levels. Players need to understand the characteristics of each mechanism and interact to solve the puzzle.

name: Robin Hood: Hail to the King
summary: Welcome to Robin Hood's third incredible adventure! From its comical campaign to its hilarious bonus chapter, you will love guiding the legendary Robin Hood and his friends in this new time-management game.

name: Rounded
summary: Unique ، quite a challenging puzzle game. An experience with wonderful views.

name: Road Home
summary: Road Home is a classic 2D platformer where you tries to overcome dangers and collect treasures. Combine speed, accurate jumps and different items capabilities to evade traps and enemies and find hidden places.

name: Robin Morningwood Adventure: A Gay RPG
summary:
Robin Morningwood Adventure is a gay (bara) RPG video game where you play an adventurer, discovering Whellcum, a gay village.
Learn new hot skills, buy butt plugs and craft cockrings to become a better fighter!
Play mini games to help the villagers and increase your affinity with them!
Collect underwear from the villagers to sniff them and relive their hottest NSFW memories!
Collect cards by playing Strip lucky with the villagers

name: Rocket League: Hot Wheels Triple Threat
summary: Celebrate the 50th anniversary of Hot Wheels with three sleek and powerful street machines: Gazella GT, MR11, and FAST 4WD! Also included: themed Decals, Wheels for each vehicle, and fierce Hot Wheels creature Toppers.

name: Rolling Car
summary:
Rolling Car is a perpetual motion (until you crash) runner game with a little control over the game.

This is a perpetual motion game commonly referred to as a runner. In this game, your obstacles are other cars. There are basically two circular routes that intersect: your vehicle is traveling in one direction on one of the circular routes; on another route, initially one vehicle moves in the opposite direction; but sometimes drives in the same direction as your car. After your vehicle has made several laps along these routes, other vehicles may appear; more on the opposite circular route and on the difficult difficulties of others on a straight road that crosses both circles. If your car is on the left track, collides with any vehicle, this is the end of the round. Vehicles on the right circular track and on the straight track are not helpful against each other. A record of the maximum number of laps your vehicle has driven prior to the accident. There is no difference between the highest number of rounds scored at Easy or Hard.

name: Rockjack
summary: A retro-inspired 2D space shoot-em-up. Mine asteroids! Shoot alien saucers! Get rich or die flying!

name: Room No. 9
summary: You have been selected to participate in a behavioral analysis experiment and these guys are at the mercy of your inhumanly cruel choices! it's up to you to decide the fate of of these two...

name: Rocha's Golem
summary: The golem is a guardian for a ancient forest, but your master desppeared, and him has fallem asleep, however years later your body recovers his in one last request from the forest create his emotions

name: Robo Gauntlet
summary: Robo Gauntlet is a chaotic robo programming rally game where you program robots then watch them perform the actions and cause mayhem on the way to the finish line!

name: Romance of Raskya
summary: A visual novel set in a fictional history based on ancient Rome. Features a dark and sensual story in a war-torn world where you must fight for your happiness. Switch viewpoints between two protagonists that attempt to reunite on opposite sides of a deadly siege.

name: Rogue Production Facility
summary: RPF is a simple real-time strategy game with lush graphics and easy gameplay. You mine resources and send your medieval units from one floating island to another to conquer enemies who reside there in quest of treasure and empire.

name: Rocket Ghost Aidan 2
summary: Rocket Ghost Aidan is on a new adventure through Com's dense dimension. Compact with enemies, treasures to hunt down, and challenges to overcome.

name: Roboggled
summary: Play as a robot who needs to figure out how to deliver a crate to its drop point

name: Rotten Tide
summary: Rotten Tide is a horizontal 2D tower defense game where players must protect the world from the attacks of all kinds of monsters who are threatening the humans in big cities all around the world.

name: Rocky Mayhem
summary: Rocky Mayhem is a hardcore space shooter where you play as a pilot, receiving distress calls outside of Neptune from a fellow co-worker. Your mission is to retrieve him but it's not as easy as it seems...

name: Rome 2077: Space Wars
summary: Unknown planets, whole new universe, with hundreds of ships to fight and explore, special abilities and ships craft. Rome 2077: Space Wars is a top-down shooter with ship craft, storyline, RPG element, survival endless mode and much more!

name: Rokka
summary: Rokka is an atmospheric Winter War simulator where you achieve a "defensive victory" by shooting incoming enemy soldiers and tanks. The game features adult humor.

name: Robot Female Hero 3
summary: Several years after the events of Robot Female Hero 2, a group of tyranical invaders had arrived to try and take of the Milky way. Standing in their way is the cast from the first game. Once again this is a classic top-down RPG that seeks to recreate the games that dominated the 90's!

name: Robo-Worms
summary: Battle your friends or others online in an entirely destructible voxel arena. Dig through terrain, finding equipment to assist in navigating the ever-changing environment and outwitting your opponents.

name: Rotego
summary: A puzzle platformer where you must tether to finish! Hold space while jumping to shoot out a tether, which will shift the gravity towards any surface it connects with.

name: Robo Terror
summary: Robo Terror is a dynamic and hardcore platformer, action shooter with a side view. There are 3 types of weapons in the hero's arsenal: a Blaster, a Gatling laser and a Beam gun, as well as grenades.

name: Robo Oh
summary: FC-style robots fighting game!

name: Roll Control
summary: Inspired by games like Super Monkey Ball and Marble Madness, Roll Control is a 3D balance based platformer, built to be played with your body. Using the Roll Controller App on your mobile device, players can transform their balance board into a human game controller.

name: Road to Nowhere
summary: You are a policewoman, but with the occurrence of a murder you become a murderer! The victim is a master who loves you deeply! You're innocent! How should you deal with the sudden planting of false accusation? How do you escape? It all depends on your choice.

name: Robot Lord Rising
summary: Welcome to a co-op arena battle game fueled by panic and humor! Fight daunting robot bosses on your couch or online with up to 4 players. Program your hero with action cards, and play nice with your friends! With 30 seconds on the clock each round, you need to be fast and tactical! Fastical!

name: RollerBaller
summary: RollerBaller is a racer against the clock. Stay on the path or suffer the consequences and get back to your last checkpoint! Rather infuriating title, it will boil your blood and should only be played by the most patient.

name: Roly-Polo
summary: You control a PillBugBear (or a pair of them if you chose Twins-Mode), and to win you have to score 15 points by throwing a purple ball thought ring goals. It's local-multiplayer against friends or CPU controlled players with 8 hand-made stages!

name: Roman Empire Wars
summary: Become an Emperor and guide your Legions to victory. Battle foreign armies and crush your enemies in a tactical real-time strategy game and show the whole Europe glory of the Roman Empire.

name: Rogue Party 2
summary: Explore dungeons, defeat bosses and earn epic rewards with up to three other friends (and occasionally hit them with potions) in this playful Rogue-Like adventure.

name: Routine Racers
summary: Crazy side-scrolling 3D game set in daily routines like escaping from work, buying at the supermarket, having a drink in a bar, stopping a fire or capturing some narcos. 10 Routine Levels and an extra Endless Mode with unique skills to master: dodge, jump, roll, engage, brake, turbo, build and push.

name: Royal Battleground IO
summary:
Discover the best strategies and become the best general in the world!

Create your undefeatable army and unleash it against other players in quick uncontrollable battles! Discover the best strategies and become the best general in the world!

name: Robolife: Days with Aino
summary: There's nothing better than living with a robot girl! Get your wrench on and show her your mechanic power! But beware, she might be more than just a regular robot...

name: Rock 'n Shaolin: Legend of the Seven Paladins 3D
summary: A taiwanese first person shooter and one of the first build engine games released worldwide.

name: Rocket League: Season 3
summary: Start your engines! Rocket League Season 3 is fueled up and live! Drive into the most high-octane season yet, with a new Rocket Pass, challenges, and content from Nascar and Formula 1.

name: Roxy Raccoon
summary: Roxy Raccoon is a cute, fun-filled 3D platformer for all ages and a throw back to collectathons of the past. Starring an adventurous young cub, leap, climb, sneak and roll through four unique worlds and compete in minigames in order to end the bratty witch's evil plans.

name: Role Player: Full Immersion
summary: Role Player is an Interactive movie game, you have to choose options and decide the fate of the main character. Our hero loves to play RPG games on the topic of technological disasters and post-Apocalypse, but he wants more entourage and adrenaline! Let's see how he`ll like it

name: Root Out
summary: Come join our multiplayer garden treasure hunt! Quickly stash your trinket and then find the ones your friends hide before time runs out in this colorful backyard playground! Can you outwit your friends and come out with the top score?

name: Rob Riches
summary:
Rob Riches is a puzzle adventure game.

You are Rob Riches, fearless adventurer and treasure hunter. Plan your steps carefully as you traverse ancient temples filled to the brim with dangerous traps and mysterious puzzles.

name: Road Flash
summary: Road Flash is a racing game inspired by the visuals, games and cars from the late 80s and early 90s.

name: Rolling Arcade
summary: Are you skillful enough to rock the tables of Rolling Arcade? Prove it in this digital reimagining of a classic mechanical arcade game. Steer the ball to the target, racing against the timer or another player!

name: RollerCoaster VR Universe
summary: Virtual Reality Roller Coasters: Visit dinosaurs forest, medieval castle, space, underwater, horror, micro-world and city environment.

name: Rocket Cave Adventure
summary: Rocket Cave Adventure is a physics-based roguelike where you control your craft through procedurally generated caves. How deep can you make it? Better yet, how good are your flying skills?

name: Roniu's Tale
summary:
Polish those magic and thinking skills, because there's no turning back! Help Roniu find his way through a death-defying dungeon and take down a plague of enemies hellbent on keeping him there. Watch your step, you're no longer on stable ground!

47 Levels of Dangerous Pathways
Head Scratching Puzzles
A Whirlwind of Enemies and Epic Bosses

name: Royal Roads 2: The Magic Box
summary: New adventures await you in the beautiful world of wizardry and magic!

name: Roopit and Boopit
summary: A Cartoony, Co-Op, Puzzle Game with a Quirky Charm!

name: Rockin' Road
summary: Rockin' Road is our love letter to Road Rash, FlatOut and other cool arcade racing games.

name: Robot Fight
summary: Robot Fight is what it looks like. A simple, funny "board game". Fast play with 1-2 minutes per round. The realy play with friends game. The feeling of life, when we laugh together about ourselves and our friends. Of course, it is spiced with the words "how can you be have a such of luck".

name: Rou Niu Yang Zhi Ji Hua
Rocket Explorer
summary: Rocket Explorer is a rocket viewing experience, where you can view the rockets of the world with your own eyes. Also in Virtual Reality! Launch rockets, compare them side by side, and take them apart.

name: Robin Hood: Winds of Freedom
summary: Help Robin Hood and his merry men rescue King Richard from a cunning kidnapper! With its cast of timeless characters, rollicking story of heroism and addictive gameplay, Robin Hood: Winds of Freedom can turn hours of idle time into a quest for fun!

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Additional Scenario - Thirteen Heroes
summary: The scenario "Thirteen Heroes" will be added.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Additional Scenario - Campaign Against Lu Bu
summary: The scenario "The Campaign Against Lu Bu" will be added.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Best Scenario for RTK Japan - The Tyrant Returns
summary: "The Tyrant Returns," the winner of the Original Scenario Contest held within Japan during October of 2016, will be added to the game.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Additional Scenario - The God of War, Surrounded
summary: The scenario "The God of War, Surrounded" will be added.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Fame and Strategy Expansion Pack
summary: Live the Three Kingdoms with extreme Officer Play! "Romance of the Three Kingdoms 13" celebrates the 30th Anniversary of the series and has achieved the greatest advances in the history of the series.

name: Roscosmas Landing
summary: Roscosmas Landing is a Space arcade game where you control a spaceship.

name: Robin Hood: Sherwood Builders
summary: Robin Hood - Sherwood Builders is an action-adventure RPG with base-building elements, where you take on the role of a classic hero who stands up to the tyranny and injustice that haunts Sherwood. Fight, craft, steal, and of course help the local people grow and prosper.

name: Rolling Adventure
summary:
Drive with precision, jump and speed up your way on this exiting conveyor-belt platformer. Explore with care and close attention, the handcrafted puzzles filled with the hardest challenges.

Rolling adventure is a *VERY HARD* highly-addictive hard-core tight platformer with a unique twist, you drive over a conveyor belt with a beautiful procedurally generated environment.

name: Romeow: to the cracked Mars
summary: Romeow has a big mission, to go to Mars. Go through messy paths and help him get there. Collect the spaceship components and place the cat flag on the orange planet. Enjoy this relaxing puzzle with him.

name: Rosemary's Fate: Chapter 1
summary: Put on your headphones and play! The first game of the new genre: Dynamic Audio Games. Explore a mysterious world that constantly surprises you with scenes painted by sounds and music. Learn about events stretched in three time dimensions. Embark on a mission to save your beloved.

name: Rolf
summary: Rolf is an indie game that has fun cuphead/Mario vibes. It is full of fun fast paced levels that are challenging to beat. If you enjoy playing cuphead or enjoy other 2d or 3d platformers this is the game for you.

name: Rock'n'Roll: Card Wargame
summary: US Marines and Vietnam warriors, welcome to a new card wargame that will send you on a crazy alternative-historical trip through the chemical-drenched jungles of the Vietnam war. Become a commander of Vietnamese guerrillas or American armed forces and show what you're made of!

name: Robot Builder War
summary: Lead your robot team to liberate the world from the evil CCP. Customize your robots by different parts and traits.

name: Rover Simulator
summary: Rover Simulator allows you to experience the cosmos through the lens of a Rover. Explore celestial bodies across the galaxy in the pursuit of evidence pointing to signs of life as well as gaining a broader understanding of the universe to pave the way for colonization beyond the Earth.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario - The Start of Change
summary: Additional scenario available for play with ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII EP: Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 1st Wave: Liu Bei Enters Shu
summary: An additional scenario for the War Chronicles mode of the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario - The Lu Bu Campaign & Event Set
summary: A scenario and set of events are added to "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV". In Zhongyuan, Lu Bu and Yuan Shu had joined forces, expecting an attack from the Cao Cao - Liu Bei army. Meanwhile, Yuan Shao and Gongsun Zan were about to clash at Hebei, while Sun Ce was building strength in Jiangdong.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII EP: Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 2nd Wave: Clash of the Warmongers
summary: An additional scenario for the War Chronicles mode of the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII EP: Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 3rd Wave: The Battle for Hebei
summary: A scenario where Cao Cao, Yuan Shang, and Yuan Tan fight to take control of Hebei. Cao Cao's army enters the newly occupied Ye and is on the verge of cornering the armies of Yuan Shang and Yuan Tan. Numerous obstacles lie ahead to suppress Hebei, so be sure to overcome them with the plentiful military strength.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario - Conflict among Clans
summary: Zhang， Sun，Wang， Liu，Cao， Li... Among the numerous clans that existed， if they were to combine their officers to form forces and contend to rule the land， which of them would be the victor?

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario - Battle of Tong Gate & Event Set
summary: A scenario and set of events are added to "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV". This scenario takes place after the Battle of Chibi. Players can enjoy the fierce battles of Cao Cao and the vengeance-seeking Ma Chao, Jia Xu's estrange plot, Liu Bei's entry into Shu, and other famous scenes.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario - Hebei Conflict & Event Set
summary: The balance of powers shifts in Cao Cao's favor after his victory at Guandu. Yuan Shao makes another unsuccessfully attempt against him， but soon succumbs to an illness. While Yuan Tan and Yuan Shang fight for the right of succession， Cao Cao seizes the opportunity to invade Ji.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario - A Yellow Sky
summary: By felling Luoyang， the Yellow Turbans had wiped out the Han. However， there were many days when Zhang Jiao collapsed from illness， and dark clouds were looming over the world of the Yellow Turbans.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Sun Ce Pushing Forward Event Set
summary: The events depict Sun Ce, son of Sun Jian known as the Tiger of Jiangdong, following his father's intention and crushing Liu Yao, Yan Baihu, Wang Lang, and others with great vigor, as he rises in power in Jiangdong.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario - The Battle of Hefei & Event Set
summary: Liu Bei enters Shu， which angers Sun Quan， who demands the return of Jing. While ignoring him at first， Liu Bei has to acquiesce when he learns of Cao Cao's invasion of Hanzhong. At the same time， Sun Quan moves his great force on Hefei.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario - The Rise of Cao Cao & Event Set
summary: Cao Cao and Lu Bu battled at Zhongyuan, and the defeated Lu Bu was forced to fall back and seek the aid of Liu Bei in Xu. At Jiangdong, Sun Ce expanded his forces with an all-out attack. Meanwhile, as Li Jue, Guo Si, and other remnants of Dong Zhuo's force were disputing one another, Emperor Xian fled from Chang'an and returned to...

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII EP: Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 4th Wave: The Battle for Wu
summary: An additional scenario for the War Chronicles mode of the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario - The Subjugation of Nanman & Event Set
summary: A set that includes an additional scenario and events that can be played with the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" and the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario - The Wavering Han Dynasty & Event Set
summary: With the fall of Zhang Jiao， the Yellow Turban Rebellion ended， but revolts occurred against the Han across the land. However， at the palace， He Jin and the Ten Eunuchs spent all of their time on political infighting.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 5th Wave: The Battle for Yan Province
summary: An additional scenario for the War Chronicles mode of the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIV: Legend of the Galactic Heroes Collab - Reinhard & Yang
summary: As a collaboration with "Legend of the Galactic Heroes" & "Legend of the Galactic Heroes: Die Neue These", Reinhard and Yang are added.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario - Gongsun Zan: The Hero of Hebei
summary: After Gongsun Zan wins the Battle of Yijing and conquers Hebei， he joins with Liu Bei， who forced Lu Bu to yield at Xu Province， and they head to face Cao Cao. When the defeated Yuan Shao flees back to his native home of Runan， he joins with Yuan Shu， who had also been defeated.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Zhuge Liang's Northern Campaign Event Set
summary: A set that includes additional events that can be played with the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" and the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Ancient Officers Officer Data Set
summary: Officer data that can be used to introduce ancient officers into the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" scenario you choose to play. Note: Officer data added with this DLC cannot be edited by using Manage Orig. Officers.

name: Rogue Company: Rogue Edition
summary: Save the Day, Look Good, and Get Paid with the Rogue Edition of Rogue Company. Gear up for Season 1 of Rogue Company with 8 Rogues and 500 Rogue Bucks.

name: Rogue Company: Ultimate Edition
summary: Save the Day, Look Good, and Get Paid with the Ultimate Edition of Rogue Company. This bundle has everything you need to get prepared for Rogue Company Year 1.

name: Ronister Adventure
summary: Horrible creatures ravaged the entire autumn, taking their sacred fruits to other lands. Now Ronister goes out on an adventure around the world, facing various enemies and obstacles. On his journey he'll find vehicles and will get unique abilities to save our planet from the terrible Evil Bat.

name: Rogun Arena
summary: Classic shooter with three game modes: Arena-battles with waves of monsters and people. Defrag-skill and time levels. Single player - a story game in the classic style.

name: Rolling Gunner + Over Power
summary: This release of Rolling Gunner includes the DLC Over Power as well.

name: Robot City
summary: Robot City is a maze shooter. The player controls a robot trying to destroy the Andromeda robots inside a maze. The Andromeda robots have force fields and can only be destroyed by being shot in their backs. They only shoot forward, and will do so whenever the player crosses their line of fire, even when walls are in the way. If the player manages to make two Andromeda robots destroy each other, bonus points are awarded (25 instead of the usual 10 for destroyed robot). The player is killed whenever hit by enemy fire or colliding with the Andromeda bots (or their remains, when destroyed). After killing all four robots in a level, the player progresses to the next, more difficult, level.

name: Rollem.io
summary: Skill-based fast-paced hamster racing MMO!

name: RockFree
summary: RockFree was a browser-based 2D rhythm game from Acclaim. Players could create a rocker and play along to match the notes in a Guitar Hero style with a selection of tracks. Cover versions of popular songs from several decades were available, and players were able to have three tracks in their library at any given time. In addition to solo mode, RockFree also allowed players to compete against others for dominance in rock battles of up to eight. The game's upload system let players upload their own tracks to play along with, even letting others try them out. RockFree was free-to-play with microtransactions available.

name: RoboJep
summary: RoboJep is a Platforming/Physics Based Puzzle Game. Fly through obstacles and solve small puzzles as the narrator shout encouragements at you.

name: Robo Go
summary: Imagine that you are a small robot capable of overcoming many obstacles, but would you like to? Of course you do! The ROBO GO game is a platformer, in which you have to go through 15 large levels, in each of which something new appears.

name: Rookie Bowman
summary: Simple platformer game about a man searching an ancient bow in a cave. Explore the cave, collect different items, find secret rooms and fight with bosses.

name: Robo-Boy Risky Venture
summary: Robo-Boy Risky Venture is a game for platformer fans. The Robo Boy is embarking on an epic treasure journey! Collect all the jewels that get in your way and jump to the ports to get to new locations.

name: Rose Knight and Thorn Witch
summary:
Rose Knight and Thorn Witch is a fairy tale yuri visual novel series.

In Chapter One, The Girl who Wanted to Become a Knight, Derin Larkspur longs to leave the Thistle Village behind and journey to the Academy where she will train as a knight. When she hears rumors about a witch living in the woods nearby, she vows to drive the witch away to prove herself as a candidate for the Academy.

But is it a witch in the woods or something else entirely?

name: Root: The Clockwork Expansion
summary: Allows players to square off against up to four automated factions with various difficulty and trait modifiers. Also includes support for Co-op play.

name: Road Trip
summary: Set in the southern cascades of northern California, Road Trip is a short game about exploration, community, landscapes, and family. Play as the Otter who is out looking for their grandmother, a legend of the Cascades who has made a name in the region but is a mystery to the main character.

name: Robosnow
summary: Robosnow is a casual racing game. Collect bonuses to increase your speed. Challenge yourself in a new personal record time with precise turns and obstacle avoidance.

name: Rogue Randy
summary: This game is a TOP-DOWN, horror RPG. Visibility is very limited... everything else pretty much isn't. Explore the map, collect power-ups, and see how high your score can get before you beat the game.

name: Rose Seed Replica
summary: A feel-good point-and-click lesbian love story about two women unexpectedly cast to the other end of the galaxy.

name: Rosy Manga
summary: Rosy Manga is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Royale Island Showdown
summary: An online 4 player Battle Royale FPS, where each player has an AI teammate.

name: Roar of Revenge
summary: A game that puts together Rastan's action with adventure elements inspired by Faxanadu. An old school tribute for every lover of 8-bit classics!

name: Roze Blud
summary: Command your squad to seek and destroy in this fast-paced Tactical Arena Shooter. Defend the Homeland as Druidic Eco-Warriors (Roze Blud), or consolidate power as Corporate Mercenaries (NEED). Know your friends, find your enemies, fight until the last drop!

name: Rover Mechanic Challenge: ERC Competition
summary: 𝗘𝗥𝗖 𝗥𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗠𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗶𝗰 𝗖𝗵𝗮𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗻𝗴𝗲 is an e-tournament based on the world's only simulator for repairing Mars Rovers. Take part in solving challenging tasks and become the master of leader board.

name: Rollin' Rascal
summary: Rollin’ Rascal is a high-speed action platformer that will test your reflexes and creativity as you zoom through a whimsical world in search of adventure! Strap in for a thrilling ride filled with speed, excitement, and a cast of endearing characters—an experience that will delight classic speedster fans while also introducing newcomers to the genre!

name: Road to Valor: WW2
summary: A Crash Royale Like Strategy Multiplayer Mobile Game set during the 2nd World War

name: Rocks'n'Gems
summary:
Rocks'n'Gems is a 2D puzzle game based on the 80's classic 'Boulder Dash'

It was developed by Gerhard Rittenhofer via the Net Yaroze PS1 development kit and released as a full game on the Official UK Playstation Magazine's demo disc 16, volume 2.

name: Rogue Wars
summary: Rouge Wars is a great FPS game to play with friends or by yourself. Earn coins by playing to purchase new characters, weapon skins, and better weapons. Play with your friends with either 2,4,6, or 8 players on a team.

name: Rocky Ride
summary: Welcome to the "Rocky Ride" arcade race! The "Rocky Ride" game is unpredictable tracks, crazy speeds and dangerous rivals. Upgrade your buggy car, choose any of a huge number of different tracks, and - go! To the prize places!

name: Robot Invasion
summary: Robot Invasion is a game set in the near future when robots have invaded Earth. There are robots everywhere and they are deadly. Avoid them at all costs.

name: RollMe
summary: RollMe is a physical-based platform puzzle game, where you can roll over 120 levels in 6 different places. Your ball can change the direction of gravity and you can use jumpers, teleporters to complete levels soon as you can. You can earn points when you collect consumables and finish the levels in a shorter time. Every act has new challenges and riddles.

name: Roads of Rome: New Generation 3 - Collector's Edition
summary: This is the super Collector's edition of our New game Roads of Rome: New Generation 3. Collector's edition gives you 6 additional levels, Desktop wallpapers, 2 music tracks, Cache maps for all levels.

name: RoShamBo Arena: Starter Fighter Pack
summary: The Starter Fighter Pack will give you everything you need to become the best in RoShamBo arena!

name: Rocketbirds 2: Rescue Bundle
summary: Get the bundle and upgrade your Rescue Mode missions! Get all Hardboiled Chicken's Story Mode costumes, bullet blocking shields, chainsaws and boxing gloves. You can also rent the Master Duck himself! New items and the Master Duck are only available in this bundle!

name: Rocketbirds 2: Mind Control
summary: Albatropolis has been freed and Big G and Putzki Jr are running for president! Who will win? Who will cheat? This DLC features new politician costumes, playable characters, new Dojo Debate Rooms; and the all new Assimilator Gun for Mind Controlling your victims during your Rescue Missions!

name: Rope Cow: Rope it to The Cow
summary: Rope swing like never before.

name: Rony: Rise of New York
summary: Battle aliens above the city of New York.

name: Rockman 2: Dr. Wily no Nazo
summary: Rockman 2: Dr. Wily no Nazo is the original Japanese version of Mega Man 2. The Japanese version of the game doesn't have difficulty settings, having its difficulty the same as the Difficult setting of the Western version, thus, being more difficult in comparison with the Normal mode of Mega Man 2.

name: Rock 'N Roll: G.E.O.S. Wars
summary: Rock 'N Roll G.E.O.S. Wars is a completely new dimension of the original Rock 'N Roll game. In this game, players can work together to vanquish the space rocks that threaten Earth... or they can choose to face each other in a wide variety of duel modes!

name: Rover Mechanic Simulator: Perseverance Rover
summary: The Rover Mechanic Simulator: Perseverance Rover DLC lets you fix and learn everything you need to know about the new Mars rover!

name: Rompe!
summary: Rompe! is a platform game where everything you touch breaks! destroy and rebuild the world around you to escape the dungeon!

name: Roll For Confidence
summary:
A wholesome story about what it means to be a strong, confident woman.

Everyone in the town of Fernweh knows and adores Sophia, the sweet co-owner of Screen Time arcade. Well, almost everyone. Sophia is tired of avoiding confrontation and keeping herself small. She wants to be a strong woman, but WHAT DOES THAT EVEN MEAN?

name: Robogal
summary: This is a role-playing game. In the game, you will play the role of bio robot manufacturer. Through the data collection of prototype, you can make the robot customers want.

name: Rogue's Tale: Bloodlines
summary: Rogue's Tale - Bloodlines is the second expansion for Rogue's Tale. It allows the player to choose a bloodline during character creation after they have been unlocked during earlier runs.

name: RoboWar
summary: In RoboWar, you design and program robot warriors, and let them battle it out in the arena. A complete programming interface allows you to design the robots appearance, sound effects and behavior.

name: Rogue Rising
summary: 2D roguelite action. Exhilarating action with easy controls. Grab the relics and use your skills to conquer the tower as many times as you can. Even the toughest bosses will be easy depending on your luck!

name: RoguekiniZ
summary: A rogue-like looter-shooter, with bikinis and zombies, and zombies in bikinis. Level up, loot up, look good, kill good.

name: Robo Quest
summary: Robot crashes on an unknown planet, he must repair his "home" to continue the journey, and to get to a party in time!

name: Robotragedy
summary: My game is called ROBOTRAGEDY, and is the story of a little robot who can't go to the living room to see the show of Robotinna, a robotic singer our little buddy loves. Once he gets to the living room he sees on the TV that Robotinna has been kidnapped and then he goes out to rescue her.

name: Robotragedy 2: Countdown to Doomsday
summary: Join Toby X in his new adventure and help him battle the ultimate villain, Nazgu Bain, before the Universe is gone as he know it. Travel around space and even time to recover some legendary and long lost pieces of a mysterious amulet, and save the day and his precious wife.

name: Rockabilly Kid
summary: Billy can't hang with the old dudes because, apparently, he's not enough rockabilly. Well, he's going to prove them WRONG! (An entry to MAGS May 2009)

name: Rob Blanc I: Better Days of a Defender of the Universe
summary: A chip shop worker from England has been selected from millions of bored but adventurous people to become an intergalactic hero.

name: Rob Blanc II: Planet of the Pasteurised Pestilence
summary: Rob is ready to take his new ship and begin his crusade. However, the High Ones insist he take a short holiday on Earth for a month, just to say goodbye. Not because they care for his feelings, but because they haven't actually built the ship yet.

name: Rob Blanc III: The Temporal Terrorists
summary: Something sinister is going on in the universe. Strange sightings have been reported; it seems that clones of ships, people and even planets have been appearing; clones that apparently echo both the future and the past. The governments of the universe have all drawn a blank - so they pass the buck onto Rob Blanc. Control both him and his sidekick Paul as you get to the bottom of the problem, visit four different interstellar locations and travel to a parallel universe...

name: Rome Pathway to Power
summary: Rome: Pathway to Power is set - as the name implies - in Ancient Rome. You start life as a poor slave in Herculaneum, which, along with Pompeii, was destroyed by the eruption of Mt. Vesuvius. Eventually you travel to Rome and climb the social ladder, becoming a Captain in the army, a Senator and eventually Emperor of Rome. Four of the game's six levels are adventure style romps, while in the other two levels you control an army in an attempt to conquer an enemy of Rome. The game contains many characteristic details to be seen around the levels; from naked people running around the Baths, to buying slaves to fight in the Gladiatorial games. There are instances in which you have the freedom to choose how to deal with various problems.

name: Robot Labs: Remake
summary: You wake up in a robot body and a charismatic voice makes you take endurance tests. You take your device to move objects in space and show this voice how to pass these tests.

name: Rock Star Simulator
summary: Taste the life of a famous musician, go on the live tour across the USA and have fun just like a real star - welcome to the rock and roll heaven!

name: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 2 - Dr. Wily no Nazo
summary: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 2 - Dr. Wily no Nazo is an expanded port of Rockman 2 (Famicom), lacking the difficulty selection from the international version (Mega Man 2).

name: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 3 - Dr. Wily no Saigo!?
summary: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 3 - Dr. Wily no Saigo!? is an expanded port of Mega Man 3 (NES).

name: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 4 - Aratanaru Yabou!!
summary: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 4 - Aratanaru Yabou!! is an expanded port of Mega Man 4 (NES),

name: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 5 - Blues no Wana!?
summary: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 5 - Blues no Wana!? is an expanded port of Mega Man 5 (NES).

name: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 6 - Shijou Saidai no Tatakai!!
summary: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 6 - Shijou Saidai no Tatakai!! is an expanded port of Mega Man 6 (NES).

name: Rock'n Bark
summary: Rock'n Bark, sometimes erroneously labeled as "Rock'n Park", is a 1976 discrete logic game by Sega with twin Tommy Guns. It is similar to Sega's earlier 1975 game Bullet Mark - complete with the "Bullet Mark" branding on the cabinet, suggesting it may have earlier been a cabinet variant or sequel.

name: Rockman Dash / Rockman Dash 2 Value Pack
summary: Rockman Dash / Rockman Dash 2 Value Pack is a compilation of Mega Man Legends and Mega Man Legends 2 released for PlayStation Portable in Japan in January 2009. The games are the same as their separate PSP versions.

name: Robots, Death & Venice
summary: Defeat the Robot Mafia in a dystopian Venice in this thrilling shooting game. Join Fio Bucceri, a former secret agent now turned into a bounty hunter seeking revenge of the Robot Mafia.

name: RoboDo
summary: RoboDo is a singleplayer/multiplayer VR puzzle game with plenty exciting features. Bunch of levels for you to complete, some are fast, reaction based and others will make you concentrate and think. Beat levels alone or join your friend for some Co-Op action!

name: Rogueslide
summary: Swiping puzzle meets dungeon-crawler in Rogueslide, a casual strategy game for desktop and mobile.

name: Road to Morrow
summary: Road to Morrow is a narrative-driven puzzle adventure game set in a near future Europe devastated by the effects of climate change. Explore this new normal through Iris, a girl whose memory was erased by an unknown event and must survive working for a company that controls everything. Travel around different countries created in a unique art style that bring together 2D and 3D graphics. Complete your tasks and reveal all the secrets of a world which is closer that you think.

name: Rocket Jump
summary: Rocket Jump is a great platform game that requires concentration and composure. Our goal is to get as high as possible, avoiding spikes and various obstacles. Think carefully about your next move, any mistake can cost you a lot of nerves and time.. The higher you are, the further you can fall.

name: Road Racing: Highway Car Chase
summary: Jump behind the wheel and race through the endless busy roads and highways! Make near traffic misses discovering unique locations. Roads and highways are full of speeding motorcycles and cars – they can bother you. Be also prepared to escape from the cops, who might even use a helicopter to catch you. Brace yourself for an action-packed run, filled with skin-of-the-teeth near misses. Nobody said that it's easy to win!

name: Robotry!
summary: Wreak havoc in a physics-based world! Walk, jump, kick, grab and throw by directly controlling each leg. Go from a glitching toddler to a somersaulting acrobat in the story mode, or tackle your friends in multiplayer versus modes.

name: Romans: Age of Caesar
summary: Build Rome Together! A co-operative grand strategy MMO from a team of veteran city builders, Romans: Age of Caesar is the latest historical strategy game from Firefly Studios.

name: Road Gangs Simulator
summary: Become a gangsta in the Road Gangs Simulator. Dive into a mix of the strategy and the TPS genre. Control each member of the gang, assault other gangs or even rob a bank! Wanna be the bad guy? Wishlist now and own the city!

name: Rocket Sword
summary: Rocket Sword is a ridiculous, gratuitous slash-'em-up where you are the projectile: a rocket-propelled greatsword. Slice, stab, and pulverize everyone in your path with the most powerful weapon in the universe.

name: Road Builder
summary: Road Builder is a logic puzzle game based on the system of creating roads and managing traffic flow. The player's task is to connect selected entry and exit roads by creating complex structures of intersections and junctions so that traffic collides with each other as little as possible.

name: Rogue Lords: Blood Moon Edition
summary:
The Blood Moon edition includes:
- The Game and the Supporter Pack
- Digital Artbook
- Original Soundtrack
- Moonlight set.

name: Room 13
summary: You have just checked in to your motel room, 'Room 13'...unlucky you. A sudden knock on your room door, awakens you from your deep sleep and turns out to become your unluckiest nightmare.

name: Rog Citadel XV
summary: Explore a rebel armory filled with the latest ROG gear, uncover secret surprises, and put your skills to the test in a unique virtual experience.

name: Rodina.doc
summary: Rodina.doc tells the history of modern Russia in catastrophes, protests, and criminal cases. The gameplay is inspired by classic adventure games. It shows everyday life and tells the stories of ordinary people against a backdrop of historical catastrophes. Many artifacts from the epoch, research texts, and historical eyewitness accounts can be discovered over the course of the game. The documentary is combined with elements of fantastical realism, quotes with fantasy, adventure with classic arcades.

name: Rocket Joust
summary: Battle your friends for aerial supremacy in Rocket Joust! Jump in with up to 4 human or AI competitors on the one device, in a wild contest to knock each other from the sky. Play across multiple levels and modes, using a host of quirky characters, and show your friends who the best jouster is!

name: Rooster Teeth vs. Zombiens: Remember the Bungalow
summary: The Zombien invasion started in the Rooster Teeth studio, but it's spread... TO THE BUNGALOW. Fend off ravaging waves of Zombiens in a more open environment with less room to cower in terror within. Still, build your defenses, scavenge for weapons, and fight for your life in REMEMBER THE BUNGALOW for Rooster Teeth vs. Zombiens!

name: Robo Recall: Unplugged
summary: Robo Recall is an action-packed VR first-person shooter with visceral gameplay and an in-depth scoring system. Earn the high score by using creative combat tactics and skill shots as you teleport through city streets and rooftops in an awe-inspiring ballet of bullets. Tear apart your interactive robot foes and use them to fend off the enemy onslaught. Unlock, customize and test weapons before taking on advanced challenges that put your newfound skills to the test!

name: Ronin: The Last Samurai
summary: Ronin: The Last Samurai is a shining example of how incredible control design can elevate a game. It simplifies the complex positioning and careful timing of katana-based swordplay to only two buttons, and it does so without reducing combat to button mashing or mindless grinding.

name: Rookfall
summary:
Somehow you got to this game in the sea of apps.
Congrats.
Rookfall isn't a game you've seen before. It's hard. It's not covered with berries or shiny baubles. I didn't have the money or stomach for that.
I created Rookfall to intrigue and challenge the "hard core" game audience. I used very little money to make it. It's not pretty but there's plenty of content, a form of progression, a difficulty curve, and the core puzzle is oddly compelling.
You'll have a hard time at first, but with some practice you'll develop some strategy. Due to the nature of the puzzle, solutions come in satisfying epiphanies.
You'll think hard, get frustrated, maybe have to come back to it later, but then finally see the light for some delicious dopamine. Mmmmm dopamine.
Have fun.

name: RocketBird World Tour
summary: In a country atmosphere, be the first bird to fly with a rocket on its back! The funniest 3D game on iPhone and iPod Touch, with more than 4 million players!

name: Rock Band 4: Rivals Expansion
summary: The Rock Band Rivals Expansion Pack includes free songs, Synchronous Online Multiplayer, Rivals Mode, a new campaign and more!

name: Rouge noir
summary: This is a short experience of a non euclidian game in unity. The only objective of this game is to raise diferent types of emotions, like confusion, happiness, calmness and joy.

name: Roots of Tomorrow
summary: Roots of Tomorrow is a free-to-play, realistic 3D farming simulator where you manage your farm day-to-day using sustainable farming practices. Expand your farm, take care of your animals, upgrade your buildings, invest in research and explore the solutions offered by agroecology.

name: Rotational Golf
