name: Rotato Rocket
summary: Fly your ship through an asteroid field - but you can only rotate!

name: Rotate Game
summary: Rotate your blocks to match the target. Easy to learn, hard to master. Improve your 3D thinking.

name: Robo Rapture

The rapture is consuming the world behind you as you trek forward with the ultimate goal of slaying the Antichrist himself, Neo Satan.

Manage resources, race the clock, and unlock bonus content as you embark on a comical adventure. Play Rose Riddle - The Fairy Tale Detective today!

name: Royal Order
summary:
Royal Order is a LGBT+ historical fantasy Visual Novel featuring survival stats-raising elements, magic and court intrigue.

Keep the main characters alive through the story by improving their skills. Host social events to gain different factions’ approval. You can also go on campaigns to bring the ongoing war to an end.

This game is an indirect sequel to the Visual Novel "Royal Alchemist". The story takes place in the same world, but follows a different cast. Both games can be played separately from each other.

summary: Experience an endless road trip with a vaporwave soundtrack, travelling through deserts, farmland and pine forests, with the occasional town or city. Have a conversation in emojis with your road trip buddies, just let them talk, or sit back and enjoy the scenery in silence. Toonwave glitch A E S T H E T I C recommended but optional.

DON'T FORGET TO TAKE YOUR MEDICINE

name: Romance Club
summary:
An interactive visual novel game for mobile devices. Play your way through dozens of titles spanning several genres, including mystery, sci-fi, romance, and fantasy. Customize your character, choose your route, pursue your love interests, unlock full color images. But be careful -- the choices you make will affect your journey and your story's outcome!

Available on Apple Store and Google Play.

name: Roombattle
summary:
Roombattle is a party fighting game where players will control robotic vacuum cleaners and will fight equipped with sharp objects and balloons. The main objective is to be the last to be equipped balloons in the game. In addition to the battles, the game contains a large crowd of minigames.

Meet up with your friends, customize your vacuum, and get ready to battle in different rooms to claim victory!

name: Rocky Rhodes and the Cracked Case
summary: Step into the shoes of Detective Rocky Rhodes and solve the mystery of the mysterious relic with the help of your partner Barbara and mentor Sullivan. The truth can be evasive - but for Rocky, he doesn't have a choice.

name: Rocket Theater Rehearsal
summary: 2D Side-scrolling Rocket Jumping Explosive Stunt Shooter with Unique Characters and Tricks!

name: Rogue Janitor
summary: Dungeons are messy, and only you have the power to clean them!

name: Rotato Ship
