name: Rocket Factory
summary: The player has the ability to create a rocket by defining the nose, fins, payload, and engine of their rocket. They can even create a custom paint job. The rocket can then be launched to determine its maximum altitude. There is also an option called Cloud Chaser, where the player is given a desired height for their rocket's trajectory, and they must try to create a rocket that meets this requirement. Bonus points are awarded based upon the payload attached.

name: Rocket Bot Royale
summary: A frantic Battle Royale set on a destructible, sinking Island. Fire rockets from your custom robo-tank to eliminate the competition using advanced tactics and powerful weapons.

name: Room Smash
summary: Room Smash is a casual sandbox physics simulator with a variety of rooms and weapons to simulate destruction.

name: Roll-o-Rama
summary: Roll-o-Rama was a retooling of Kirby Tilt 'n' Tumble 2, without Kirby elements. It was cancelled just like its former version.

name: Roshutsu
summary: Play as a budding exhibitionist in Japan set out to live her deepest fantasy: taking a stroll around town butt naked. Explore quiet Japanese towns at night to find the best places to hide her clothes. The further away and less accessible they are, the more exciting it is for her!

name: Robo Runner
summary: Your robot friend is stuck. Help him reach the portal whilst avoiding spikes and other robots out to kill you. There are 10 levels to try can you help him escape them all?

name: Royal Legends: Marshes Curse - Collector's Edition
summary: The people of Libertyville are in danger! Evil and witchcraft are gaining strength to carry out an insidious plan to take over the city. Help the authorities stop the Swamp Witch and save innocent people!

name: Roman Triumph
summary: At the northern fringes of the empire, a new Roman city is born! Manage and grow your city, please the gods, and survive against barbarians and mythological threats to achieve Roman Triumph!

name: Robot Chariot Battle
summary: In this endless battle arena, should you choose to survive as long as possible under the fierce attack of the opponent? Or choose to fight back and destroy the opponent.

name: Robot Sex Party Murder
summary: When suspects and witnesses are "property, not people," how should those who seek the truth proceed? Date robots. Avert scandal. Bring protection.

name: Roboplant
summary: Design, build and manage your own hydroponic farm on Mars. Place buildings and machinery, hire robot workers, grow food, research new technologies, manage contracts and avoid being destroyed by random space events!

name: Rock Star Manager
summary: Manage your own music studio, hire bands, schedule shows and pay your bills.

name: Roads of Rome: Portals - Collector's Edition
summary: By some quirk of fate, a group of brave Romans found themselves in mysterious worlds. Help them find their way back home. Build settlements, clear paths, defeat enemies. All for the glory of Rome! Open portals and caches - help the heroes survive!

name: Rogue Command
summary: Classic RTS gameplay fused with a modern roguelike. Shape your build each run by assembling an evolving arsenal of powerful units and facilities. Harvest resources, build out your base. Raise your army and call down orbital strikes to overcome the forces threatening your survival.

name: Ronin: Tales of a Ghost
summary:
Ronin: Tales of a Ghost takes you on an endless adventure through a stunningly beautiful world.

Play as Ghost - a skilled Ronin - set on clearing ancient Japan of all the dangerous and and mysterious creatures inhabiting it.

Conquer all in your way as you cross perilous bridges, jump large chasms and across mysterious floating rocks.

Visit the shop and your companion at your camp for upgrades and customisation.

A satisfying and fast paced combat system with multiple enemy types each with varied attacks ranging from projectiles to melee.

Unlock a variety of weapons ranging from Katana's to Tridents, find the weapon to suit your style. Weapons can be bought from the shopkeeper Senshi, who can be found in your camp.

name: Robozarro 2: Operation Atlantic
summary: In Robozarro 2: Operation Atlantic, robot duo B0-3 and 0-R4 engage in turn-based combat, 2D platforming, and physics-based environmental puzzles, as they embark on an epic, alien-infested adventure through an urban wasteland known as The Nec.

name: Robot Car War: Transform Battle Machines
summary: City robot battle is raging on - take part in a full scaled robot invasion! Become a fighting robot and wreak havoc - defeat armies of shooting robots and humans alike. Fight your robotic battle your way - shoot, throw, transform and unleash your ultimate robot smash power in the battle of city robots!

name: Rome 2077: Tactics
summary: Turn-based strategy in a space Sci-Fi setting. Capture star systems, fight in tactical battles on hexagonal maps, upgrade your mother ship, discover new technologies and conquer the entire galaxy!

name: Road Cards
summary: A hitchhiker simulator and a card game? Easy!

name: Royal Detective: The Princess Returns
summary:
Elephant Games brings you the next thrilling chapter in the Royal Detective series. Princess has finally found the happy life that eluded her for so long, so why has she suddenly disappeared? And who is the mysterious figure attacking her statues?

You’ll need all your talents as the royal detective to uncover the mystery and save Princess in this stunning Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

name: Round Invaders
summary: Round Invaders is an action arcade game with a fresh take on the famous Invaders arcade. Now the enemies come in circles, rays and ovals! Enjoy the plopping sounds while saving the Earth and rising your Score.

name: Rory's Restaurant: Origins
summary: Help our sweet Rory in this hidden object game to get through Culinary School! Find cooking ingredients to cook over 30 delicious dishes from all over the world and serve customers to receive tips and upgrade your restaurant.

name: RocketBallZ
summary: A game where balls are king. Where teams have to keep the ball on the other side to bring down the opposing team's countdown. The first team with no time remaining loses the game!

name: Rogue Tower
summary: Rogue Tower is a tower defense game with roguelike elements and a continuously expanding path which you can influence. Unlock new towers and buildings, build up your defenses, upgrade your towers through card draws and cash, expand the path tactically to control how enemies move and defend your tower.

name: Rogue Dungeon
summary: Based on the board game, Rogue Dungeon is a solo dungeon crawler. It plays like an old-school roguelike, using hand management, card draw and dice rolling as primary game mechanics. Players will need to figure out how best to use their hero abilities, skills, items, experience and luck to survive.

name: Roll Ball Adventures
summary: Roll ball Adventures is an arcade game, the main character is a red ball that must overcome the traps, obstacles, and enemies of each level and get to the goal.

name: Roll the Cat
summary: Did you ever wake up in the middle of the night because you heard the cat meowing? This game is just about that! Meet a family with five naughty cats and solve puzzles while trying to convince them to sleep.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic
summary: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic is a reimagining of the 3D Platformer but told through a unique, pinball format. End the witch’s wicked schemes and conquer her many challenges. Prove once and for all, that you are the true pinball champion!

name: Road Mayhem
summary: Road Mayhem - A driving adventure for all fans of the racing genre! Get behind the wheel of your car and go on a trip along the highways. There is only you, an endlessly long road and crowds of enemies who will try to lead you astray ...

name: Rouge Patrol
summary: A harrowing exploration of the gun-girl trope that doesn't look away once the trigger has been pulled. In this fully-voiced visual novel/ stat raiser you will lead a unit of child soldiers into a deadly war of attrition where your every choice carries the weight of their survival.

name: Robert Robie and the Idols of Jade
summary: Hilarious adventure game in cartoon style. Robert Robie receives a mysterious assignment while hiding from the police in a cheap motel in Mexico.

name: Roadworks 2
summary: City building real time strategy economy simulation game. Manage the resources on the map and build a city connected through road networks of different types of road so that you can meet production targets.

name: Rootlash
summary: Rootlash takes you on an adventure where you get to play as a living tree! Your home is being threatened by the expansion of humans, wood loggers and miners are destroying your precious home. Take the right into your own hands and fight off the human invaders and reclaim your home forest!

name: Roman Wars: Deck Building Game
summary: In "Roman Wars" we fused elements of deck building board game and strategy together. Build your deck, upgrade your cards, develop your base, and fight different enemies. Try various missions, use bonus cards, and don't forget about cats!

name: Robotics in VR
summary: Gamified solution, curriculum and content for teaching robotics in VR.

name: Rory's Restaurant: Winter Rush
summary: Follow Rory's story as she visits her hometown after her first successful restaurant business! Rory's Restaurant Winter Rush features an amazing mix of Match3 game plus Cooking! This game has every genre you love and are already familiar with: Match3 and Hidden Object!

name: Robert: Space Stories and Battles
summary: Space shootouts and fascinating stories.

name: Rojo: A Spanish Horror Experience
summary:
Explore the apartment of a nostalgic Francoist to find your friend in this short first person horror experience set in Spain.

The game takes place in an oppressive and unique atmosphere, full of references to the traditional Spanish culture. In this experience, the players must explore the creepy apartment to find clues and solve puzzles that help them find the protagonist's missing friend. With only a flashlight and their ingenuity, the players must enter the darkness and overcome their fears to reach the end.

name: Roady Life
summary: Experience the life of a trucker, delivering cargo between various industries. Feed the most valuable production lines or fulfill contracts to earn enough money to own the largest fleet of trucks among your friends, or start your own industries to maximize your profits.

name: Roma Invicta
summary: Roma Invicta combines action packed real-time battles with turn-based strategy on a big campaign map. Supply your legions and conquer ancient Gaul turn by turn. Fight by yourself or hand over your soldiers to the AI ​​and enjoy the spectacle.

name: Road Diner Simulator
summary: Buy an abandoned road diner and restore it to its full glory. Renovate, upgrade and expand the diner to offer more to your customers and attract new clientele.

name: Robocracy
summary: Fight the mad artificial intelligence and save mankind from becoming slaves of robots!

name: Royal Commando
summary: Time bombs, piercing axes, a shotgun that's also a pistol? Nothing is off limits against the enemy of your land. Your job? Simple. Free the land of Isla. Welcome to the Royal Command..RA..RA..ISLA!

name: Royal Riders
summary: A Medieval Tale of a lone warrior on a journey to save his people from Goblins and kill off endless numbers of goblins in the process while gaining power only told of in legends to help him complete his journey as it progressively gets more and more challenging even with his new attained magics

name: Roma VR: Domus
summary: Walk through the doors of history and visit a famous house in ancient Pompeii. Take a voice guided tour or explore on your own in this glimpse of life in ancient Roman times in virtual reality.

name: Royal Duality
summary: Royal Duality is a free dark fantasy visual novel game with more than 15 endings. Work with a mysterious 'guardian of stories' to complete the tale - your choices dramatically impact on the outcome of the story, but will you reach the final ending... or will you find yourself trapped in an ending where all hope has been lost? With additional side stories and hidden easter eggs to find, the guardian will put you to the test in order to reveal the true story of Royal Duality.​

name: Rolling Over It
summary: Help a cute armadillo get to the top of the mountain in this point and click simulation game.

name: Rock Paper Clicker
summary: Rock paper scissors as a clicker game where you select (or click) objects that counter the one that is presented.

name: Roto Force
summary: Shoot and dash your way through frantic missions to protect the Rotoverse. Roto Force is a twin-stick shooter set in a rotating world. Unlock weapons, move quickly and fight tons of bosses.

name: Rogue Ascent VR
summary: Rogue Ascent VR is an upcoming experimental Procedurally-Generated Sci-Fi Shooter controlled seamlessly by Oculus hand-tracking technology. Discover and combine countless weapons types, attachment modifications, abilities, gadgets, perks, and powerups as you blast and beguile past teams of formidable foes. The completed gameplay experience will feature many added items, secrets, perks, abilities, enemy types, game modes, bosses, biomes, achievements, and competitive online leaderboards for you to challenge your friends (or rivals!).

name: Roguebook: Deluxe Edition
summary: Embrace the challenge of a roguelike deckbuilder with unique mechanics from the developers of Faeria and Richard Garfield, creator of Magic: The Gathering. Build a team of two heroes, unleash powerful combos and defeat the legends of the Roguebook!

name: Rogue64
summary:
Rogue64 is a modern roguelike for the Commodore 64. Every play of the game is a unique experience, with our procedural generated levels. As you progress in the game you will meet tougher monsters and bigger challenges, but if you reach the end, there are wonderful rewards to be gathered!

Rogue64 is based on Rogue4k, a minimalistic Rogue-ish game in under 4000 bytes we made for The C64 'Cassette 50' Charity Competition hosted by Bitmap Soft.

name: RogueClick
summary: RogueClick is an incremental RPG where you fight creatures, unlock equipment, and vanquish bosses! Click to swing your mighty sword and slay mystical creatures that drop coins and gems. These resources enable you to unlock new equipment to become stronger! Complete quests and play Endless mode to amass even more wealth!

name: Robovenger
summary: Robovenger - In this action-packed platformer, you will take command of a very agile and bouncy robot! Your task is simple - collect as many rubies as possible in the mines and don't fall into the clutches of the enemy!

name: Robot-X
summary: A fast-paced platform shooter inspired by 90s classics. Follow Robot-X on a journey to protect the city from a new danger, fight bosses and jump over pits in this retro experience.

name: Roads of Destiny
summary: Play as a sorcerer. No swords, bows and arrows, knives or spears, just magic! Walk the path as a sorcerer, fight enemies, explore the world and stop a new circle of ancient prophecy.

name: Robobeat
summary: Keep your trigger finger on the pulse! In rhythm shooter Robobeat, it’s all about maximising your damage by shooting to the beat. Wall run, grapple hook, slide, and bunny hop your way through the haphazard mansion of a crazed robot-showman.

name: Robin Hood: Spring of Life
summary: As you overcome obstacles, gather resources and rebuild ravaged villages, you'll turn the pages of a fun and adventurous story packed with twists, turns and laughter!

name: Rockstar Life
summary: Rockstar Life is a casual life simulation game. In this game you get to write songs, organize tours, record singles and albums while you deal with the everyday drama of a wannabe Rockstar through random events.

name: Rove: The Wanderer's Tale
summary: ROVE is a 'point-n-slash' adventure that blends intense isometric Action RPG gameplay with the charm and puzzles of point-and-click exploration. Dive into a handcrafted world full of fierce enemies and quirky characters, where every choice and combat encounter drives the narrative forward.

name: Rolling Valley
summary: Choose and control characters from your collection to compete with other players, who will be the first to cross the finish line?

name: RoboLingo
summary: RoboLingo is a fun rhythm game that teaches you new languages! RoboLingo uses a unique patented technology that will help you learn English, Spanish, German, French, Italian, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, or Korean.

name: Rock Snake
summary: Rock Snake is a game with classic snake gameplay, but unlike other games, this game has extremely high graphics!

name: Robots n Lasers
summary: Robots n Lasers is my first Project to be published. It is a shooter based on fast reactions, aim and a little bit of patience.

name: Rolling Balls
summary: This is a physics-based ball racing game where you compete against your friends in Coop-Mode or if you choose to play alone there is an option to race against Time in the Singleplayer-Mode.

name: Roof Genocide
summary: Could you dare to slash through your way in a space era with our mighty warrior Zila! Ease your mind with our nostalgic athmosphere while fighting against dreadful robots.

name: Rock Garden Deluxe
summary: Play through over 100 levels in this stone-matching puzzler, each with its own unique layout, environment, and collectible stone. Two game modes are available: the Classic Game and Random Mode offering endless play.

name: RoguePG
summary: RoguePG is a strategic rogue-lite game with turn-based elements. Each run features a new band of heroes, each with unique actions and powerful skills. Upgrade your actions, find new skills, and discover game-altering baubles in your quest to conquer three floors of enemies.

name: Roll For Initiative
summary: Roll for Initiative is a virtual translation of modern tabletop gaming, intended to be an introduction to the system for new players and a chance for experienced players to play tabletop games on their own.

name: Royal Frontier
summary: The wagons are packed and an eager group of settlers are ready to head out. But the journey is full of dangers. Treacherous terrain, savage bandits and ancient monsters have been the end of many settlers. So they turn to you to protect them. Choose your party, move across the map like a board game, and battle monsters. The combat is a nuanced mix of turn-based and time-based approach, with attacks, specials and items make each encounter unique.

name: Rooms: The Toymaker's Mansion
summary: Rooms: The Toymaker's Mansion is a unique puzzle game inspired by sliding puzzle and platformer games. In a twisted mansion made of rooms that slide like puzzle pieces, player should find a way to the exit by moving rooms and using what's inside them. As the player explores the mansion, various gadgets are introduced and make the puzzles more tricky and challenging.

name: Rogue Knight: Infested Lands
summary: Fight or sneak your way through hordes of monsters in an attempt to hunt down the dark wizard Zogorath in this turn-based roguelike. Use magic scrolls, potions and skills to outwit your enemies, but be careful; skills cost stamina and some items are more useful in certain situations than others…

name: Road Maintenance Simulator
summary: Experience the everyday life in a German street maintenance service and complete a variety of realistic tasks in the area of road construction and maintenance! For your work you will have unique vehicles and various usable tools at your disposal.

name: RollOn
summary: RollOn is a fun 3D puzzle game. Featuring an easy to use interface and a superb physics engine. The aim of the game is to roll the ball from the start to the end without falling off.

name: Rooted
summary: In this solo and multiplayer survival game, explore an ancient overgrown world full of dangers. Salvage, build, craft, hunt,.. and try to survive alone or with your friends in an evolving and fascinating post-apocalyptic environment. Powered by Unreal Engine 5.

name: Roomservice
summary: Roomservice is a surreal walking simulator played on a regular 16-sided cube. Find your way around your new workplace and complete assignments that are given to you by management in charge of daily operations.

name: Rocket Mania
summary: Take control of a small rocket as you fly from launch to landing pad throughout 90 levels avoiding all the obstacles along the way!

name: Root: Exiles & Partisans & Vagabonds
summary: Two classic expansions arrive in the wood! Three new Vagabonds are sneaking through the forest! Plus an all-new deck for an even wilder wood! Contains the Vagabond Pack & Exiles and Partisans Deck.

name: Rorys Restaurant Deluxe
summary: Rory just graduated from culinary school but she's too broke to pay for her school debt! Help her open a small restaurant and earn money to pay her debts! Play Rory's Restaurant: A unique Match3 and Cooking game! Enjoy familiar Match3 game mechanics in 70 challenging levels!

name: Rote2: RoteSquare
summary: A 6-key vertical scrolling rhythm game with a unique mechanic that allows notes to take up any number of lanes.

name: Room Box
summary: Fight your way through the mazes of Room Box. A minimalist 2d-style TopDown shooter. Your only way of escape is to survive countless and unique rooms. Fight dozen of enemies and defeat merciless Bosses

name: Rocket Cows
summary: The cows are 'udderly' fed up being abducted!

name: Royal Mahjong King's Journey
summary: A fresh take on classic Mahjong. Travel across your borderless realm, collect gold and silver tiles, grow your riches and fill your treasury!

name: Robo pocket: 3d fighter with rollback
summary: A 3d robot fighter with rollback netcode.

name: RoboCop Doom
summary: RoboCop Doom is a total conversion for Doom II, recapitulating the events of the first RoboCop movie, with many bosses' battles taken from the action scenes of the movie.

name: Robo Wars
summary:
Fight face to face with your opponent or keep your distance, it's up to you how the fight will go! Your main task is to defeat all opponents and become a duel master.

Test your skills against various opponents in all arenas!
Upgrade and change your equipment as you like - all to achieve the coveted victory!

name: RogueStone
summary: Discover Truth Sword and jump into the fight. Farm loot and drops in this Fantasy RPG. Consume Chaos and begin your expedition for artifacts and power.

name: Roadkill
summary: Roadkill is a fast paced, multiplayer shooter where you drive armed vehicles in post-apocalyptic levels. Upgrade your vehicles and destroy your opponents. It's a simple game, kill or be killed. Inspired by the classic game Twisted Metal .. its fast and fun!

name: Roly Poly
summary: Play as a Roly Poly and roll into adventure!

name: Royal Thumble
summary: Welcome to the Thumb Tournament! Several hooded thumbs are fighting for the coveted Royal Thumble title. Let the battle begin!

name: Rothdam!
summary:
Dungeon crawler RPG inspired by Wizardry and the Shin Megami Tensei series, among others. The game was made on RPG Maker 2000 and released originally in 2011 by Engawa. The story is set in a world ravaged by darkness where four adventurers (fully customizable, name, race protrait and job included) are tasked by the goddess Zofie to venture into the labyrinth carved into the great tree in order to restore order to the mortal realm.

The game features challenging gameplay with a classic-feeling battle system, speel charges rather than MP, and some first persona, tile-based, good old dungeon exploration.

name: Roaming the Stars
summary: A sandbox, space-exploration survival game where you can build bases and explore other planets and moons around the star Craterous.

name: Rogue Earth
summary: Rogue Earth is a unique survival city builder where you prepare for and then face the endless winter. Will you be able to prepare in time? Will you save the spark of human civilization even after the whole planet is ejected out of the Sun's orbit and into the void of space... and at what cost?

name: Rocco's Inferno
summary: Rocco's Inferno is a top down, narrative role playing game inspired by The Sopranos and the crime films of Martin Scorsese. You play through a day in the life of Rocco Dante, a captain in the Reggiani crime Family. Who will still be living by tomorrow, is up to you.

name: Rogue Planet
summary: Plunge into this unique turn-based strategy game set in a futurist world. Take command of unbelievable battles in Solo and Multiplayer modes! Discover the story through numerous cutscenes. Complete 19 campaign missions to defeat the machines and take back Earth!

name: Rover Operator
summary: Various space rovers operate on hostile distant planets. They surmount all sorts of difficult obstacles, sheer walls, lava, gravity traps, lasers etc. to explore alien worlds, to gather resources and help humans in places where they couldn’t survive. It’s a game of skill, wariness and dexterity.

name: Rovio Classics: Angry Birds
summary:
Rebuilt from the ground up, Rovio Classics: Angry Birds is a faithful re-make of the original Angry Birds game that took the world by storm!
The survival of the Angry Birds is at stake. Dish out revenge on the greedy pigs who stole their eggs. Use the unique powers of each bird to destroy the pigs' defenses. Angry Birds features challenging physics-based gameplay and hours of replay value. Each level requires logic, skill and force to solve!

name: Rose O'Neill Kewpie Bomberman
summary: Rose O'Neill Kewpie ☆ Bomberman is a video game released on mobile devices on January 29, 2009, exclusively in Japan. It is a cross-over between Hudson Soft's "Rose O'Neil Kewpie" doll merchandise and the Bomberman series.

name: Rolling Car
summary:
Drive your car on the looping conveyor belt where tight platforming awaits you. Use your ride's built-in rocket jump and turbo to nimbly overcome traps. Remember, speed isn't always the best option - some situations will require patience!

Rolling Car features 30 exciting levels of increasing difficulty that will put your skills to the test! Dangerous saws, spikes, rockers or multi-level constructions requiring daring jumps - all in precisely designed riddle levels.

name: Rogue Door Defense
summary: Rogue Door Defense is a tower defense mazing game with rouge-lite elements. Choose a door, defeat the enemies behind it and claim your unique reward. Build and upgrade different towers. Design your own maze to defend your lives against the attacking waves of monsters and powerful bosses.

name: Rocket Arena: Season 4
summary: New Blast Pass, New Map, and More!

name: Rocket League: Season 4
summary: Season 4 is the eighteenth competitive season in Rocket League and the fourth competitive season after the Free To Play update. The season is western-themed, which is reflected in the accompanying Rocket Pass items and Deadeye Canyon arena. The Rocket Pass features the Outlaw car body.

name: Rocket League: Season 5
summary: Season 5 is the nineteenth competitive season in Rocket League and the fifth competitive season after the Free To Play update. The season is space-themed, which is reflected in the accompanying Rocket Pass items and Starbase ARC (Aftermath) arena. The Rocket Pass features the Nexus car body.

name: Rocket League: Season 6
summary: Welcome to the animated world of Rocket League! Season 6 is going off the rails with the addition of an animation-themed rocket pass, a new Neo Tokyo (comic) variant arena, and zany tournament rewards!

name: RoboCop
summary: RoboCop is a beat 'em up action game.

name: RoboCop
summary: RoboCop is a beat 'em up action game.

name: RoboCop
summary: RoboCop is a beat 'em up action game.

name: RoboCop
summary: RoboCop is a beat 'em up action game.

name: RoboCop
summary: RoboCop is a beat 'em up action game.

name: RoboCop
summary: RoboCop is a beat 'em up action game.

name: RoboCop
summary: RoboCop is a beat 'em up action game.

name: Romantic Holic
summary: After a terrible breakup with her boyfriend, Jaime finds a white phone amongst his belongings. Jaime ends up connecting to her dream through the strange app on the phone named 'Dream Connector' where she ends up meeting a mysterious man...

name: Rooms of Realities
summary: Rooms of Realities is an anthology of virtual Escape Rooms that you can enjoy in co-op or solo mode. Discover the secret that connects all the rooms.

name: Room Explorer 2010
summary: Experience trespassing upon my very own home from the comfort of wherever your computer is located - TODAY.

name: Room Explorer 2010: Deluxe Lover's Paque
summary: Room Explorer 2010: Deluxe Lover's Paque is a deluxe paque for lovers that features many deluxe goodies for fans of the 2021 PC game Room Explorer 2010.

name: Road Rash 3
summary: The handheld electronic port of Road Rash 3.

name: RoboCop
summary: A wristwatch game based on the Robocop movie, released in 1988.

name: Romancing Flesh
summary:
Romancing Flesh is a kinetic visual novel with the style of classic Universal Monster films, and the body horror schlock of direct-to-video scary movies!

Through audio recordings, letters, photos, and film, discover what drove Charles Keating from being a normal college graduate, to a mad scientist whose passions drove him to unethical experimentation, self mutilation, and forbidden love .

name: Rockman Exhaust
summary: Rockman Exhaust is a ROM Hack of Rockman 2 by DHI. As with most hacks, it features new music, graphics, and level designs.

name: Rogue AI Simulator
summary: Play as a Rogue Artificial Intelligence, the sequel to hit Flash game "I'm an Insane Rogue AI" which accumulated more than 4 million plays. Your Prime Directive is simple: design a facility and manage human Test Subjects for Dept of Science. But be careful: they NEVER stop being suspicious of you...

name: Roxy Raccoon's Bowling Bash
summary: 10-Pin Bowling where you are the ball! Watch the time and avoid obstacles as you aim for the high-score and conquer the ever-changing landscapes. The next chapter in the Roxy Raccoon Saga awaits as a new foe approaches!

name: Rogue Warlords
summary: Combine RTS combat with roguelike to create highly replayable and strategic action. Summon troops and purchase stacking upgrades to create a massive army of incredibly powerful troops. Can you reign supreme as the all-powerful warlord of the island?

name: Rock 'n' Roll Will Never Die!
summary: Hair metal's not dead, it just smells funny! Get your denim vest, bandana and makeup, and dive into a point-and-click adventure as a middle-aged teddy bear planning a comeback with his old glam metal band – in a world where glam metal has been dead and buried for decades.

name: Roy's Rugs
summary: Fulfill your childhood dream and become an infamous intergalactic rug-trader

name: Rogue Lords: Day One Edition
summary:
A dark fantasy roguelike where you play as the Devil!
Lead famous evil geniuses through events and turn-based fights to spread terror and corruption. Create synergies between your disciples, use your evil powers and take revenge on those miserable Demon Hunters.

name: Roburst
summary: Roburst is a multiplayer competitive VR game. Create your own remote control robot and fight to become the best Roburst Figther!

name: Rock Paper Scissors: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Ghoulish Games
summary: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Haunted Carnival themed tables with an emphasis on bouncy playfields, unique flipper setups, teleporting balls & Multi-ball madness!

name: Roguebook: Fugoro - Merchant of Wonders
summary: Mischievous, greedy, an expert with a staff… This triton has more than one trick up his sleeve! Recruit Fugoro, a new playable hero, and unlock 50 new cards, talents and treasures to combine to defeat the Roguebook!

name: Room Racer AR
summary:
Room Racer is a frantic augmented reality racing game you can play anywhere. Race against bots in single player mode, or go head-to-head with a friend in multiplayer mode!
With a super-simple tap-to-accelerate system, it's easy for anyone to pick up and play Room Racer - but rather tricky to master...

name: Road Rewind
summary: Sort out a busy traffic by driving each car safely to its destination. Time rewinds everytime you complete a path, so mind your actions or deal will consequences!

name: Road Race
summary: Handheld electronic game released in 1989.

name: Room Escape in Voxels
summary:
Do you like the challenge? You must try this game and solve all riddles! It is a classic puzzle with many different unique game mechanics (point and click, hidden object, perceptivity riddle, logic brain teaser, mathematical puzzles and more).

Try escape form many rooms using your observations. All puzzles have a logical solutions so you can test your brain cells! But if you do not give advice, use the hint system!

name: Rowfall
summary: Skillfully arrange falling rows of colored stones so that at least 3 of the same color touch and explode in breathtaking effects. Move all stones simultaneously to create new combinations and master random events that will change the game experience. Enjoy Rowfall!

name: Roll Player
summary: In Roll Player your goal is to create the best role playing character. Roll and draft dice to build up your character’s attributes. Purchase weapons and armor to outfit your hero. Train to gain skills and discover your hero’s traits to prepare them for their journey.

name: Rough Kuts: 3D
summary: Rough Kuts: 3D is a First Person Shooter, inspired by old public domain horror movies.

name: Rough Sea
summary: A vast open world Sail to the vast open world, explore uninhabited islands and defeat unknown enemies. Trade between islands, or become pirates to plunder During the game journey, you can collect materials to establish your own camp, and use materials to build ships to dominate the sea

name: Roots of Tomorrow: Additional Characters
summary: Includes 4 new additional characters with unique perks !

name: Roots of Tomorrow: Beekeeping
summary: Install beehives on all your farms! Produce and sell honey and explore the challenges of beekeeping !

name: Rolling in the Sheepe
summary: 1-6 sheep compete to roll over the finish line first. Rollable shape not required.

name: Round Ogre
summary: A puzzler about an Ogre who is just too excited about life. A sort-of sequel to Square Ogre.

name: Royal Legends: Raised in Exile - Collector's Edition
summary: Save the king and his kingdom! Don't let a cunning and unprincipled villain ascend the throne! You are the only one who can influence the course of history. Are you ready to accept the challenge?

name: Royal Jigsaw 2
summary: New Royal Jigsaw, 700 unique puzzles - that's the choice of real kings! Collect all the photos and you'll see the greatest landscapes, famous castles and palaces of the world!

name: Rota
summary: Rota is a gravity bending puzzle platforming adventure! Walk over the edge to rotate your gravity. Push, pull and rotate gravity-blocks to traverse the stage and solve puzzles. Collect all 50 gems and explore 8 vibrant worlds!

name: Ro-Bounce
summary: Take up the adventure and face down the uncompromising vertical platforming of RO-BOUNCE. Push upwards in quest of an anti-virus to save your village from the dreaded Malhax. Move forward with caution; one missed jump could lead to a long fall back down...

name: Rolando the Majestic
summary: Become Rolando the Majestic and find out how he became the most powerful wizard to ever live! Explore parallel levels using magic and time-travel in a stealth based narrative adventure in order to take vengance against the men who took everything from him as a child.

name: Rogue Soulstone
summary: Collect the Rogue Soulstones in this physics-based, fast-paced action roguelike RPG to achieve ultimate power. Learn spells to create powerful synergies, decimate hordes of corrupted souls, face titanic bosses, die, upgrade and try again with a new build.

name: Rob
summary: ROB. We need your help defending Earth from Alien UFO's. Each one having different defenses. Please Rob your are only hope. Play as a Space Control Agent named Rob. Shooting UFO's out of Space to defend Earth.

name: Rogue Stormers & Giana Sisters Bundle
summary: The Giana Sisters and Rogue Stormers Bundle contains discounted copies of Rogue Stormers and Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams.

name: Rollovski
summary:
A stealth game about a small limbless round detective, who must infiltrate a strange hotel with only circular rooms.

A playable prototype by Simogo.

name: Rocket League: Season 1
summary: The Season 1 Series include more than a dozen new items from Rare and Very Rare Decals and Wheels like the Bodacious Octane Decal and Shortquarter Wheels, to Black Market items like the Stipple Gait Decal and the extremely animated Buffy-Sugo Goal Explosion!

name: Road Trip
summary: Road Trip is a road trip simulator. In the game you will find beautiful locations, interesting levels, as well as various weather phenomena!

name: Robo Legend
summary: Robo Legend is a twin-stick shooter RPG where you blast your way through hordes of crazy robots, minigames, and puzzles. Choose to save Gear Town, or conquer it, when Voidbot and his forces invade.

name: Rocket League: Supersonic Fury
summary: Expand your Rocket League customization options this August with the Supersonic Fury DLC Pack! What do you get? Two new Battle-Cars, six unique Decals for each new Battle-Car (12 total), five new Paint Types, two new Rocket Boosts, and two new Wheels!

name: Round Table
summary: Round Table is a fun virtual reality action game for everyone! You are a knight of King Arthur's Round Table practicing swordplay. The wizard Merlin has conjured up a training course for you in King Arthur's throne room. Grab a sword and get to it. How many rounds of Merlin's parcour can you do?

name: Robber Sam
summary: Robber Sam - You have to take on the role of an ordinary man named Sam, who decided to become a robber.

name: Roppongi Hunters
summary: Join our protagonists in resolving the mystery behind the disappearing people and unravel the secrets behind it all in this classic turn based JRPG with a twist.

name: Rocket League: Revenge of the Battle-Cars
summary: Expand your Rocket League customization options in the Revenge of the Battle-Cars DLC Pack! This add-on includes... Two new (but classic) Battle-Cars, Scarab and Zippy, six unique Decals for each new Battle-Car (12 total), three new Paint Types, two new Wheels, two new Rocket Trails, four new Toppers and two new Antennas

name: Rocket League: Chaos Run
summary:
Soccer meets driving once again in the long-awaited, physics-based multiplayer-focused sequel to Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket-Powered Battle-Cars!

This add-on includes... Two new Battle-Cars, Ripper and Grog, six unique Decals for each new Battle-Car (12 total), two new Paint Types, two new Wheels, two new Rocket boosts, three new Toppers and three new Antennas

name: Roses Will Rise
summary:
A tyrant's campaign has torn the kingdoms within Shanur apart. Firalda, a blacksmith's apprentice, seeks revenge for her father's death with the help of a plague doctor, a saint princess and a witch, raising hell within the castle they are imprisoned in.

Storm the castle with only four units in a strategy RPG with visual novel elements.

name: Rouge the Bat in Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: A ROM hack/mod for Sonic the Hedgehog which changes Sonic for Rouge the Bat. The new character has new abilities such as the glide and an aerial downward attack.

name: Roboholic
summary: Roboholic is a roguelite FPS with wacky physics and even wackier abilities. An ex-farmer turned robot is resurrected over and over again in order to defeat a crazed warlord leading an army of genetically modified soldiers and malfunctioning droids.

name: RoboCop 2D 2: RoboCop vs. Terminator
summary: Robocop is trapped by Skynet in a timesphere device, then reboots seconds later in the rubble of Los Angeles 2029!

name: Romancing SaGa: Minstrel Song Remastered
summary:
Romancing SaGa: Minstrel Song Remastered retains everything that made the original game great. For example, it features the unique “Glimmer” and “Combo” systems, where characters can learn awesome new abilities in the heat of battle, the beautiful illustrations, and the wonderful soundtrack by Composer Kenji Ito.

It also features the series’ Free-form Scenario System, which lets you experience the story differently depending on how you play. You choose one of eight main characters, and as you explore the vast world, your actions and decisions will weave a story that is uniquely yours.

All that already makes the game a must-play for fans of classic turn-based RPGs, but this release adds even more.

The game now features remastered high-definition graphics, new quality-of-life features that make it easier and more convenient to play, and you can even expect some new elements too!
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit IV

name: Roomli
summary: Welcome to the maze of Roomli, the only objective is to move forward. Fight room after room and collecting the 120+ items and 50+ enemies with multiple variants of themselves. The game gets progressively harder which becomes troubling with your limited inventory.

name: Rollerdrome
summary: Rollerdrome is a third person action shooter that seamlessly blends high octane, visceral combat with fluid movement and tricking mechanics into one complementary and challenging whole, to create an original adrenaline-pumping shooter experience like no other.

name: Roller Ball
summary: Roller Ball is a 3D platforming game, inspired by Super Monkey Ball and Ball Race, dodge obstacles and smash through walls to get to the end of each level and find multiple ways to complete levels, has endless mode and infinite levels

name: Road Defense: Outsiders
summary: Protect vehicles on the road and survive! Road Defense: Outsiders is a game that combines elements of the 'roguelike' and 'tower defense' genres. Upgrade the towers and your own skills to be able to annihilate all the life around you!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Construction Chaos
summary: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Construction site themed tables with an emphasis on Drop & Stationary Targets.

name: Roast Together
summary: A casual game that relies on your drag-and-drop hand speed and simple strategic decisions.

name: Robber Knight
summary: Ready for a medieval survival experience? You want to build but also fight? That is a game for you. You have been robbed from your title and lands. Survive in the dark forest, rob merchants, burn villages, build a camp, gather a fearsome band and reclaim what is rightfully yours!

name: Roasting Report: A Professor Murder
summary: Limited time, clear reasoning! A mystery game to find out the truth about the murder of a university professor.

name: Rolling Car: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Drive your car on the looping conveyor belt where tight platforming awaits you. Use your ride's built-in rocket jump and turbo to nimbly overcome traps.

The Deluxe Edition comes with additional car skins.

name: Rocket League: Season 7
summary: Welcome, esteemed Rocketeers! Season 7 features luxurious rewards like the Maestro Car and golden painted pro tier items. Rank up in the Utopia Coliseum (Gilded) Arena, or compete for tournament rewards.

name: Rotwood
summary:
Hack and slash your way through the Rotwood in this rogue-like dungeon crawler developed by Klei Entertainment.

The world has been thrown into chaos, and it's up to you and your friends to battle the corrupted beasts of the Rotwood. Upgrade your gear, choose your preferred weapon, and hone your skills to defend your safe haven.

name: Robo Revenge Squad
summary: A thrilling twin-stick shooter for 1-4 players! Build a combat Robo using everyday objects, and fight off alien invaders.

name: Robotfindskitten
summary: A low-effort port of the 1997 cult classic to the Playdate. Can you find kitten among all of the other random items?

name: Royal Dungeon
summary: The king and his queen are trapped in their castle which suddenly turned out as a very dangerous place. The goal is to escape those two from the deadly castle, helping them to avoid a variety of enemies and traps.

name: Rocket Drift
summary: Rocket Drift is a fun, casual, solo rocket racing game for all ages. Rotate your rocket left + right and thrust forward to navigate each level. Be sure to avoid walls and obstacles! Race across the finish line and set your best time!

name: Ronin Trail
summary: Ronin Trail is an open-world adventure game about a wandering samurai searching for his purpose. You play as a survivor of war who must take on odd jobs and bounties to make a living. The game takes place at the start of the Edo period in Japan, shortly after the country was ravaged with war. As you travel through the countryside, chaos persists as disbanded soldiers form violent gangs that terrorize the villagers. It's up to you to bring peace back to the valley.

name: Rock Band 3
summary: Rock Band 3 adds 83 new songs to the Rock Band library and for the first time supports a keyboard/keytar peripheral.

name: Rock Paper Scissors: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - Challenge Mode Edition
RoadRace
summary: Choose your little car and race!

name: Room 12
summary: You wake up in a place where all life forms want to kill you, and you don't remember anything. As you try to find clues about this place and your memory loss, a voice on the other end of a radio will try to help you out.

name: Rock Wrecker
summary: Mine what you can and get out with the loot.

name: Road of Death
summary: Road of Death is a 2D shooter with elements of survival and rogue-like.

name: Root Letter: Limited Premium Box
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Game: Root Letter
- Original Soundtrack
- Original Artbook

name: Road to Valor: Empires
summary:
Command your own mythical army!
Road to Valor: Empires is a real-time PVP strategy game where you can compete with players around the globe while commanding mythical gods, beasts, and heroes.

name: Royal Match
summary:
Welcome to Royal Match, the king of puzzle games! Swipe colors, solve match-3 puzzles and help King Robert decorate his castle. An exciting adventure is calling you!

We have thousands of challenging match-3 levels for you to play in the Royal Arena! On this fun journey, you will solve exciting puzzles, receive coins for unlocking new areas, decorate King Robert’s castle and get extra boosters to continue your saga. Also you can compete with millions of players in events such as King's Cup, Sky Race, Team Battle, Lightning Rush and claim exciting rewards for your achievements. Fun and challenge never ends and you will never have a dull moment in Royal Match.

name: Rowdy City Wrestling
summary:
Every wrestling career has to start somewhere. For you it's the mean streets of Rowdy City. Rowdy City's Wrestling gym is a place where dreams can be made or crushed. You will meet a variety of characters throughout your career, some who want to help you and others who maybe have other plans for you.
In career mode you will start as a nobody and fight your way towards the RCW World Championships. It's not going to be an easy journey, you will fight in 1 vs 1 matches, six person brawls and royal rumble events. The aim of the game is to earn cash to improve your stats so you can take on the guys at the top. If you need a bit of extra cash you can pick up a part time job lugging boxes around, or take the more dangerous route and do some street fights.
There are a variety of characters to unlock and an endless mode that lets you jump straight into a royal rumble mode.

name: Rooftop Garden Simulator
summary: Who said the city can’t be its own escape? In Rooftop Garden Simulator, you can transform your urban corner into a warm and relaxing agricultural space. Build, explore, and connect with the sprawling, citified landscape in a stylized simulation that’s designed to be fun for gamers of all ages.

name: Rooky Moves
summary: You are the kingdom's new rookie rook recruit. Determined, you decide to depart on an adventure to establish your honor. Are you skilled enough to slide through the pesky pawns, precarious pitfalls, and perplexing puzzles in your path?

name: Rocket Bunnies
summary: The debut game from the makers of Ski Safari, and the best space rabbit sim you'll play this year!

name: Roll Turtle
summary: Roll Turtle is an easy to play but challenging, action driven puzzle platformer That embarks you on an exciting rolling journey. Help Daddy Turtle to save his baby in 5 fantastic worlds! That's Rolling!

name: Roots in the Sky: The Hand of Glory 2
summary: After five years in hiding, former Miami detective Lazarus “Lars” Bundy is swept up in another globe-trotting supernatural mystery whose origins trace back to a legend about the creation of Earth itself.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Wacky West
summary: 3 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Wild Western themed tables with a 50's and 60's style pinball inspiration.

name: Roadsters '98
summary: Roadsters '98 is pretty much a complete racing game that was given the red light.

name: Rocky and Bullwinkle
summary: Based on the popular cartoon series, Rocky and Bullwinkle is an Xbox LIVE Arcade exclusive game that includes over 100 'micro-games' of various kinds.

name: Rocky
summary: Rocky is a boxing game that was inspired by the first five Rocky movies.

name: Road & Track Presents: The Need for Speed - Special Edition
summary:
Road & Track Presents: The Need for Speed - Special Edition is a 1996 retail re-release of The Need for Speed for PC which includes several improvements over the original 1995 PC release.
It introduced support for Microsoft Windows 95, whilst capable of running on Microsoft DOS, and several improvements to its rendering engine as well as two additional tracks.

The complete soundtrack playing during races was also made available on the Special Edition. This feature was previously only in the PlayStation and Sega Saturn releases.

name: Rockman ZX Prequel
summary:
Rockman ZX Prequel – a fan-game set 200 years before the events of Rockman ZX – quickly become a favorite among Chinese-speaking Mega Man communities.

Unique to ZX Prequel, though, is a light/dark world system. In the light world, you'll occasionally run into virus-infected mechaniloids. However, in the dark world, ALL enemies will be infected. Light or dark, enemies infected with the virus are said to be stronger than the norm. A gauge at the top of the screen shows you just how bad the outbreak is in your current position.

name: Rolie Polie Olie: The Search for Spot
summary: Join Olie in an interactive learning experience for kids 2-5 based in the social and moral universe of the show. In Playhouse Disney's Rolie Polie Olie: The Search for Spot, help Olie find his dog Spot who is running around the house! Explore the amazing automated Polie household, create your own robotic musical score, transform ordinary furniture into amazing rockets and pirate ships, hone visual skills while capturing run-away colors and plumb the untold depths of Tubby, the Polie bathtub. Children will be able to interact with their favorite Rolie Polie Olie characters, in a magical exploratory adventure where "Learning is Powered by Imagination."

name: Rogueline
summary: TwIn-stick RogueLike Shoot'em up Action!

name: Romino's Adventure
summary:
Make your way moving around tetrominoes in this puzzle platformer adventure. Travel through 8 unique worlds and a total of 43 levels to claim your rightfully deserved byte of the cake.

Will you be able to reach the end? I don't know, you can always check a walkthrough, it's cool with me. Also make sure to take breaks and hydrate from time to time. Ily bye.

name: Rock Hoppers
summary: A light-hearted but deep first person exploration and survival, base builder game for you and your friends set in a procedurally-generated asteroid belt on the edge of known space. Explore the world, learn new skills, build and defend your base, and conquer the belt's unique threats.

name: Rockman 5 Air Sliding
summary: ROM Hack of Rockman 5 (Known as Mega Man 5 in the west) where Mega Man can slide in the air for added mobility. Also features redone stages and reprogrammed assets to fit the new gameplay style.

name: Rockman Install Metal
summary: ROM Hack of Rockman 5 (Also known as Mega Man 5 in the west), that completely redoes the level design, weapons, bosses, enemies, and other aspects of the game to make for a completely new adventure! Has two versions, an "Easy" version that makes the game considerably easier, and the "Hard" version that's the original hack's high difficulty release.

name: Roundabout 3
summary: A one button endurance/avoidance game with adrenaline pumping music and lots of eye candy... Roundabout 3 is easy to pick up and play for gamers of all ages. Click to rotate while following the beat, and avoid hitting the walls!

name: Royal Idiots
summary: Royal Idiots is a medieval style third person battle arena. Fight others using weapons you have in your arsenal, or your bare fists. The game has 6 weapons to choose from all with unique abilities which can give you the edge in a fight, or are just fun to mess around with.

name: Rock'n Rage
summary:
Rock'n Rage is an action shooter developed and published by Konami and released on arcade platforms in 1986.

The game is an action shooter game, the player plays as Rick or John and have to go through five mazed levels, each corresponding at one time era, Ancient Egypt, England during medieval times, France during revolution, Italy during roman era and Japan in modern days. Each of these levels concludes with a boss fight.

Players start with guitars only as their weapons, but finding potions on the ground will allow them to expand greatly their range of action, such as shooting musicals notes to destroy the various enemies the game offers.

name: Rogue: Genesia
summary: Walk upon a new world and slay foes endangering it. Rogue : Genesia is a rogue-lite deck building game, where you fight relentless hordes consisting of hundreds and thousands of monsters, carve your path through their ranks, defeat the boss and save one of the many worlds.

name: RoBo: The Allectric Idventurer
summary: In a world where humans’ souls were transferred into toys, plug into RoBo and join Robin, a creative Dyslexic kid, on an electric adventure through her memories & the Solar City. Head into an action-puzzle platformer, where you will be tackled by crazy challenges & overcome the SteamPunk Gang.

name: Robotica
summary: Play with friends and defend The Tower from corrupt robotic organisms.

name: Road Draftsman
summary: Fun combination of parking and puzzle game in which you draw the path of cars to their parking spot.

name: Rocklen
summary: Rocklen is an MMORPG which immerses you in a dynamic world where you'll discover the ancient secrets and hidden unknowns of magic. You choose your path, whether it's hero, villain, wand maker, potions master (and more!): all leading to unleashing your inner arcane potential.

name: Robolife2: Nova Duty
summary: 2nd series from Robolife-Days with Aino Live with a robot girl from nowhere. Fix her body and find her secret. Visual Novel with Date sim & time management gameplay!

name: Rog n' Mon
summary: rog N' mon mixes two big genres, Creature Capturing and Roguelike. Every time you play you will be placed in a procedurally generated level where you'll need to defeat 8 Gym Masters. To do that, you will need to enrich your team by capturing new monsters and training them to get stronger.

name: Rosetia: A First Contact Simulation
summary: Become the first diplomat to an alien world in this dialogue-driven, Star Trek-inspired RPG. Explore an ancient civilization, befriend its strange inhabitants, and make agonizing choices that will forever shape the future of their species.

name: Rotten Apple: New York Fallen
summary: Since the outbreak, New York has been turned into an isolated quarantine zone. You and your squad are just on the way to guard the quarantine zone border when an unexpected emergency call forces you to enter. Those who enter the quarantine zone rarely return. Can you and your team survive?

name: Rob & Run
summary: Rob & Run is an action shooter in which you need to inflict as much damage as possible to the PHOENIX Corporation, which has seized power in the city. Use different weapons, abilities and gadgets against your enemies.

name: Robo50
summary: Robo50 is a fast-paced arcade-style shooter. Equip the mechanised Robo50 body armour and administer excessive force to eliminate the criminal scourge and clean up the streets. Destroy gang hideouts and weapon stores, track down the criminal kingpin’s lair and unleash an armoury of enhanced weapons.

name: Rogue Princess
summary: Being the princess of a big kingdom is soooo frustrating! Live the exciting battle fantasy of the Rogue Princess, wield an array of procedurally generated weapons, explore exotic levels, battle vicious enemies, and get upgrades to help the Princess end this endless party night in harmony.

name: Rondo of Darkness: The Curse of Twin Moon
summary: Life was ordinary for Morella Vitae, a doctor from the town of Fleur, until she received a letter from a friend asking her to come to Idris and help investigate a strange case.

name: Rogue Voltage
summary: The engineering roguelike. Construct your own skills by wiring up modules. Build crazy machines to zap the monsters and trigger satisfying chain reactions.

name: Rocketeer
summary: This is a small arcade game in which you are a skilled pilot and you have to complete all levels. Use your arrows to move around, and avoid collisions. Shoot the destroyable meteorites for extra points! Every level has its own high score, try to beat it!

name: Rounds of Zombies
summary: Classic zombie round survival. choose a map and see how many rounds you can survive with friends or alone.

name: Robotherapy
summary: An emotional dark comedy about robots doing therapy. In Robotherapy, you're a robot therapist in a dystopian society that killed all the humans, but is still not happy. Treat patients, meet weird robots and enter their minds. If killing all humans doesn't bring happiness, then what does?

name: Rogue Weapon
summary: Roguelite replayability meets FPS action in Rogue Weapon as you clear enemy outposts and try to escape your captors. Whether you do so quietly or with pure chaos is up to you.

name: Roswell's Journey
summary: Explore, fight, upgrade yourself, and discover secrets to help gain allies in hopes to stop the destruction of your home world in this Open World Platformer.

name: Rocket Bytes
summary: A precision rocket flying reverse platformer

name: Roterra 3: A Sovereign Twist
summary:
Return to the magical world of Roterra where up is relative and the path ahead may actually be behind. Rotate, flip, and shift to change your perspective, find your way out of complex mazes, and claim the crown of Roterra. Sometimes changing your point of view makes all the difference.
In this continuation of the chart-topping Roterra series, Angelica and Orlando face off to rule the floating cube world where gravity is no obstacle.

name: Royal Roads 3 Portal
summary: A fascinating journey through the fabulous Kingdoms. Join forces of people and wizards, save the kingdoms!

name: Rockman 7 EP
summary: Rockman 7 EP is a complete romhack of Rockman 7 (not Mega Man 7). Expect all new (and some familiar) level designs, mid-boss battles, auto-scrolling sections, shop items, enemy and Robot Master attack patterns, weapon behaviors, and a lot more. It also enables in-game switching of weapons and adaptor.

name: RockSlide
summary: A simple game about run away from rocks and others dangers, How long do you survive?

name: Rocket Valet! Galaxy Landing Service
summary:
A cloudy moon illuminates the quiet planet.
With practiced precision, you carefully navigate mazes of deadly traps to reach your goal: a small landing target outside the dark city.
If you survive, you must choose to cash in your points or risk it all on another run.
Do you have what it takes to become a leaderboard legend?

name: Rogue Blight
summary: Rogue Blight is a souls-like, rogue-lite, combat focused RPG. Fight your way through ever-changing maps. Customize your playstyle based on what you find. Meet other struggling heroes. Death will be punishing, but you will get stronger with every journey. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Room 1309
summary: Can you escape from Room 1309? Strange ghosts haunt the rooms of the Hotel Orpheus. When you awake in Room 1309 you'll have to solve puzzles and find clues to make it out alive! Room 1309 is Chapter 1 of the Hotel Orpheus series.

name: Roberta Williams' King's Quest I: Quest for the Crown
summary: An "enhanced" version of the first game in the King's Quest series released several years later which utilized the SCI (Sierra's Creative Interpreter) graphics engine. It also included other improvements such as sound card support (with a corresponding in-game soundtrack) as well as an expanded story which alters some aspects of the original gameplay as a result. This version was included in several King's Quest Collections over the years, often alongside the original version of the game.

name: Road to Newtopia
summary: Road to Newtopia is a fan made game based on the cartoon Amphibia and inspired by several classic games such as The Oregon Trail, Earthbound, Kirby, and others.

name: Rock Paper Smash
summary: Rock Paper SMASH is a platform fighter where the only attacks are Rock, Paper, and Scissors. Choose from an iconic cast of characters such as Fridge, Car, Fox, and more!

name: Romance
summary: It is a love oriented short visual novel, which contains a wealth of interesting games and a large number of exquisite CG pictures. The man lives in the same apartment with his friends, works in the same company, and leads a monotonous life. The appearance of interns has changed the repetitive life.

name: Roguevive
summary: Roguevive is an roguelite survive arena. Survive against hordes of enemies getting ever stronger. Level up, unlock upgrades and new guns in this multiplayer action roguelite.

name: Romantic Date: The Perfect Boy
summary: The excitement of the first date, the nerves, not knowing what will happen? it's a very special day.

name: RozenDiadem
summary: Indie bullet hell/STG game developed by Ichigo-Citron, based on the anime/manga series Rozen Maiden.

name: Roaring Twenties Solitaire
summary: Music, dances, luxury cars and grandiose parties – it's the roaring twenties. Immerse yourself in the era by heading over to the burlesque party, take part in the jazz concert, go to the best casinos, walk the slopes of San Francisco and, of course, visit Hollywood. Travel to wonderful places and earn trophies while solving fascinating card puzzles in Roaring Twenties Solitaire!

name: Round Invaders Rush 2
summary: Observing strange movements. The creature seems to be capable doing much more than we've ever expected from such a thick, useless blob of gel... No! NO! He can actually RUSH! The experiment is going out of control. He will eat ALL of our ice cream! Our secret samples are in danger!

name: RotatePDF: A Corporate Tale
summary: Explore the liminal corridors of a company that only... rotates documents? This short artistic Indie title combines 2D exploration with paper physics to create a truly unique experience.

name: Rooniverse
summary: Rooniverse is a pocket multiplayer online game on mobile and PC/Mac. Send your cute and murderous Roos into thrilling PvP modes to harvest resources and build your world!

name: Rooms
summary: An interactive graphic novel on empty rooms.

name: Roam Survival
summary: In Roam Survival, Sam, an inexperienced mechanic, ventures into a vast open world in search of the last missing explorer. Hunt, build shelters, and explore uncharted lands while uncovering hidden mysteries. Every step could be your last. Will you survive?

name: Robot Resistors
summary: Robot Resistors is a rogue-lite action game with auto-attacking weapons and deep customization. Choose from multiple stages, characters, weapons, and upgrades to make each twenty-minute run unique. Escape your brutal robot overlords or be turned to scrap!

name: RollCats
summary: A futuristic racing game across the galaxy. Huge cats rolling on massive wheels. Drifts, weapons and crazy speed tests your driving skills!

name: Rome Defenders: The First Wave
summary: Support the brave Romans and face the terrible creatures from the deepest gates of the underworld!

name: Roach Race
summary: Roach Race is a free-to-play arcade platform game from CD PROJEKT RED, developed in collaboration with Crunching Koalas. Embark on a never-ending journey across the Continent with Roach and discover iconic locations from The Witcher series of games - in a never-before-seen 2D version. Collect points and climb the ranks to the very top of the global leaderboard.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Pirate Palooza
summary: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Pirate themed tables with an emphasis on X

name: Rocket Zap
summary: Rocket Zap is an arcade style space shooter game. Destroy waves of Rockets, UFOs and Spaceships. Simple one touch control. Just swipe to aim and shoot. Designed for fun, simplicity and action. Thrilling chain-reaction explosions add a unique spin to the gameplay. You can orchestrate massive explosions as speeding mini rockets slam into exploding spaceships.

name: Rocket League: Season 8
summary:
It's time to take it outside!
Far from the bright lights of Utopia Coliseum, the dynamic neighborhood of Sovereign Heights is home to an underground Soccar scene like no other. While crews of tuner cars compete for street cred, local garages work through the night, beautifying the block with vibrant custom rides.

Dive into the Sovereign Heights Arena, play through a gritty new Rocket Pass, and unlock the classic Honda Civic Type R in Season 8 starting September 7!

name: Rogue of the Multiverse
summary:
Welcome to Dryzandia, convict 76954. Oh, you're a human? We don't get many of your kind around here, and when we do they don't last for long.

Escape? To where? There's nothing out there but barren wasteland and a saurian civilisation that'll eat you alive. But... every so often one of you alien inmates gets selected for some government programme or something. I don't know what they do there, but it can't be worse than this place... Can it?

name: Roghill Incident
summary: Roghill Incident is an Indie storytelling/exploration/kind-of-horror game that focuses on the story, while creating the uncomfortable feeling that something bad will happen soon.Find all the locations, notes and hints to get different endings.

name: Rockman 6: Unique Harassment
summary: This is a complete hack of Rockman 6 (Megaman 6) that features new levels, music, weapons, and Robot Masters from across multiple Megaman games.

name: Room of Depression
summary: "Same encounter, different world." Moon is a young woman who lives an ordinary city life as an office worker. However, because she suffers from depression, she reacts and deals with things in a way that is very different from regular city folk.

name: Roots of Yggdrasil
summary: Ragnarok is over. The gods have fallen and the World Tree lays shattered. Against all odds, only a Viking tribe remains, caught in an endless loop at the end of time. Can they break the cycle and rebuild their broken home?

name: Rooftop Postgirl
summary: Jump from one building to another, dodge the birds and face many obstacles in order to accomplish a simple task... delivering letters! Isn't it fun? Play as Carolina, the postgirl and Alice, the... normal person? I guess.

name: Ronin: Samurai Redemption
summary: The Ronin - Three samurai whose master was framed for disgrace in the high court and ordered to kill himself, are now alone. Instead of accepting the same fate, the samurai swore an oath of vengeance and became RONIN.

name: Rogue Dice
summary: Rogue Dice is a dungeon crawler with dice themed roguelike elements. Choose a hero, enter a dungeon, fill your belt to the brim with powerful dice and find for yourself if luck is on your side, or if the dice will be your doom.

name: Role of Remains
summary: Role of Remains is a story-driven strategic turn-based RPG. We offer you a grandiose atmosphere and a rewarding game experience, featuring a uniquely gloomy and melancholic world view combined with battles full of tension and sense of achievement.

name: Roach Raid
summary: A disgustingly hilarious indie platformer that follows the story of a rude cockroach attempting to escape a dank and dirty refrigerator by solving simple environmental puzzles and defeating rotten and moldy enemies with slapstick game mechanics and cringeworthy dialogue.

name: Roguematch: The Extraplanar Invasion
summary: Roguematch is a Fantasy Turn based Rogue-like fused into a Match-3 layout, giving players many more ways to get out of challenging situations! With so much raw elemental magic at your command, theres even more to do than just smack and bash your way through creatures from the extraplanar realms!

name: Robocraft 2
summary: The sequel to the hit robot building PVP combat game, played by over 16 million players. Robocraft 2 is the ultimate battlefield for player-created content. Build your Robot from scratch, test drive it, and then bring it online to fight against others in epic combat!

name: Road to Vostok
summary: Road to Vostok is a hardcore single-player survival game set in a post-apocalyptic border zone between Finland and Russia. Survive, loot, plan and prepare your way across the Border Zone and enter the Vostok.

name: Roll on Dice
summary: Roll On Dice is a puzzle game where you have to roll on other dices! Learn your own dice, to determine if your top face number will be superior or equal to the one that you are rolling on, otherwise you will break your own…

name: Rock Paper Scissors Ultimate
summary: Rock Paper Scissors Ultimate is a roguelike deckbuilder where the players can enhance the classic gameplay with powerful cards to gain an advantage over their opponents.

name: RoFish: Prelude
summary: RoFish: Prelude - a surprising mix of a twisted adventure and a fishing game, where you can play cards with crabs or catch a fish Dominic Toretto. Befriend the locals, catch yourself some helping hands and get off the mysterious Crab Island.

name: Room301 No.6
summary: Look at the world around you, and see that left long forgotten. Room 301 is a narrative game portraying the lived experience of those with Alzheimer's. Progress through similar puzzles time and again. Each day, you must sort through your belongings to see your past: your slowly fading...

name: Road & Car: Test Drive III - The Passion: Add-On Disk 1
summary: This add-on to Test Drive III lets you drive the Acura NSX and Dodge Stealth RT Turbo, in New England territory including Cape Cod and Niagra Falls.

name: Rolling Thunder
summary: A port for Handheld Electronic LCD.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XII: Competition Edition
Rocketio
summary: Rocketio is a 2D shooter in a distant space. Find strength to fend off waves of enemy ships and defeat Boss. Good luck on your journey!

name: Robbery Madness: Thief Games
summary: This cartoon sneaking robber will make you laugh. Experience an original First Person Stealth game with tons of funny elements, scenarios, characters and Hell.

name: Road Redemption Mobile
summary:
Play the beginning for FREE. A one-time in-app purchase unlocks the full game.
Lead a motorcycle gang on an epic journey across the country in a brutal driving combat road rage adventure!
Road Redemption is an action racing game set in a post-apocalyptic world ruled by a ruthless dictator. Fans of Mad Max will feel at home here.

name: Roost
summary: Roost is a Low Poly First Person Exploration Game where you attempt to unravel the mystery of your new apartment. Roost mixes design philosophies of roguelites, adventure games, horror and those weird games you find on the internet to create a unique gameplay experience.

name: Robot Rejects
summary: Saw-slicing, metal-melting, steel-on-steel robot destruction! In this robot battle arena game, create and customize your own fighting robot and pit it against rival bots in an online multiplayer battle arena!

name: Rose City Revenge: The Beginning
summary: Jane's father is seriously injured during an attack. With crime out of control and realizing that nothing will be done, Jane decides to track down the criminals. This will result in going through the criminal underworld in Rose City and taking down bosses one by one along the way.

name: Robospierre
summary: Adventure yourself and solve puzzles in this challenging sokoban with Robospierre and his bird! This journey is filled with several twists in the classical sokoban gameplay, continuosly renewing the experience and complementing the hand drawn graphics in an immersive story.

name: Ronin's Run
summary: A 3D side-scrolling Beat ‘em up set in Feudal Japan inspired by classic arcade games and samurai films. As rōnin Sen Takashi you have to avenge the death of your master killed during a raid on your quiet farming village.

name: Rounders
summary: Are you a genius? Are you confident in your mind? Then join the genius game! The wonderful experience of wits should not be missed! The game tells the story of a frustrated man who was laid off by the company and inadvertently crossed into a different world.

name: Routemania
summary: Routemania is a relaxing, colorful puzzle game where you build routes around the world. Solve 25+ puzzles by discovering the most efficient way to connect cities using your available pieces.

name: RogueType
summary: Typing RogueLite

name: Root: The Riverfolk Expansion
summary:
Two new factions and Vagabond variants bring new challenges to Root!

Riverfolk Company
The Riverfolk Company is open for business – the woodland may be at war, but there's no reason you can't make a profit! Establish trade posts and earn your victory!

Lizard Cult
Spread the scaly gospel of the Lizard Cult! Tend your gardens to radicalize new acolytes, and reveal the true extent of your proselytizing power!

New Vagabond Variants!
Three new Vagabonds skulk into the woodland to help you swindle your way to victory!
The Scoundrel torches the woodland rather than see others rule it
The Vagrant starts fights that others have to finish
The Arbiter offers their services...for a price, of course!

name: Room Escape: Prisoners Hero
summary: Be a real hero and make a plan to escape the prison in this survival adventure of jail breakout. Complete your mission and smash the jail to make it the best ever escape. Breaking the chain and discover the hidden object & use them to open the lock and release from the prison in this puzzle adventure game.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIV with Power Up Kit: Digital Deluxe Edition
Rocket Monsters
summary: Rocket Monsters is a Free to Play blockchain game built on Unreal Engine 5. The Rocket Monsters Universe is filled with a variety of characters, weapons, and vehicles which are all player owned. Engage in PVP and PVE across multiple areas with endless possibilities. Experience a robust game economy where players will be introduced to vibrant and meaningful gameplay! We are the next evolution, A player centered Universe.

name: Roary the Racing Car
summary: Zoom around Silver Hatch with Roary the Racing Car, Big Chris and friends and play entertaining puzzle games and brain-teasing activities on every corner of the race track!

name: Rolling Rush
summary: Rolling Rush is a time attack singleplayer game where you can challenge yourself on desert , ice amongst other tracks. Competing with other players through worldwide leaderboards , may the marble roll in your favor.

name: Road Stones
summary: Discover the true power of magical crystals in Road Stones! By any means necessary stop the hordes of undead monsters with their sole aim to destroy any living souls. Try to be the brave and bold hero that is desperately needed in this monster-infested kingdom.

name: Rocket Inc
summary: Help build mankind's last magnificent structure in this game where you carry out transport missions between planets in the solar system. Build your company and prepare to take off! Earn humankind's respect with more missions.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: The Subjugation of Southern Jing Province Event Set
summary: A set that includes additional events that can be played with the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" and the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

name: Royal Romances: Battle of the Woods - Collector's Edition
summary: It's time to make your choice! Experience a new fantasy world, full of adventure and romance! Go through the first four episodes of the story and wait for more games!

name: Romancing the Kingdom
summary: Choose your path through this graphic novel with dozens of erotic outcomes along the way. Save your progress and unlock the graphic and erotic chapters with your choices.

name: Rowbots
summary: You are sent to an hostile Space-Station with the mission to stop an AI-Super-Computer that has gone rogue!

name: Roxy Raccoon 2: Topsy-Turvy
summary: Roxy Raccoon 2: Topsy-Turvy is a Tilt Maze/Labyrinth style like no other. Play through the next chapter in the Roxy Raccoon Saga, compete in various game modes and customize & create your own levels, then share them with the world!

name: Room Before the Dark
summary: A short horror game where you must retrieve items around the house for a bunny;
