name: Road to Devadatta
summary: Road to Devadatta is a first person adventure game focused on story and puzzle solving in order to progress. Explore an ancient temple find out why you are there! Use your wits and skills to escape from him! But be careful because you are not alone!

name: Robbie
summary: Robbie it's a hardcore platformer 2D that will challenge your puzzle-solving skills and patience

name: Robotization: A Last Human
summary: Robotization: A Last Human - a first person survival horror. Be afraid of unknown creatures that may be waiting for you. Survive in this scary world, where you are alone...

name: Rockman X3 Buster Battle
summary: Released it as a pack-in for a version of the console released after the first revision. Unfortunately, it seems the cartridge was not released separately. This package came with both a game cartridge (dark blue) and a manga/design cartridge (light blue) for additional stamps. The game consists of a simple battle feature where you pick a character, draw a weapon for them, and battle various Rockman X3 villains in RPG-like battles.

name: Rocksuki: The Rescue of Ember!
summary: A fan game made for the live streamer Selen Tatsuki of Nijisanji EN.

name: Rojiura Satsuki: Chapter Heroine Sanctuary
summary: Rojiura Satsuki: Chapter Heroine Sanctuary is a visual novel game that features Bronze Heroines Satsuki, Riesbyfe, Sion, Ciel, and the enigmatic Heroine X (Saber) as they endeavor to ascend the twelve palaces of the Gold Heroines, inspired by the Chinese Zodiac and offering a parody of Saint Seiya. The game becomes accessible throughout the day, revealing each chapter within a stone circle that lights up with flames corresponding to each zodiac symbol. Certain chapters introduce unique mechanics, including battles reminiscent of Pokémon, which may result in a game over.

name: Roswell's 66th Anniversary
summary: The doodle marking the 66th Anniversary of the Roswell Incident tells the story of an alien, who, despite having mastered interstellar space travel, appears less than adept at making a smooth landing on Earth. The team was inspired by classic point-and-click adventure games, and wanted to invite users to help an alien repair its spacecraft by exploring a 1940's New Mexican landscape, interacting with farm animals, and solving puzzles. When designing the game, we tried to think of things from an alien's point of view... chatting with a cow or chicken would be just as novel as meeting human beings for the first time; horseshoes and sacks of feed might be considered fascinating artifacts.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Hero Mode Additional Stage Set 3
summary: Six stages will be added to Hero Mode: "Wargod under Siege," "Fall of the Imperial Han," "Rise of Shu-Han," "Yiling in Flames," "Beyond the Peach Garden," and "Southern Campaign.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Hero Mode Additional Stage Set 2
summary: Four stages will be added to Hero Mode: "Enmity of the Triumphant Ma," "Talent Above All," "Entering Shu," and "Liao at Hefei." "Enmity of the Triumphant Ma," "Talent Above All," and "Liao at Hefei" are story/movie only stages.

name: Rocketio 2
summary: Rocketio 2 is a sequel to 2D shooter in a distant space. Find strength to fend off waves of enemy ships and defeat Boss. Good luck on your journey!

name: Rod Multiplayer Car Driving
summary: Get ready for an immersive car racing game with rod multiplayer car driving. Damage your opponents in multiplayer mode with rockets.

name: Rocpain: Rock Paper Scissors
summary: A paper airplane fights against Rock, Paper and Scissors. The ROCPAIN gameplay is inspired on the rock-paper-scissors hand game, and like the original hand game, each enemy only its destroyed with the right shot. A new way to play shooting games that will challenge your skills.

name: Rooms Within
summary: Rooms Within is a single person psychological horror game and is based on the urban legend of backrooms. You play as a scientist who goes into a wormhole to unravel its secrets. You end up in a bizzare place. Now you have to figure out how to escape while surviving the horrors in the game.

name: Rolling Realms
summary: The official digital port of the Stonemaier Games roll-and-write

summary: Play "What’s the Frequency, Kenneth?", "Überlin", “Everybody Hurts”, “The One I Love” and "Shiny, Happy People" by R.E.M. on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014: Regal Singles Song Pack
summary: Play "Possum Kingdom” by The Toadies, "Another One Bites the Dust” by Queen, “Silent Lucidity” by Queensrÿche, “Rock and Roll Queen” by The Subways, and "Sir Duke” by Stevie Wonder on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocket League: DC Super Heroes DLC Pack
summary: Experience the ultimate DC Comics crossover as two classic Bat(tle)-Cars from 2012’s The Dark Knight Rises and 1989’s Batman come to Rocket League! Also included: more than 20 customization items and player banners based on Superman, Wonder Woman, The Flash and other popular characters!

name: Rocket Escape
summary: You're trapped in a strange facility with only one tool at your disposal - a Rocket Launcher. You must use this launcher to rocket jump your way to the goal across many unique new environments, dealing with the hazards in your way.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Rage Against the Machine: Song Pack I-II
summary: Play "Bombtrack", "Killing in the Name", “Wake Up”, “Know Your Enemy”, “Renegades Of Funk”, “Bulls On Parade” and "Down Rodeo" by Rage Against the Machine on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Radiohead: Song Pack
summary: Play "Creep", "Just", “Karma Police”, “My Iron Lung” and "Optimistic" by Radiohead on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Matchbox Twenty: Song Pack
summary: Play "3AM", "Push", “How Far We’ve Come”, “She’s So Mean” and "Unwell" by Matchbox Twenty on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone. Capo required for one or more arrangements.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Megadeth: Song Pack II
summary: Play "Holy Wars... The Punishment Due", "Peace Sells", “Tornado of Souls”, “Trust” and "A Tout Le Monde" by Megadeth on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Mötley Crüe: Song Pack
summary: Play "Kickstart My Heart", "Dr. Feelgood", “Girls, Girls, Girls”, “Shout at the Devil” and "Home Sweet Home" by Mötley Crüe on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Muse: Song Pack
summary: Play "Hysteria", "Time is Running Out", “Stockholm Syndrome”, “Muscle Museum” and "Supermassive Black Hole" by Muse on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - My Chemical Romance: Song Pack II
summary: Play "Helena", "Famous Last Words", “I’m Not Okay (I Promise)”, “Teenagers” and "Dead!" by My Chemical Romance on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Oasis: Song Pack
summary: Play "Wonderwall", "Champagne Supernova", “Live Forever”, “Some Might Say” and "Supersonic" by Oasis on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Queens of the Stone Age: Song Pack
summary: Play "No One Knows", "3s & 7s", “Little Sister”, “Make It Wit Chu” and "I Appear Missing" by Queens of the Stone Age on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Disturbed: Song Pack II
summary: Play "Stricken", "Indestructible", “Inside the Fire”, “The Night” and "Ten Thousand Fists" by Disturbed on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Faith No More: Song Pack
summary: Play "Epic", "Midlife Crisis", “Falling to Pieces”, “From Out of Nowhere” and "Digging the Grave" by Faith No More on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Foo Fighters: Song Pack II
summary: Play "The Pretender", "Monkey Wrench", “Rope”, “Learn to Fly” and "Long Road to Ruin" by Foo Fighters on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Foreigner: Song Pack
summary: Play "Cold As Ice", "Double Vision", “Feels Like The First Time”, “Hot Blooded” and "Juke Box Hero" by Foreigner on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Godsmack: Song Pack
summary: Play "Awake", "I Stand Alone", “Love-Hate-Sex-Pain”, “Voodoo” and "Cryin’ Like a Bitch" by Godsmack on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Good Charlotte: Song Pack
summary: Play "The Anthem", "Lifestyles of the Rich and Famous", “The River”, “Girls & Boys” and "I Just Wanna Live" by Good Charlotte on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Iron Maiden: Song Pack
summary: Play "Fear of the Dark", "Run to the Hills", “Aces High”, “The Number of the Beast” and "2 Minutes to Midnight" by Iron Maiden on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Jane's Addiction: Song Pack
summary: Play "Mountain Song", "Been Caught Stealing", “Jane Says”, “Just Because” and "Superhero" by Jane’s Addiction on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Linkin Park: Song Pack
summary: Play "Guilty All The Same", "Bleed It Out", “In The End”, “Numb”, “One Step Closer”, and "What I’ve Done" by Linkin Park on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Jimi Hendrix: Song Pack I-II-III-IV
summary: Play “Purple Haze”, “The Wind Cries Mary”, “Manic Depression”, “Foxey Lady”, “Bold As Love”, “Castles Of Sand”, “Little Wing”, “Freedom”, “Fire”, “If 6 Was 9", "Voodoo Child (Slight Return)", and "Red House" by Jimi Hendrix on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Robocoder: Dwarf Mountain
summary: Fresh new unique game-play, like nothing you have played before! Take the role of Niko, programming Mar10 in this entirely new genre of Logic puzzle adventure!

name: Rose & Camellia: The Legendary Rose Bride
summary: A remake of the 2007 Flash game by Nigoro, optimized for smartphones and touchscreen controls. Play as the recently widowed Reiko, as you slap-duel your way through the Tsubakikoji family and establish your place as the matriarch. Fighting is turn-based, and timing-based, reminiscent of other fighting games such as Punch-Out!! A short little game by the makers of La-Mulana about the elegant art of feminine conflict.

name: Robolifter
summary: Robolifter is a sci-fi sokibanish puzzle game where you level by level repair the spaceship. You are the last working Lifter bot and the last hope of your companion - Repair AI. Help her to fix the damage and investigate what caused the critical shutdown.

name: Rosetta
summary:
Rosetta is the most beautiful woman you have ever encountered, she's a mask made of the softest rubber, with silk hair. You will chat with her, alone, in the basement, only the two of you, get to know her.

Rosetta is only 15 minutes long and contains graphic images and explicit language.

name: Rock Life: The Rock Simulator
summary: Built from the ground up, Rock Life is the next generation of immersion and simulations. Live, do, and experience what it is like to truly become one with nature... as a rock!

name: Rolldown
summary: Roguelike puzzler about smacking monsters with dice.

name: Rocket League: Season 9
summary: Long held in place by an ancient seal, the dragons of Forbidden Temple Arena have finally awoken from their slumber. As the two resume their eternal battle, these legendary beasts have left a treasure trove of elemental Items in their wake.

name: Roboleon
summary:
Roboleon is a story-driven humorous and subtle-dystopian Platformer Puzzle Adventure game. It focuses on a playful movement system, a physics-based character design, and puzzle-solving.

You play as Roboleon, a fallback maintenance robot aboard an alien spaceship, who is trying to help save its creators after the ship is struck by an asteroid.

name: Rootless: Memories of Green
summary: Rootless: Memories of Green is a classic 2D adventure game set in a futuristic cyberpunk world.

name: RoboCop Versus the Terminator
summary: Game Boy port of RoboCop Versus The Terminator.

name: RoboCop Versus the Terminator
summary: Master System/Game Gear port of RoboCop Versus The Terminator.

name: Rocketio 3
summary: Rocketio 3 is a sequel to 2D shooter in a distant space. Find strength to fend off waves of enemy ships and defeat Boss. Good luck on your journey!

name: RollerCoaster Tycoon 6 Pack
summary: RollerCoaster Tycoon 6 Pack is a compilation for the PC that features the games RollerCoaster Tycoon, Added Attractions, Loopy Landscapes, RollerCoaster Tycoon 2, Wacky Worlds, and Time Twister.

name: Rock Tris
summary: A tetris-style game to reveal sexy images. Rock Tris is heavily based on the 1991 Taiwan PC game "X Rock".

name: Roman Sands RE:Build
summary: Washed up on the shores of a timeless luxury retreat, you find yourself acquainted with its unhinged inhabitants. They await the day that the Sun will swallow the world. You are obligated to serve their whims. There's more to this place than meets the eye. Can you uncover your exit?

name: Room of Halloween
summary: Halloween themed escape room game

name: Rockman Dash: 5tsu no Shima no Daibouken!
summary: Rockman Dash: 5tsu no Shima no Daibouken! is a video game in the Rockman Dash series released in 2008 for mobile phones via the i-mode Internet service. The game has a total of five islands, each with seven areas to explore. Rock Volnutt and friends explore them in search of treasure and to uncover their secrets.

name: RonRon
summary: This is Ron Ron, the official mahjong site of the Japan Professional Mahjong Federation.

name: Rooftop
summary: Rooftop is an English Yume Nikki fangame where you explore Lani's dream world. The goal of the game is to explore and obtain effects.

name: Robot Unicorn Attack Evolution
summary: A new game in the Robot Unicorn Attack series by Adult Swim featuring the power to evolve into new animal/unicorn/robot hybrids.

name: Robot Rumpus Royale
summary: The year is 2082. Robot battles are all the rage. Fans flock from all four corners of the globe to watch robots duke it out. Competitors rent a bot and send it against a series of other bots. If their bot falls, they lose. But if their bot wins, then the competitors will gain fame and glory (and maybe even a sponsorship) beyond their wildest dreams! You are the latest competitor to challenge the arena. You are randomly assigned a rental bot. Maybe you’ll become the newest champion of the arena. Maybe you’ll fail miserably. Maybe you’re just here to listen to the goofy robot voices. And maybe you’ll get a new friend out of the deal. Who knows!

name: Road to Scrubville: A Bijuu Mike Fangame
summary: Road to Scrubville is a Bijuu Mike inspired fangame. Clarence decides to take revenge on Bijuu Mike once again, will it end well this time?

name: Rollercoaster World 2
summary: If you're an adrenaline junkie and crave the rush of high-speed thrills, start building! Construct wooden, steel, inverted, stand-up and even flying coasters that push the boundaries of design with gravity-defying loops, stomach-wrenching corkscrews and knee-weakening speeds!

name: Rock the World: A Reading Adventure
Rot
summary: Rot is a short psychological horror story about obsession, rejection and self-hatred. It was developed as an experiment, to answer the question: 'can you make dread a place?'. It is inspired by titles such as P.T. and indie developer Kittyhorrorshow's game Anatomy. It also draws inspiration from Davey Wreden's The Beginner's Guide. The retro, low-res aesthetic of the game is inspired by the work of Finnish indie developer 98DEMAKE, who was kind enough to get in touch during development.

name: RocketBird Classic
summary: Strap on your space suit, grab your crank, and get ready for the challenge of RocketBird!

name: Rocky Stairs
summary: Third person endless runner for the Playdate console.

name: Rounds of Reckoning
summary: Slay Zombies, Survive the rounds and Succeed with a high Score!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Epic Egypt
summary: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Egyptian themed tables with a unique aesthetic!

name: Robot Revolt
summary: Shoot, steer and survive as an armored vehicle versus a rebellious swarm of robots in this reverse bullet hell. Choose from a diverse collection of items and weapons, each with their own upgrade path. Clear abandoned factories to earn traits and make unique builds.

name: Roller Katz: BF - Episode 1
summary:
Skate, jump, shoot and destroy!
Welcome to Clean City, a futuristic city that lives under the threat of Sergeant Rocco.

name: Roof Jump Stunt Driver
summary: Perform amazing tricks driving at high speed high above the ground! Show your car driving skills and astonish the spectators!

name: Rock Rush
summary: In a world of Rock, Paper, and Scissors. One dumb rock decides to break the cycle, with the power of drugs and guns.

name: Rogue Ship
summary: Blast aliens, collect upgrades, and survive long enough to make it out in this sci-fi mashup of "Asteroid" and "Vampire Survivors".

name: Rougle
summary: Rougle is the classic game of Wordle with a mix of rogue-like elements, that increases in difficulty as you succeed. As you play, you will gain abilities that will increase your chances of finding the word while the difficulty increases and you challenge enemies that will attempt to stop you.

name: R.O.O.T.
summary: This story is about a corporation named RavenTech, set in the near future. R.O.O.T.

name: Room Escape: Scary Horror Game
summary:
Room Escape: Scary Horror Game - start your creepy adventure in one of the best escape games and scary horror games and be the first to solve all the mysteries and riddles of the new escape game! The deadly horror survival games for offline escape.
Looking for a brand-new horror escape game? Like to compete with horrifying 50 rooms? Halloween escape has got you covered! Join us to enjoy the best-haunted house escape online for free！
The Dark Night Mystery - Find ways to solve mystery puzzles to the escape room plan
Explore the horror hospital, find hidden clues, solve terrifying puzzles, open locks to doors and advance your investigation. The goosebumps game is a mixture of Halloween and scary escape quests.
If you like horror games and creepy adventure experiences – fear room xscape is the game for you!

name: Rooms of Dread
summary: Rooms of Dread sweeper game is a new take on classic mine or miner gameplay. Easy to pick up and play. No need to learn complex mechanics. However, mastering the game will require some serious skill.

name: Rock on: A SongPop Adventure
summary:
Crank up the volume and join the band - it’s time to ROCK ON! Quiz yourself on the best of Rock in this spin-off of SongPop, the award-winning music trivia game.
Embark on an adventure through the world of Rock ‘n’ Roll! Listen to clips of Rock hits and guess the correct artist or song. Shred your way through Classic Rock, Heavy Metal, Punk Rock, Pop Rock, Indie Rock, and more. Master each level and become a Rock Legend!

name: Round Space
summary:
"Round Space" is a fresh and original sci-fi style arcade.
Warning: If you are not a good pilot, you may feel dizzy.
Flying around an damaged planet, collect stars and avoid obstacles.
Include endless mode and 100 levels mode.
When you are playing, you will get coins to unlock more fighters or continue games.

name: Rope Apple Golf
summary:
It's a new golf game where you hit the target.
Of course, it also includes the traditional way of putting the ball into the hole.
It is not easy to hit a moving target.

name: Rope Basketball
summary:
This game is for those who want to throw the ball endlessly into the basketball hoop.
If you score 31 goals in a row, you can move to the next level.
Let's go to the new world of basketball.

name: Rocco's Island: Pocket Edition
summary:
Join Evelyn on her quest to save a mysterious island in a puzzle-based atmospheric adventure with a story that spans across 30,000 years of time. Interact with fantastic characters to learn past secrets and transform the Four Elements’ kingdoms, leading up to an epic finale with shocking reveals.
It is YOU who triggered the end of days!
An angst-ridden teenager's innocent mistake becomes a race against time that could change the course of history. Against the backdrop of a mysterious island inhabited by strange characters, our protagonist must undo her mistake to save everyone.
Engage the Island's denizens at your risk!
You wake up on an unfamiliar island that is fantastical as it is unsettling, only to realize that you are now responsible for the lives of every one of its denizens. The denizens themselves vary in temperament as much as their looks, and your only hope of saving them is to interact at your own risk!
Connect the Secrets of the past with the present
The journey is as much about one's own past and self-discovery as it is about handling the present. With more knowledge gained the stakes are raised higher and the depths you must explore increases in both breadth and complexity.
Rocco's Island is best enjoyed with a good pair of headphones.

name: Rocket Science
summary: Take part in a space program. Design spacecrafts and send them off to explore the vast expanses of space. Experience the real scale of the Solar system and the size of its celestial bodies.

name: Rogue Blaster
summary: Rogue Blaster is a shooting game that adds a twist to the FPS genre by adapting some rogue-lite aspects. The planet you crash-landed on is teeming with monsters! Use different equipment and items to survive the attacks until your ship is ready to leave.

name: Roboto
summary: In Roboto you take full control of the character to navigate crazy platform jumps and shoot off of skatepark ramps. Silky smooth thumbstick and button controls. 2 ways to play - choose either Joystick or L/R buttons.

name: Rox Fling
summary:
'Rox Fling' is the ultimate physics based 'fling em up.' Rag-doll your way to victory and beat your friends!
Help Rox, hapless hero, recover all the stolen presents from the mischievous dinosaurs. Throw yourself across the tundra and bounce off dinosaurs in your wake!

name: Robot Planet
summary: A World Builder adventure set in the far future, where humans have been replaced by robots.

name: Roots
summary: Roots is a mod about discovering the natural, wild magic of the world. There are points where the Fey world can bleed over into our world, and these can be taken advantage of for crafting, rituals, spells, and maybe even more!

name: Rope Bowling
summary: Ready to mix physics with gravity? We are glad to present you Rope Bowling...

name: Robot Clash Run
summary:
Run, dash and clash with robots and drones in Robot Clash Run! Sprint through a unique, fun, fast and challenging endless runner with endless colorful slopes, twists, turns and tunnels.
Jump, kick, fly and switch lanes as you run through fun arcade-style levels, catching as many burgers, fries and pizzas as you can! The more you grab, the more points you earn! Test your reflexes in this addicting platformer that leaves you running back for more.
Clash and defend Earth from a Clan of Evil Robots and Drones as you run, jump and kick them off every platform, even in the sky! Sound easy? Dodge hundreds of obstacles and see how far you can run!

name: Rock Hero: Guitar Legend
summary:
You love music? You love Guitar Hero game?
You love Rock Band game?
You will love this tap tap music rhythm game.
A fun way to play with your music.

name: Rogue Planet 1: Consolidation
summary: A standalone expansion to the original game, set 2 years after the original. The climactic finale and final chapter of the first game. Your interpetation of the truth will affect the world around you, and more importantly, the people living in it. Be careful. Imaginations can be powerful things...

name: Rocket Road
summary:
Dodge your way through traffic with blasting speed! Put to the test your dexterity as reflex is everything to avoid crashing. Travel and discover all the different roads. How far will you get?
You can now play Rocket Road on Bet4Fun against your Friends! Click on the Bet4Fun button in the Main Menu and challenge your friends and players from all over the world.

name: Rogue Planet 1
summary: Rogue Planet is a short action horror FPS game based on the Mayan Phenomenon of 2012. Made over the course of 3 years as my first game using GameGuru. A personal passion project.

name: Rogue Station
summary: A space station builder simulation roguelite. Fight off enemy ships, fleets and rival stations, build and upgrade your station, hire and manage your crew. Survive as long as you can.

name: Road 96: Mile 0
summary: The prequel to Road 96. Play Zoe and Kaito where it all started. Challenge your beliefs!

name: Rocket Jumper
summary: The only thing that can move in a limited movement environment is the recoil of the gun.

name: Roto16
summary: Roto16 is a 21st century update to the age old 15 puzzle. Rather than shifting pieces to an empty spot, instead choose a corner where 4 tiles meet and rotate around that point.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Vibrant Valentine
summary: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Valentine's Day themed table with 2 controllable cannons and massive flippers!.

name: Rogue Racing: PinkSlip
summary:
Street Racing. Custom Cars. Rogue Attitude
Get ready for a 100% personalized mobile racing experience! Create the ultimate, custom racing rig with over 50 different aftermarket parts and style options.Competie in pulse-pounding, winner-take-all events on gritty, inner-city streets.

name: Rockman 2 de Ippatsu Neta
summary: A Mega Man 2 fangame in which you fight all 8 robot masters simultaneously.

name: Rogue Cube Defense
summary: Rogue Cube Defense is a roguelite tower defense game with procedurally generated path that you make choices on. As you level up, the upgrades you choose will determine whether you've got what it takes to protect the cube.

name: Roy's Bizarre Adventure
summary: In May of 2015, Something Awful user Vilkacis would do a let's play thread of Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade, albeit with a twist. Vilkacis had some degree of experience with hacking Fire Emblem games and would make changes to the game such as making Noah a dark mage with the portrait of a Phantasy Star character, giving Ogier a speed growth that's over 100%, and making Zephiel one of the most overtuned boss fights in the series. Roy's Bizarre Adventure is the final version of this hack that was released in the thread's final update.

name: Roterra 4: Magical Revolution
summary: Games presents the newest member of the Roterra family: Roterra 4: Magical Revolution. This new installment of the chart-topping series offers 35 levels of all new hand-built puzzles that intensify the perspective challenging journey through this fairytale world of gravity twists, scrambled paths and rotating blocks. 70+ unique puzzles await the player as they travel through mysterious lava-filled caves, explore icy extremes and devastating deserts, and interact with the world of Roterra in new ways.

name: Row of Numbers
summary: Learn the numerical order with us and our green centipede. Best game for your pre-school kid to learn the order of the numbers.

name: Rollercoin
summary: RollerCoin is an online, virtual bitcoin mining game where you compete against your friends to mine bitcoins. It takes the concept of bitcoin mining, but instead of the sophisticated Blockchain and processing algorithms, RollerCoin lets you test your skills, complete missions, undertake tasks, and play games to build your mining empire.

name: Rockman Dash 2: Episode 1 - Roll-chan Kiki Ippatsu! no Maki
summary: Included with the release of Tron ni Kobun, this game is a technical demo that serves as a prelude to Rockman Dash 2: Episode 2 - Ooinaru Isan (Mega Man Legends 2). These four missions precede the events of Episode 2, which made up the entirety of Mega Man Legends 2 for versions outside of Japan, though they are mentioned in the later game's dialogue.

name: Road Rush Racer
summary: Ignore all speed limits and traffic rules! In this furious racing game you drive with top speed through heavy traffic and try to get as far as possible, if you collide with another car the rad trip is over! Let the asphalt burn and climb the Leaderboard!

name: Roadkill Raceway
summary: In the not so distant future... the power of animal rights organizations has increased 10 fold. All animals are considered to have human level rights with one exception - getting in the way of a public service vehicle is not covered.

name: Root Bear
summary: You are the Root Bear serving bears their root beer. They're extremely picky on their pour, but they pay well. Go on, Root Bear. Achieve the Perfect Pour.

name: RoverCraft Space Racing
summary:
RoverCraft is an exciting arcade journey, played on the hills of distant planets on a rover constructed by you. Since you design your vehicle, its success depends on YOU!!
Equip your vehicle with jet engines, reactors, super-wheels and plenty of other upgrades and take the challenge of climbing the steep mountains of exotic planets. Drive your monster rover carefully – there are many dangers ahead. You might run out of fuel, meet a steep and rugged slope, your vehicle may lose its wheels, or your pilot may get a tear in his space suit.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Christmas Carnage
summary: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Christmas themed table with an emphasis on drop targets.

name: Rock Simulator 2
summary: Rock Simulator 2 is a multiplayer, meditative idle game with many secrets to uncover. Begin your journey in the rocky tundra to relax and earn stones to unlock rocks, environments, ambients, or weather presets!

name: Roman Empire vs. Barbarians
summary: Barbarians keep expanding all over the place and you’ve been summoned as the hero who’s going to stop them. You’re provided with a Roman Empire tower that comes with a powerful catapult and a team of warriors. Will that be enough to stop the barbarian invasion?

name: Rogue Tank
summary: Rogue Tank is a chaotic 3D tank shooter with rogue-lite elements. — Shoot, zap, burn and crash through waves of elite enemies. Enhance your tank by creating deadly combinations of upgrades and become a force of mass destruction!

name: Royal Affairs
summary: At your exclusive boarding school, will you rule the roost or be a royal disaster? Court publicity, sway the fate of nations, and find love!

name: Robot Room Cleaner
summary: Robot Room Cleaner is a satisfying and fun robot vacuum simulator game

name: Robot Programmer
summary: Uncover your hidden programming talent! Code your own robots with simple instructions to explore 40+ logical based puzzles.

name: Robot Tormod
summary: You may think that this is nonsense, but the more I talk, the better you will be able to understand me.

name: Rooster Tale
summary: Become a hero rooster and rescue the kidnapped chickens in this fast-paced 2D platformer game! Use your skills and quick reflexes to defeat robot enemies and navigate colorful, retro-inspired levels. Can you outsmart the cunning fox and save the day? Play now and find out!

name: Rose
summary: Sacrifice your flesh and blood for new weapons and abilities. Slaughter waves of monstrous enemies and titanic bosses in procedurally changing arenas or die trying, upgrade your abilities and return to the fight ever stronger!

name: Rolando: Deluxe Edition
summary: Roll, bounce and blast your squad of Rolandos across the Rolando Kingdom in this charming and delightful puzzle platformer

name: Road Domination
summary: A casual action game. Player drives around a city, capturing streets and districts, avoiding police cars, and using traps to get away. When all areas are seized, the player captures the neighbourhood and wins current level.

name: Robbie's Tale
summary: An action-packed turn-based RPG. Every decision you make shapes the world around you. 24 Playable classes! Unique crafting system. Test your might in the monster arena! A rich and driven story that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

name: Rotatex 3
summary: Solve puzzles, rotate the level and guide the Cat to the teleport.

name: Rogue Valley
summary: Immerse in a classic 90's rogue-like adventure with friends in Rogue Valley, a MMO rogue-like experience!

name: Rolling Rapids
summary:
Take a crazy ride down the most adventurous river the App Store has to offer.
Roll, duck and jump your way out of incredible and ferocious obstacles like snapping crocodiles, polar bears, fishermen, piranhas and snakes!
Collect golden rubies to unlock and ride with the pirate ship, surfer dude, blue whale, jet ski, swimmer, dolphin, cruise ship, dragon and more!

name: Royale Battle: Warzone
summary: Royale Battle: Warzone is a Near-Future Sci-Fi Battle Royale game set in the heart of the city. Play either solo, duos or squads and be the last to survive the Battle Royale

name: Rocky Towers: Puzzle Defense
summary: Alright, so, no pressure but… without your help, the Light is doomed. The Void has been chasing us for the last few centuries, but the situation is dire. Only a few of us Ligthspawn remain, and we ask your help now! In order to evacuate the towers, we will need you to remove bricks to create a safe passage for the young Lightspawn. Defend them against the Void! Don’t worry, we’re here to help, take 4 of us heroes on the adventure and charge our special powers to delay the inevitable doom.

name: Roadfix Rush
summary:
Roadfix Rush is an addictive arcade-style game in which you will have to fix potholes by tapping or sliding your fingers on the screen to avoid cars being crashed.
Being focused and really quick movements will be necessary to achieve the highest score in world-wide leaderboards.

name: Rootman: Bodycam Horror Footage
summary: Realistic first person bodycam horror. On October 26, 2005, a policeman from the 46th department disappeared in the forest. The found footage from his body camera showed how evil it is in the forests.

name: Ro
summary: In this adventure, Ro has to run away from many monsters who will attack him. He must jump very skillfully to not fall into the abyss, without using guns or swords, cause Rodrigo is a different hero, a peaceful hero. The only option is dodging the enemy instead of facing it.

name: Rotten Apple
summary: Rotten Apple is a Co-op Zombie-Shooter that lets you dive into a post-apocalyptic New York. Enter the Quarantine Zone with up to 3 friends to defeat the ever-growing zombie horde, secure critical research data and get out again in one piece. Challenge yourselves in the story or wave-shooter modes.

name: Rogue, Rogue, Baby!
summary: Rogue, Rogue, Baby! is a fun, frenetic and feel good roguelite. Grab a change of diapers and head out on an adventure!

name: Roll Freak
summary: Drag to move, hold to stop, charge to sprint. In danger, hold nearby hackable machines to make a way out.

name: Rose in the Embers
summary:
Rose in the Embers is an otome game by Voltage Inc.

It is available on Google Play and iTunes via the Love 365 app.

name: Romance MD: Always on Call
summary: Romance MD: Always On Call is a medical-themed game and its main stories are Love Choices.

name: Road Rage 3D
summary: Road Rage 3D is an endless racing game that takes you on a high-speed journey. With the help of various powerups, and a selection of unlockable cars including a Taxi, Police Car, Schoolbus and Limousine.

name: Rock the Goat
summary:
Meet Barry, the goat who was born to balance!
Rock your way from the depths of the jungle, to a cyber-city, through space (not time), dressed as characters like Scubarry, Barry-Bot 3000, Private Barry & many more! Help him tiptoe, hop and slide as he collects coins to unlock his alter egos and their exotic locations.
How long can you Rock The Goat?

name: Roots of Rebirth
summary: At the heart of an underground world, take control of a Slider to help ISA deploy her roots to reconnect with her past and escape from the planet where she is trapped.

name: Rogue Realms
summary: Rogue Realms is an empire building game in which you place tiles to expand the world and build on those tiles to gather the resources you need. Rogue Realms features full 3D pixel world to explore from any angle. Explore new biomes and buildings to grow an empire to stand the test of time.

name: Rocket Angels Inc
summary: Rocket Angels Inc is a fast-paced arena shooter utilizing a grapple hook focused movement system. Gracefully move around the map and knock your opponents out of the arena using explosive based weapons or perform executions while they are stunned to guarantee victory.

name: Road Trip USA 2: West - Collector's Edition
summary: This time, explore beautiful locations spanning the Western states as you hunt for hidden objects. Hidden Object enthusiasts will rejoice with over 2,200 objects to locate across multiple game modes and beautiful hi-resolution scenes! For a change of pace, test your puzzle solving skills against a fun selection of 8 mini games! Don’t miss this trip of a lifetime!

name: Rottenwood Lake
summary: This game was crafted with love in a weekend for the Haunted PS1 game jam.

name: Robocock
summary: Far future. All maral principles have been erased, complete debauchery and chaos are happening on the streets. An unknown company creates an advanced robot to fight depravity and lust in the name of family values.

name: Roche Limit: The Death of CMK
summary:
Roche Limit: The Death of CMK is a horror-surrealist style PowerPoint game made over the course of eight months. It features over 1,500 slides and 80+ unique hand drawn scenes.
The game is a follow-up to the developer's 2019 project The EdCo Incident.

2 additional endings where planned for and worked on as a possible update for the game but have been dropped in favor of a new game that continues the themes with a new story.
An OST for the cut ending scenes was released with interludes and titles, ending 2's title was The Golden Age and ending 3's title was Depi Lontan.

name: Royal Romances: Forbidden Magic - Collector's Edition
summary: Is it possible to overcome obstacles through hope or faith in love? Lead your valiant heroes through the thorny path to their most cherished desires and find out!

name: Rooms of Doom
summary: The most exciting collection of mini games known to Man! Crafted by the evil scientist Dr. Doom.

name: Romancelvania: Deluxe Edition
summary: Bite into Romancelvania, a darkly comic genre mashup, combining side-scrolling action and tongue-in-cheek romance into one completely absurd and unforgettable adventure. Launching March 7!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: St. Patrick's Paradise
summary: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! St. Patrick's Day themed table with a controllable cannon!

name: Roxy's Windows
summary:
What's going on with Roxy?

Sift and sort your way through Roxy's cluttered desktop to uncover the truth! Roxy's Windows is an interactive story based game where you're free to take things at your own pace; learn more about Roxy and her friends through the files on her computer, organizing them as you please.

Created as a part of Stepford's Mobile Game Jam on Newgrounds, this game can be played entirely with touch controls on your mobile device (or left clicking with the mouse if you're on a computer) If you spend enough time exploring, you might even be rewarded for your efforts!

name: Rolly Hills
summary:
Ready, Set, roll!
Play as numerous adorable characters.
Help them traverse through beautiful, lovingly crafted environments. Don't let them fall off!

name: Roll-a-word
summary: Following the success of LETRIS, we now present Roll-A-Word in which you can take part in exciting knock-out tournaments. It consists of 5 rounds in which 2 ships compete with each other and you have only 6 letters to combine and form words to make your ship move faster. Its simple but extremely addictive.

name: Royal Jigsaw 3
summary: New King size jigsaw! There are more excellent images this time - 1000 puzzles for you! Each image is still in high quality.

name: Rocket League: Season 10
summary:
It's time to unwind

Lost long ago in the shifting sands of Deadeye Canyon sat a secret treasure, undisturbed by the passing of time… until recently. Shocked explorers stumbled upon this unspoiled sanctuary, marveling at a time capsule of exotic wildlife and botanical wonders. Woken by an ancient spell, it appears the desert's heart has begun to beat once more.

Season 10 invites you to shift into neutral while you rest, relax, and collect a bounty of Items! Enjoy a peaceful Rocket Pass, explore a new Oasis Arena Variant, and take the legendary Volkswagen Golf II GTI for a spin.

Season 10 starts Wednesday, March 8!

name: Road Story
summary: Control cars to avoid crashes and become crossroads operator. Gain experience and level up to unlock new powerful bonus cars and new crossroads, complete missions, develop talents and acquire helpful items to progress.

name: Rock Crawler
summary: Can you imagine a truck that climbs on rocks better and faster than humans? Meet Rock Crawler! This game pretty much resembles a real rock crawling: very precise throttle control is required to conquer some peaks. These big soft wheels allow you to climb on craggy rocks and perform terrific stunts!

name: Robo Frenzy
summary: Build and battle in Robo Frenzy! Create dozens of weapons and construct inventions to crush gigantic gadgets in a sandbox action game that blends crafting with combat.

name: Road Accident With Dangerous Goods VR Training
summary: Train your professional skills in Road Accident With Dangerous Goods VR Training safely and in full correspondence with international standards!

name: Rocket Control
summary: This game is an extremely simple 2D action game where you launch, control, and land rockets. The rules are simple: ascend to an altitude of 1000 meters, start the descent, and then land back at the original launchpad.

name: Romantic Shooter
summary: Romantic Shooter is an erotic shmup game where you'll be able to destroy the girls clothes!

name: RoboCop
summary: Game Boy Advance port of RoboCop.

name: Rocketbirds: Revolution!
summary: Rocketbirds: Revolultion! is a 2D cinematic action-adventure puzzler game made in flash, developed by Ratloop Asia. It features rich visuals and classic 2D gameplay. Players take control of Hardboiled Chicken in a world filled with angry and often violent birds.

name: Rogue-Fp
summary: A blend of old school gameplay and new school controls. Experience a classically styled roguelike in a way you never have before! In first person!

name: Robot Lawn Mower
summary: Step into the exciting world of robotics with this satisfying robot grass cutting game

name: Rocket Space Ship Frontier
summary:
Rocket Space-Ship Frontier is a unique rocket game suitable for all ages! It is one of the best one-tap games you can find!
Can you hear the engine running? Get ready for a party from outer space! Take a step outside of Earth and begin to play!

name: Roots Need Control 3.0
summary:
A coalition of large corporations trying to destroy the root flowers is invading Daejeon. Protect the root flowers. It's not going to be easy.

because... Roots Need Control.

The length of the root changes the number of enemies produced and the speed of the enemy and CrossHair. Make your roots at least short!

Over time, persistent and threatening enemies appear. It's destroyed at once, but once hit, it's fatal. Get rid of your enemies quickly!

Avoid red rain at the top, and avoid missiles by adjusting the length of the roots at the bottom.

Through the 2-player mode, one person protects the roots, and one person defeats the enemies!

name: Rolling with Katamari
summary:
Rolling With Katamari was an official, early mobile Katamari game from Namco Network. It has the style of a pseuedo retro game.

The game featured 30 stages with presents to collect and multiple achievements to earn.

name: Role Model AI
summary: Rolemodel.AI is a platform for creating personalized AI avatars that enhance personal growth and productivity. Customizable avatars can be experts in various fields, including game development and nutrition. The platform uses cutting-edge technology to revolutionize our interaction with technology.

name: Root: The Underworld Expansion
summary: Conquer new battlefields as you journey into the Underworld of Root!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Easter Extravaganza
summary: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Easter themed table with mobile bunny targets.

name: Road 96: Mile 0 - Full Journey Bundle
summary: The Road 96: Mile 0 - Full Journey Bundle contains the critically acclaimed Road 96 and its prequel Road 96: Mile 0.

name: Rogue Hex
summary: Play your cards right to conquer the world in the Roguelite 4x. Explore mysterious lands, survive against the barbarian horde, and grow your stone age empire into the stars!

name: Robot Ponkottsu: Moon Version
summary: Robot Ponkottsu: Moon Version is a Role-Playing game, published by Hudson, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Roland Garros French Open 2002
summary: Roland Garros French Open 2002 is a tennis game developed by Caparace. The player can choose between 10 different players to play in 4 tournaments that includes Roland Garros and the US Open.

name: Robopost
summary: Enemy cyborgs have surrounded the planet and are trying to destroy everyone. You need to free the planet from enemies by capturing territories and fighting off cyborgs.

name: Round Trip
summary: Round Trip is a platform video game where you'll have to keep your balance and be very precise with your movements to complete the challenges present in each level.

name: Roots of Tomorrow: Urban Agriculture
summary: The urban agriculture scenario is a paid DLC of Roots of Tomorrow. It takes place in the Ile-de-France region, and its goal is to show the diversity of urban agriculture. Your goal: 10 years to "turn the city green".

name: Royal Razzle
summary: A match 3 puzzle adventure set in a whimsical medieval world of candy and princesses. Return to a simpler time when match 3 puzzle games were actually fun and didn't have advertising and in-app purchases.

name: Rogues Don't Cry
summary: Rogues Don't Cry is a mix of roguelike and strategy game. Choose your hero, build an army, explore and fight enemies in a harsh procedurally generated world, with semi permadeath and a strong final boss.

name: Rolling Revolt
summary: In the futuristic city of Nuevo Domingo, experience the tale of Ariadna's revenge as you skate, swing, and bash your way through the ranks of the evil Servos Corporation.

name: Rootown
summary: Plant trees, spread your roots and explore the underground in this cute and relaxing small-town sim!

name: Ropu Barastu No X
summary: Blast bullet hell baddies to build up combo, pull out your Ropu Barastu Beam and make panties drop. Impress these girls with score to score. What are you waiting for? Worried you wont have a big enough score?

name: Robin Morningwood Adventure: Attack of the Gay Clones
summary: Welcome to the "Happy Ending"! A park located on a tropical island where men, orcs, but also woofians like to come to relax... Or at least they used to.

name: Rome: The Mystery of the Chronovisor
summary: Solve the mystery of the enigmatic time machine! In this Hidden Object Adventure game you will go for a walk around Rome to search for the secret of the Chronovisor and save the heroes who have fallen into a trap. You will make unbelievable discoveries on your way!

name: Roll It to the End
summary: Roll It to the End is an addictive puzzle game where the objective is to reach the end by matching the number at the bottom of the dice with the number from the end point. Special platforms will trigger different events. With the builder you can create and share your own levels with other players.

name: Rolling Fur: A Cat Puzzle Adventure
summary: This is the story of a cube-shaped cat, rolling around, face planting and solving puzzles. Help the cat find the way back home.

name: Rocket Jockey
summary: Futuristic cowboy straddles a rocket attempting to lasso various robo-cattle. The lasso gains power as it glowa brighter, but gets dimmer and losses power as the bad guys shoot and hit.

name: Robbie and the Robots
summary:
Robbie Robot is the fifty first game of the NES version of Action 52.

You play as Robbie as you are shooting other robots with guns or finger missiles and try not to have the enemies shoot you, because if they do, you die.

At the first level, the player can just constantly go straight ahead, constantly shooting. But at the next levels, gaps appear, so the passage becomes much more difficult.

name: Routine Checkup
summary: A first-person murder mystery horror game. Explore a creepy dentist's office and try to identify a corpse by collecting the victim's missing teeth.

name: Rockman 3: The Last of Mushroom Kingdom?!
summary: The world of the Mushroom Kingdom is invaded by Dr. Wily with his army of robots. Mario is not around when Dr. Wily took over the Mushroom Kingdom, so Princess Peach can only depend, this time, on Rockman to stop Dr. Wily from his world domination delusions!

name: Rockman 4: Burst Chaser X Air Sliding
summary:
Rockman 4 - Burst Chaser X Air Sliding is a romhack that combines two unique concepts from 2 different Rockman hacks. Burst Chaser, where Rockman moves fast with farther jumping distance. And Air Sliding, where Rockman can slide in mid-air.

Rockman 4 BCAS also features new music, level designs & modified enemy & Robot Master AIs, as well as new weapons.

name: Roblox 64
summary: A low effort meme hack of Super Mario 64 based on Roblox.

name: RollerBall
summary: Roll the ball, collect the crystals, avoid obstacles. Don't fall.

name: Road to Salvation
summary: Road To Salvation is a stylized action adventure game. This is where the world is ruined. Your daughter, who was the only thing that connects you to this difficult life, has been kidnapped. Fight to save, do you have the courage to negotiate? You may even have to die. Can you do these?

name: Roads of Rome: Portals 2 - Collector's Edition
summary: Another adventure of Romans who lost in the mysterious portals while searching the way home.

name: Rolling Cube
summary: A clone of the Flash game Bloxorz.

name: Royal Diamonds
summary: Variant of Brains Diamonds.

name: Rootin' Tootin' Lootin' & Shootin'
summary: Rootin' Tootin' Lootin' & Shootin' is a unique fusion of traditional turn-based roguelikes and twin-stick shooters. A fast-paced take on strategy games where you dodge deadly bullet patterns and kill enemies for their money - all at your own pace

name: Robots: Invaders
summary: Robots: Invaders is a first-person 3D adventure game. You wake up early in the morning and realize that the robots no longer obey you, they were attacked by a virus. Alien forces have taken over their minds. Grab your weapons and fight back the invaders!

name: Roach Invasion
summary: You are about the same size as a cockroach, and you must use every means at your disposal to destroy the massive numbers of "Gs" that are crawling on the ground, on the walls, and even falling from the ceiling.

name: RoboSquad Revolution
summary: Welcome to the Revolution, where you are an insurgent robot marching to the beat of your own motherboard in the name of rebellion. Level up your components and rewrite the future of AI, one Hologram Throwdown at a time. Well what are you waiting for, metalhead? Join a squad for free today!

name: Rocman X
summary: Rocman X (洛克人X) (also known as Thunder Blast Man) is an unlicensed game created by Sachen, released on the Famicom and NES sometime in the 90's and also sometime later for the Game Boy Color. The NES and English Game Boy Color versions were released as Thunder Blast Man, the Chinese version of the GBC game released as 洛克人X金 (Rockman X Gold), and one of the NES versions' label calls it Thunder Blaster Man.

name: Rocky
summary: Step into the ring with your favorite epic characters from the ROCKY film franchise, including Rocky Balboa, Apollo Creed, Clubber Lang, Ivan Drago, Tommy Gunn, and Mason Dixon! Challenge real players worldwide as you fight your way to the top!

name: Rocket Jump Frenzy
summary: Rocket Jump Frenzy is a punishing game where you need to climb a mountain using a rocket launcher.

name: Roma Incognita
summary: Roma Incognita is a thrilling stealth tactics game. Sneak your way through cities, country villas, and enemy camps hidden in the woods, setting traps, and avoiding detection. With a team of specialists and countless ways to overcome any obstacle, the choice is yours.

name: Rogue with the Dead
summary: Rogue with the Dead is an original roguelike RPG where you command and power up troops on an endless, looping journey. What kills you makes you stronger.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Space Spectacular
summary: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Space themed tables that will take you on a journey through time!

name: Roll With it!
summary: Roll into action as you take the roll of a rolling ball that's trying to make it's way through the world on a journey of discovery! finish levels, gain coins, unlock skins, and just Roll With It!

name: Rocket Swing
summary: Swing the rocket to the right direction to not hit the barriers or the stars. Fly the highest as you can.

name: Robots
summary: Save Robot-kind from being turned into scrap metal! Play as Rodney Copperbottom and join his outrageous mechanical pals, the Rusties, as they try to foil Ratchet's evil plan! All the humorous characters and non-stop action of Robots The Movie come to life in this immersive game.

name: Rolling Toolman
summary: You are Toolman inside ball. Roll and try to reach goal as soon as you can and avoid falling from map and beware obstacles

name: Roguebot
summary: Fast-paced Roguelike shooter in a dystopian steampunk future.

name: Rooftop Mischief
summary: Play as Billy in an arcade action packed experience featuring fast paced gameplay, crazy characters and insane power ups. Complete achievements, collect all the stickers and play through an endless mode, challenge mode and 3 Fun Mini Games to become the Ultimate Master of Mischief!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Mancala Madness
summary: When a Voodoo Priestess seeks vengeance upon the world, it is up to one Raccoon to stop her! Learn the basics & master the tactics of the classic board game as you prove, once and for all, that you are the true Mancala champion!

name: Rosetta
summary:
After waking up in a basement and exploring you find a mask of a woman named Rosetta, you will fall for her beauty. Explore the different options of the same conversation and get to know of both of your stories, together.

Rosetta is only 15 minutes long and contains graphic images nudity and explicit language.

name: Rogue Labyrinth
summary: Fight through the ranks in a monster-filled labyrinth created by an egocentric billionaire colonist. Make friends (or enemies) with rivals, employees, fans, and monsters to improve your abilities. The crowd wants a show, so hype them up in this rogue-lite narrative adventure!

name: Roald Dahl's Twit or Miss
summary:
Every time Mr Twit eats, foulsome food flies towards Mrs Twit who is trying to sleep. Score by stopping the mouldy morsels hitting her. But watch out because if she wakes up she'll whack Mr Twit with her stick and then it's game over!
Psssst … here are a few tips to become a top twit!

name: Robolt
summary: Run fast and shoot faster as a little robot with a ton of firepower!

name: Roamaor
summary:
In Roamaor, the challenge is to combine characters into words.
The words of the puzzles are from poetry. You can feel the rhyme of poetry while solving the puzzles.
There are various kinds of monsters and obstacles blocking your way, so the strategy is crucial.

name: Roots
summary: Roots is a single-player, 3D narrative adventure that navigates the depths of fear and self-doubt.

name: Rose From The Depths
summary: A visual novel about the recovery of a woman traumatized by an abusive relationship.

name: Robot Dir
summary: Little Robot DIR had been on standby for years when a loving family of hedgehogs adopted him, but now his family has been captured and he needs your help to rescue them!

name: Root Connections
summary: Digging deep into the root of his world, you play as the hallucinations of a man struggling with psychotic depression. Puzzling your way through the darkness of alcoholism and the fear of losing loved ones, it is up to you to root connect this man’s life back together again!

name: RogueStone 2: Open World
summary: Experience the Ultimate Role-Playing Game with RogueStone 2: Open World. Explore the depths of the Core, uncover the secrets of the Gurus, and discover the 9 Meta Orbs to become the Master of this world. Will you overcome the challenges and vanquish the Consuming Darkness?

name: Root Down
summary: An original digital abstract strategy board game.

name: Romp of Dump
summary: Visual Novel with Live2D Animation, Observing Scum Prisoners! In a prison called a dump, a betting card game among dangerous prisoners begins. Penalty game for the losers! Uncover the hidden pasts and bizarre crimes of these lunatics!

name: Round People
summary: "Round People" is a local multiplayer game where up to four players can battle it out on a trap-filled pool table. Strategy and action are key in this game.

name: Rock Band Sessions
summary: Rock Band Sessions was a cancelled entry in the Rock Band series that was intended to be a sequel to Rock Band 3, however was scrapped during development. The game would've had a focus on the composition of music. Gameplay of the cancelled game was later shown off by IGN on May 12, 2015.

name: Rock Band: Japan
summary: Rock Band: Japan is a cancelled spinoff game in the Rock Band series. The game was intended to feature various songs from Japanese artists, alongside some Western songs. The game was cancelled due to licensing difficulties with Japanese songs and the cost of manufacturing the controllers for a Japanese audience.

name: Roots of the Mind
summary: Brave the dangerous world of the small insects that suffered from the attack of the mind-bending roots.

name: RoboJesus
summary: RoboJesus is an AI chatbot that simulates what it would be like to talk to Jesus Christ. What will you ask him?

name: Roboden
summary: Roboden is an asymmetrical indirect control real-time strategy game about robot colonies.

name: Rose and Lotus: Petals of Memories
summary: [Rose and Lotus:Petals of Memories] is based on Korean traditional fairy tales 'Janghwa, Hongryeon'.The main character, Rose, awake from the cold floor without her memory.Find the truth behind the dark mansion and get out of it with your sister Lotus.

name: RoundRick: Brick Breaker
summary:
Round Rick: Brick Breaker game takes on the gameplay mechanic of the classic arcade hits Super Breakout or Arkanoid games while, at the same time, injects new features, mechanics and elements which will revolutionise the standard of arcade brick breaker games.

Swipe the screen to draw a line to let the marble bounce. Don't let the marble fall down our of the screen. Remember to swipe and draw!

name: Rompechanchitos
summary: Rompechanchitos (lit. "piggy bank breaker") is an interactive guide about the current pension system in Chile (as of 2021) and its consequences.

name: Rocket Crane
summary:
Rockets are cool...
Cranes are cool...
How about a Rocket powered Crane?...Bring it on!
Master the art of flying a Rocket Crane, then use your skill to solve complex construction puzzles.

name: Roly Poly Putt
summary:
Platforming meets mini-golf in this wacky physics-based 3D platformer. You control Roly Poly through a myriad of levels spanning diverse landscapes in a game of miniature golf…except YOU are the ball!
Maneuver around tight corners, jump over treacherous pits, zip through dark tunnels, and other obstacles by tilting your device to each side. Your goal is to get to the flag at the end of each level with as few strokes as possible, but don’t forget to collect as many sugar cubes along the way as you can!

name: Roll the Dark Heart
summary: A creepy and dangerous world, no matter where your feet lead you, only fog awaits ahead, which seemingly mercilessly mocks the troubles of the still living and already dead creatures of this world, among which man is far from being at the top of the food chain.

name: Roober
summary: Roober is a worm who is looking for a way out of the jungle, your task is to help him find his way. The problem is, the jungle is a maze! Be careful: in the jungle, traps and moving platforms are waiting for you.

name: Ro Sham Bo Rush
summary:
Rock-Paper-Scissors, RoShamBo, Jan Ken … All these modern games are variations of the Chinese games introduced in the 17th century.
Never played Rock Paper Scissors before? No problem! It's easy! Rock crushes scissors; paper covers rock; scissors cuts paper.
Easy, right? But if it was so easy…

name: RockTop
summary: Rock Top VR game is an online gameplay that adds multiplayer chase to traditional VR climbing gameplay. In addition to conquering different terrains, players can also play different roles in multiplayer mode to obtain more gems

name: RollerCoaster Tycoon 8 pack
summary: RollerCoaster Tycoon 8 Pack is a compilation for the PC that features the games RollerCoaster Tycoon, Added Attractions, Loopy Landscapes, RollerCoaster Tycoon 2, Wacky Worlds, Time Twister, RollerCoaster Tycoon 3 and Wild!

name: Rocket League: Season 11
summary:
Perched high above the seaside, a group of drift cars in tuning mode wait for the signal. At the whistle, a chaotic descent begins, for a festival of tight skids on these perilous mountain roads. Below, cheers are heard: a delirious crowd admires its favorite pilots to boost to victory. This is what you should expect in Season 11.

We hope you are well, as the festivities will rage on throughout the season. Drift with the famous Nissan Silvia (S13), immerse yourself in a colorful Rocket Pass and celebrate the best soccar moments in the Estadio Vida arena.

So, ready to light the fire? Season 11 begins on June 7!

name: Roots Need Control 3.0: Roots Need Chungnam 8.7
summary: Protect the root flower. Something unexpected happens. Here in Chungcheongnam-do.

name: Rocket Chimp
summary:
Ham the chimp is about to embark on his first out-of-this-world adventure!
Control Ham's rocket ship using the accelerometer to avoid asteroids, comets, satellites and other space junk! Use your shield to blast through if you get into a bind!
But don't forget to collect fuel canisters or you'll be parachuting back to Earth.

name: Rope Racers
summary: SWING, RUN and RACE against other players across the world! Win high-speed races for great rewards. Collect all characters, race in awesome locations and be the best Rope Racer of all time!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Wicked Warfare
summary: 3 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Wild Western themed tables with a 50's and 60's style pinball inspiration.

name: RollerGirl
summary: A narrative adventure about a summer spent rollerblading in the mid-2000s. Explore a quiet town as Naomi, a teenage girl looking for an escape. Your in-game MP3 player isn't just for music; its playlist shapes the world & story as you run errands for quirky neighbours / get entangled in local drama.

name: RoboHunt
summary: RoboHunt - fast top-down action shooter where you have to destroy a lot of robots. You will have to uncover the secrets of abandoned robotics labs and find a way to escape from the planet.

name: Road Dealer Simulator
summary: Step into the shoes of a dishonest car dealer. Cheats customers by selling them damaged cars for a high price. In this mission, your loyal dog is invaluable in helping you repair everything that's broken and also deterring unhappy customers. Will you be able to become the king of car trading?

name: RoundRunners Playground
summary: Play tag-like gamemodes with a chance of random effects to happen. Roll, climb and bunnyhop to dodge fellow roundrunners as you’re trying not to get tagged. Face up against your friends or randoms in this easy-to-pick-up game. Make the map your playground.

name: Rogue Day
summary: Rogue Day is a open world city simulator in third person view where you play as a super hero. There are two cities to explore.

name: Route 13
summary: Get ready for a spine-chilling horror experience in "Route 13"! Stranded on a deserted desert highway at night, players must find a way to refuel their car and escape the terrors lurking in the shadows. With an immersive heart-pumping gameplay, can you survive the horrors of Route 13?

name: Robo Ret
summary: Robo Ret is a 2D action platformer game where the player takes on the role of a robot fighting against other robot bosses.The player's main weapon is a cannon arm, which they use to shoot at the enemy bosses. The goal of the game is to defeat all of the bosses.

name: Rotten Dinner
summary:
It's such a beautiful evening. Won't you share it with me over a lovely dinner?
What is the main course, my sweetheart? Oh, it's a secret...

name: Rockman 6: After Tournament
summary:
Sequel of Rockman6 Shadow Game? Recommend to use special weapons. About special weapons, see read [Weapons].

You have Rush adaptors and Beat from game’s start.

If you lose the game, you can go back 8 robot master’s stages even when you start Mr.X’s stage. And the progress of Mr.X and Dr.Wily’s stage is maintained.

name: Root Infinity Rexx: Limited Edition
summary:
Root Rexx, stylized as ROOT∞REXX, is an otome visual novel video game developed by Otomate, exclusively released for the PlayStation Vita by Idea Factory on January 22, 2015 in Japan. The game follows Mochizuki Kazune, a teenage girl who meets members of the fictional boy band Rexx.

The limited edition comes with a special booklet and exclusive drama CD.

name: Road Bustle 2
summary: "Road Bustle 2" is a lively casual game that immerses you in a world filled with bustling traffic and endless adventures. The challenge lies in delivering packages across busy roads teeming with vehicles and even trains. As the player, you can choose transport to aid your journey, each lending a unique twist to the gameplay. The game is designed with vibrant, eye-catching graphics that add a dash of charm to the chaos of the roads. It's not just about survival; the speed of traffic increases over time, pushing your agility to the limit. Along the way, collect food to boost your speed and score points, adding a layer of fun and strategy.

name: Royalevia
summary: The game takes place in a dark and spooky forest where the player takes on the role of a dark knight, who must move through the treacherous terrain and fight the hordes of the undead that have risen from the dead.

name: Roda a Roda
summary:
Roda a Roda is a fan-made web browser game developed by Games X based on the Brazilian version of Wheel of Fortune featuring Silvio Santos, where you guess letters until you can guess the phrase.

In 2015, the game was taken down after a request from trademark owners of the game show.

name: Room Map
summary:
rooms in room

Room Map is a game where you explore progressively denser rooms inside an apartment that's inside another apartment.

name: Rocket Chicken
summary: This game is a parody on another popular game! Have you ever wondered how hard would it be for a chicken to escape from the chicken factory? No? Never mind, take a shot! This chicken is like no other chicken on the farm, she has decided to run away, and she’s gonna do it, with the rocket or without it! Don’t avoid the bomb, just jump on it to run even further!

name: Road to Valor: World War II
summary:
Road to Valor: World War II is a real-time PVP strategy game where you can compete with global players around the world as a General of World War II, the biggest war in history.
Select “Command” that suits your own strategy style and collect various units to build the strongest troops. Fight against swarms of enemies in the realistically presented battlefield. Destroy enemy Headquarter and bunkers to get medals as well as the most glorious victory!

name: Rocket Lift
summary: Dodge the asteroids to fly further and score higher score then before.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Sports Spectacle
summary: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Sports themed table with 2 upper playfields.

name: Rotten Apples
summary: After leaving your ex-fiancé at the alter, you move towns to find a more adventurous life (hopefully filled with more romance). However, the guys who seem to be taking an interest in you seem a little… off. The new town you’re at doesn’t seem to be as safe as you thought as well…

name: Royelles - Gaming For Girls
summary: Royelles is a virtual universe created specifically for girls and non-binary individuals, where play has been redefined. Royelles game play is anchored in a collection of the fiercest female personas, that inspire you to create, connect, learn and most importantly, have FUN - by simply being yourself.

name: Ronald McDonalds
summary: Your objective is to steal the secret recipe from McDonald's without Ronald finding you.

name: Romarinho a Caminho do Gol
summary: Romarinho a Caminho do Gol is an interactive CD-ROM featuring puzzle and soccer-related games.

name: RollerCoaster Tycoon Adventures Deluxe
summary: Adventure and family fun await! Build over 200 wacky rides, coasters, shops and more.

name: Royal Romances: The Power of Chosen One DLC
summary: Explore additional locations and achieve new goals! Travel to a wonderful world of magic and learn more about its inhabitants!

name: Robot vs.
summary:
Dash, ascending, target switching, shooting, melee, avoiding, guard
Let's control a robot freely and defeat enemies

name: Royal Romances: The Power of Chosen One - Collector's Edition
summary: The important thing in life is to be able to let go of the past and always be open to an uncharted future. Could you embrace your destiny and save the kingdom?

name: Robot Shooter
summary:
Test your reflexes in this action-packed, physics-based shooter! Dodge bullets and blast your way through enemies.
Watch how you destroy robots, piece by piece. Then collect those pieces and upgrade your weaponry to blast even more bots!
Sound fun? You bet it is!

name: RowBot Rally
summary: Team up with a mechanical pal and row for the gold in the annual Fish Bowl!

name: Rolling Atop It
summary: A ball rolling game of epic proportions! Good music, higher-skill gameplay, and enough different rolling mechanics that we might go out of business!

name: Rose & Camellia Collection
summary: The graceful, beautiful, and elegant slap battle of the historied Tsubakikoji ladies has emerged. Your swipe becomes the face slap to your foes!

name: Rocket Horizon
summary: Rocket Horizon is a game where you control a rocket to dodge obstacles on different planets.

name: Robodash
summary: Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled journey in Robodash, a brutally challenging 3D platformer. Each fall means starting over as you navigate unforgiving obstacles, dodge treacherous traps, and conquer daunting gaps. Get ready for a rage-inducing platforming experience.

name: Rodney's Funscreen 2 Extreme
summary: Rodney's Funscreen 2 Extreme: Dinky's Revenge is a semi-sequel / upgrade to Rodney's Funscreen that was released in Japan by Interlink for the PC and Mac platforms in 1997.

name: Rogue Company: ViVi Starter Pack
summary: The ViVi Starter Pack features everything you need to jump into the action. Gear up - things are about to get loud!

name: Roving Rovers
summary: Roving Rovers is a lunar rover simulation representative of the Australian Rover Challenge of 2023. It replicates the challenges that teams in the challenge will perform!

name: Root Of Win
summary: Root of Win is a 3D puzzle game where you solve levels with a friend or stranger in a co-op or alone.

name: Royalty
summary: Royalty is a strategy card game. Manage your population, economy, military, diplomacy, and religion. Enact policies, handle random events, and ensure your dynasty's survival amidst riots, coups, and invasions. Shape the destiny of your kingdom and leave a lasting legacy in Royalty.

name: RootKeeper
summary: Unknown Warrior, pick up your weapons, plant a variety of plants, resist the surging monsters, and protect the Holy Tree!

name: Rotate: Collective
summary: Walk on walls and solve physics puzzles as you explore a massive underground facility. Uncover its dark secrets and try to escape with your life.

name: Rocococo: Audiogame Fantastique
summary: Rocococo ~ Audiogame Fantastique is a music-based, singleplayer adventure that has no visuals and can be played by anyone from fully blind to fully sighted. Using just your ears and spatial audio tech, you must listen, discover, and re-assemble songs to help the robo-Butler defeat the evil Queen!

name: Roguenarok
summary: Roguenarok is a top-down action roguelite arena shooter where you play as a mighty viking dinosaur, fighting back extinction from alien invaders. Strategize your counter-attack against diverse enemies by carefully considering the best warrior, weapon, and item to select and build.

name: Robinson Alchemy
summary: Robinson Alchemy is an alchemy game set on a deserted island where the objects you connect are the ones you first need to find and harvest.

name: RogueOut
summary: RogueOut is a fresh take on Breakout with roguelike elements. Wield powerful balls, strategize against dynamic bricks, and explore unique mechanics in each playthrough. This strategic, arcade-style game redefines the classic, promising endless replayability and thrill.

name: Robot TD
summary: Get ready to defend from murderous robots. Use your cast of towers to defend from the robots in this 3D strategy game.

name: RoboRancher
summary: RoboRancher is a first-person open-world co-op game with touches of exploration. In which you can capture and raise adorable monsters and get the resources they generate to improve your facilities, enter the planet and discover the secrets that await you.

name: Rotate the Rings
summary: This is an exciting puzzle game where the player needs to solve different challenges by rotating the rings to find the gap.

name: Romgadr
summary:
This is a mini-game shmup.
Defeat all 20 mid-bosses.
When the last boss is defeated, it is the end.

name: Robots Runner
summary:
Description Run with your robot into a dark abandoned factory! But beware an infinite path of dangers, put your personal best! avoid the enemies and not fall from the platform if you will not immediately end your adventure.
Your robot is able to jump the platforms with incredible leaps but is also equipped with a "G" device capable of reversing gravity! you find yourself running upside down! use this trick to avoid the big obstacles you encounter on your ride.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Medieval Mayhem
summary: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Medieval themed tables filled with cannons that will blast you to the past!

name: Roly Poly
summary: Twist the world to roll our hero to the end of each crazy maze.

name: Royal Flush: Princess Sidestory
summary: A short romhack of SMB3 where you play as Peach

name: Rockman 20XX: Tatakae! Team Shachi
summary: Mega Man joins forces with Team Shachi on their new song “Rocket Queen feat. MCU”! Control Team Shachi to stop the brainwashed Mega Man controlled by Dr. Wily and save the world!

name: Rockfish
summary:
Rockfish is an unfinished iOS game that was being developed by Studio Pixel, the creator of Cave Story. Having started development in 2010, the game originally focused on a rockfish, who is contacted by a mermaid that has been imprisoned in an amulet. She asks the fish to collect the pieces of the shattered amulet in order to free her.

By the end of 2011, development was paused and the game's concept was retooled. This rebooted version of the game featured a man in a submarine as the protagonist. This version was being worked on until the end of 2012, after which the project was scrapped in favor of Kero Blaster.

In 2023, Pixel released a previously unreleased demo for Rockfish, dated November 27, 2011.

name: Rocket Carz Racing
summary:
Rocket Carz Racing - Never Stop is the first game in the series of future in past Rocket Carz Racing games. Enjoy a new futuristic look of classic retro cars in the genre of endless arcade racing.
Real racing simulator of vintage cars with rocket engines! No wheels, no asphalt limits, only air flow and power of jet engines.
Drive each of your unique and super fast car through traffic of most known retro cars.

name: Rooms
summary: Rooms — a multiplayer horror game for 2-4 players in an abandoned bunker. Survive, restore electricity, and escape from the maniac or hunt for victims. Procedural level generation will add uniqueness to each game.

name: Roman Conquest: Rise to Power
summary: Roman Conquest: Rise to Power is a turn-based strategy game in which the player can feel like a great commander of the Roman Empire. Lead a legion and go with your army to recapture the occupied lands.

name: Rock Star Life Simulator
summary: Rock Star Life Simulator is an extensive fame simulation game. Start this adventure by playing the guitar on the street, form your own band. Protect the fame, money, and charisma you earned with the right decisions and become a world star!

name: Room In Dream
summary: A peaceful, and chill casual puzzle game. Discover, collect, and assemble furniture to decorate your little cozy room and surrounding environment in the peaceful land, feeling the white noise of the nature, time flow and weather change.

name: Rotting Rumble: Zombie Football
summary: Run to the end zone in this 3D platformer as you're chased by hordes of zombies! Collect weapons and items to fight back against the undead. Can you outrun the zombie horde?

name: ROFL
summary: The ultimate mash-up of Reversed Bullet Hell and Tower Defense! Rage of Fluffy Looters is a game where you play as a cat and must fight off hordes of monsters with your towers. Protect your fur and unleash your furious rage!

name: Rocket Car: Ultimate Ball League Machines
summary:
Introducing Rocket Car: Ultimate Ball League Machines — the perfect blend of fast cars and thrilling soccer action!
