Choose from a variety of stylish vehicles, each with its own unique abilities. Whether you prefer speedy sports cars or powerful machines, there's a ride for everyone in Rocket Car.

name: Roll & Ball
summary: Roll & Ball is an American Football board game where you can call plays and control a playmaker. Play with dice to control the balance of a play or without to determine the right play.

name: Roanoke
summary: Uncover the dark secrets of the lost colony in this gripping action-adventure/survival horror game. Step into the shoes of a desperate survivor trapped on Roanoke Island, where the boundaries between history and the supernatural blur. Beware the lurking horrors that lie within the shadows.

name: Rowtropia
summary: Travel to the pixelated world of Rowtropia, engulfed by a mysterious infeсtion, explore its mysteries and save it from imminent destruction.

name: Roboom
summary: Ascend into the Robocon Universe! Roboom is an arena shooter roguelite where you blast through hordes of unique enemies and bosses. Are you ready to face the challenges of the Robocon War and rise to become the best in the Multiverse?

name: RoadPipe
summary: Rotate, Connect, Help the car reach its destination! Explore the minimalistic stage with various gimmicks.

name: Rocketman
summary: As Ranger Ross, also known as the Rocketman, you are tasked to reclaim the corporate colonies of Sommerkrit. In this ultimate top-down shooter battle utilize your arsenal of weapons, summon your clucks, and support your allies to break through the enemy lines.

name: Road to Top G
summary: Survive waves of zombies, collect perks, unlock boss door, and face Andrew Tate in an intense showdown. Can you conquer the Top G?

name: Rome Frontiers
summary: A realistic rome builder simulator will allow you build the most important architectural works of ancient Rome. Are you ready to face the challenges as a builder of ancient Rome?

name: Robomania
summary: Robomania is an Action-Adventure Puzzle game where you play as the robot that can control three other robots. Solve puzzles, hide, fight and escape from the surreal laboratory with help of other robot called Empress.

name: Rocks Rider
summary: Know that feeling? Put earplugs in, shake them with the rock, start the bike, and with the roaring engine accomplish the impossible. That’s the new Rock(s) Rider. Show them what you’ve got and reach the finish line despite the various obstacles, junk, and pitfalls. Let's rock and ride!

name: Rocket Power: Zero Gravity Zone
summary:
A console port for Rocket Power: Zero Gravity Zone was in development alongside the Game Boy Advance version of the game, however was cancelled before release after THQ cut funding for the game.

The engine for the game was later reused in the cancelled game Sonic the Hedgehog Extreme.

name: RobloxTale: Noob Fight
summary: RobloxTale: Noob Fight is an Undertale fangame that puts the player in a custom boss battle against the Roblox noob.

name: RoboHunters
summary: Top-down 3D action shooter. Fight against swarms of rogue AI machines and survive as long as you can!

name: Road Drawing 3D
summary: Road Drawing 3D is an addicting draw-to-move type of game. In order to move the ball, you have to draw. When release your finger, the ball will start moving accordingly to the drawn path. Extremely intuitive gameplay mechanic. Do your best to draw at the right direction so the ball does not bump into moving obstacles, walls, rotating objects, etc.

name: Rolling Down Bottles
summary:
Ready for an exhilarating hyper-casual challenge? Test your skills as you guide the bottle down stairs, avoiding obstacles and daring jumps. It's a hilarious, addictive adventure that'll keep you hooked!
Unlock a variety of cool bottles with unique styles and personalities. Tap to play, conquer levels, and beat your high score in this fun-filled game. Download now and roll like never before!

name: Room 817
summary: Welcome to one of the scariest old-school horror games. Here, you're not the predator, but the prey. Any mistake will cost you your life. Hide, solve puzzles, explore, and embrace the inevitable terror. The Ancient horror lurks, awaiting you. Based on true events.

name: Rope & Ball
summary: Very easy: throw and take the ball to the goal BE IT AS IT MAY!!

name: Rodolfo Mascarpone y Ramón Cazanuecos: Amenaza en el Molinillo
summary: Get ready to experience a thrilling 3D sidescroller action adventure with our beloved characters Rodolfo Mascarpone and Ramón Cazanuecos, created by Borja Pavón and The Catacroquer who have also lent their voices in this exciting two-player co-op story!

name: Romance of a Demon Kingdom's Fall
summary: In a fantasy world, play as a girl who rebelled against a group of demonic rulers, searching for all truths about the royal House, and about her heart.

name: Rock Scissor Paper
summary: Rock Scissor Paper is a casual Minigames that you can Compete with the multiple characters, win the compete to promote your relationship......

name: Ronnarium
summary: An aquarium where a huge tank called "Ronnarium" is on display. There is a rumor that if one enters the aquarium at night, he or she will be "divinely bewitched". A girl named "Yocto" hears the rumor and visits the aquarium to confirm the truth.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Workplace Worries
summary: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Relieve your stress by tearing up the workplace in these office themed tables!

name: RookStar
summary:
You control five rooks that move in straight lines until they hit a wall or another rook.
For each problem, try to move the rook with the same color as the target to the target position (rotating star) in as few moves as possible. Play with friends or compete against others in the daily challenges.

name: Robosaurus
summary: Robosaurus is a cancelled action game that was in development around 1992 by Adrenalin Entertainment and THQ (at the time known as “Toy Headquarters”) for Super Nintendo.

name: Robo Run
summary: Robo Run - This is an adventure game on the speed of reaction.

name: Roids
summary: Explore a unique, procedurally generated galaxy filled with alien artifacts and resources to extract and exploit. Mine asteroids, harvest nebula, pilot unique ships and find new and strange things in the void between stars as you struggle to survive long enough to find another home.

name: Ronshade
summary: "Ronshade" is a turn-based roguelike game. Players collect items and challenge the depths. The turn system displays action results, with intuitive and quick controls. Over 100 unique items greatly influence combat outcomes.

name: Room Cleaning
summary: Room cleaning - addictive game to help you relax. You are only hiring and offering a solution for cleaning dirt, stains and waste disposal and offer it in perfect order! use all available items that can be used in your task!

name: Robospital
summary: Become a doctor in Robospital and fix robots. Learn programming, write code, and test your code. With vibrant graphics, coding challenges, and a narrative, embark on an undercover mission. Dive into a game where coding meets adventure!

name: Roaming Backrooms
summary: This is a back room style game. There are many rooms in the game, like a maze, where players need to find a way out. Mainly focused on exploration, with some frightening elements. There may be monsters waiting for players around the corner, or chasing them. There is no bloody content.

name: Rocky Wings
summary:
Discover Rocky Wings: An endless airplane arcade game that challenges your piloting skills!
You are the pilot in command in this casual fly-and-wreck-a-plane-simulator. Hop into the cockpit of the Checko 120 (your first own airplane), collect 12 more aircraft and unlock 13 challenging achievements. Fire up the engine and off you go. Who needs checklists, anyway?

name: Roman Empire Simulator
summary: Conquer, defend, and rise! Dive into the grandeur of ancient Rome in this gripping blend of Tower Defense and war strategy. Transform your humble settlement into history's mightiest empire. Defend against ferocious armies and expand your dominion over Europe and Africa. Ready your arrows and flames!

name: Rocher no Nagai Yoru
summary: A turn-based fantasy JRPG.

name: Rocket League: Season 12
summary:
Home to Rocket League’s opening day, Neo Tokyo’s megalithic tech scene and neon-soaked cityscape make for a landmark Arena setting. But fanged rumors lurk amongst the roots of these glittering towers. Notorious hacktivist Zero-Day has gained access to the city's digital infrastructure, and although their motives remain unclear, the city's underbelly buzzes with anticipation of what’s to come.

How will you survive this world of digital disruption? Override your Garage with the Porsche 911 Turbo, go incognito with Rocket Pass rewards, and play Soccer in Zero-Day’s corrupted vision of Neo Tokyo.

Season 12 begins on September 6, no password required!

name: Royal Romances: Endless Winter - Collector's Edition
summary:
Sometimes saving one life can change the fate of many. Can you melt the ice in people's hearts?
The Collector’s Edition includes:
An all-new story in the bonus chapter!
Replay your favorite mini-games and hidden-object scenes whenever you want!
Tons of achievements to unlock!
Keep an eye out for secret collectibles and morphing objects!

name: Rocket Cars
summary:
The creators of Touchgrind Skate2, Touchgrind BMX and Mr. Crab now bring you the breathtaking and extremely addictive car racing game Rocket Cars.
Strap in and rocket through the offroad Desert tracks, boost through the picturesque Wooden landscape and then blow your opponents away in the challenging Copper world. Upgrade your cars and compete against increasingly difficult ai cars in 60+ levels and prove that you have what it takes to win.

name: Roborne
summary: Explore and escape the sci-fi robot factory, classified as NR Securities. Are you willing to unveil the secrets of this twisted and corrupted factory?

name: Rooms
summary: You have found yourself in unexplained circumstances in an endless building with no apparent way out. Traverse through 100 rooms filled with monsters and puzzles and uncover the secrets of this building.

name: Road Motorcycle
summary: Road Motorcycle is a motorcycle racing game. The game uses realistic 3D pictures to simulate real roads.

name: 'Round The Mind
summary: 'Round The Mind is a hybrid-genre, fast-paced platformer where you, a young therapist kid who is accompanied by a big floating talking TV, help people feel better as a member from the 'Round The Mind organization.

name: Road Wars
summary: Self billed as the "most realistic combat racing sim ever created", Road Wars is a driving and shooting game where twelve different characters race their armed and armored vehicles across a dozen assorted tracks. Although the emphasis is on racing and completing laps, cars are equipped with a variety of weapons to impede the progress of the other drivers including gatling guns, missiles, oil slicks, and land mines. Individual drivers also have personal advantages such as cheaper repairs or better traction. Players can compete in single races or three different league circuits of increasing difficulty. Each league season consists of eight races where drivers use their cash winnings for repairs and upgrades between the stages.

name: Rockman EXE Phantom of Network
summary: Rockman EXE Phantom of Network is a video game in the Mega Man Battle Network series for mobile phones developed by Capcom. The game was only released and made available in Japan. It is most well known for featuring five original characters that did not appear in any other video games: the magician Mr. Hat with his NetNavi HatMan and son Shuichi Ubochi as well as the NetNavis JammingMan and Cache. All of these characters, however, appeared in the Rockman EXE anime series. The game was followed by a Japan-exclusive sequel for mobile phones entitled Rockman EXE Legend of Network.

name: Rockman EXE Legend of Network
summary: Rockman EXE Legend of Network is a video game in the Mega Man Battle Network series for mobile phones developed by Capcom. The game was only released and made available in Japan. It was preceded by Rockman EXE Phantom of Network. The game introduces a new character named Cerise, a Netopian.

name: Rogue Samurai
summary: Rogue Samurai is a roguelike action game where you must battle against waves of enemies. Fight, die, upgrade your skills and fight again until you beat all your enemies.

name: Royal Romances: Endless Winter
summary: Sometimes saving one life can change the fate of many. Can you melt the ice in people's hearts?

name: Roams.io
summary: Roams is a foraging/survival game set in a colorful 2d environment. You start off as a mouse and aim to make your way up the food chain through eating berries to gain xp. Your objective is simply survival, do this by progressing up the food chain and avoiding predators.

name: Rogue City: Casual Top Down Shooter
summary: Fight the mafia on city streets and save your city in this cop action shooter game!

name: Robokid
summary: You are the robot with mindset of a kid, but your robotic body allowing you to fight better than most humans. Your goal is to solve the mystery how aliens got into spaceship and, most importantly to discover "who You are for real?" A strange scientist will accompany you during the exploration

name: RoboWarrior Arena
summary: Welcome to MechWarrior Arena, where you'll immerse yourself in a futuristic world dominated by colossal war machines. In this thrilling single-player robot combat simulator, you'll design and customize your very own robot, then pit it against formidable foes in the arena.

name: Rowdy Rascals
summary: "Rowdy Rascals" is the wackiest party game for all ages! Play mini-games with unique challenges, spin the Modifier Wheel for surprises, and gear up for a survival boss battle if there's a tie. Get set for non-stop fun and laughter with your friends!

name: Robot Ron
summary: Matt Verran's Net Yaroze game.

name: Robbeary
summary:
Robbeary is an arcade adventure in which you help Bertie Bear rob a vast store. The store has 24 floors and each floor is bristling with guards.
Bertie can climb ladders and jump from one floor to another but he must avoid being caught by the guards because capture means instant death.

Bertie must collect all the fruit on each level before a key unlocking the door to the next floor is revealed. At some levels he may come across another key which opens a door where extra fruit can be collected.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake
summary: Theater of war, infinite drama. A masterpiece of historical simulation, "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS 8" is revived after 20 years! Enjoy the greatest military drama in the series, with the largest number of officers and scenarios, including an improved "All Officers Play" feature.

name: Roulette Simulator 2024
summary: Roulette Simulator 2024 presents players with the greatest modern Roulette gambling simulation. Experience the highs and the lows in real time as you try to beat the roulette wheel during the intensity of each spin!

name: Rockets, Planes, Soldiers
summary: A relaxing rock-paper-scissors mechanic, turn-based strategy on a hex-grid.

name: Rough Souls
summary: A game with a new game style: Rough-Like

name: Rock UFO
summary: In the dark infinite space, There is a staggering UFO without anyone controlling! The front is full of danger, and you are the only one who can save it!

name: Rolling Toolman 2 Deathly Traps
summary: New rolling toolman game. Try to reach finish fast and avoid deathly traps

name: Roller
summary: Net Yaroze ball game.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Club Crazy
summary: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Party down with these Night Club themed tables!

name: Robot
summary: This is a role-playing adventure puzzle game, a wonderful and unfamiliar world that requires thinking in order to continue moving forward, exploring the wonders of this game, overcoming various difficulties, and experiencing magical experiences.

name: Rogue Cards
summary: Roguelite deckbuilder with unique graveyard and monster mechanics set in a medieval randomized world

name: Rogue Mech
summary: Pilot your trusty Phoenix in this isometric, post-apocalyptic mecha survival game with base building elements. Trade, plant, hack, dig, talk and fight your way through the wastelands. If you survive, you might be able to restore a little green to this ash-ridden world.

name: Roc's Odyssey
summary: Explore vast landscapes and get lost in a beautiful yet dangerous world in Roc's Odyssey. Filled with intense combat, strange allies, platforming, enemies, treasures, secrets, upgrades, friendships and lore this hand drawn action adventure will have you hooked!

name: RollmeHome
summary: Roll the character with the rudder and jump. As usual, it's a space bar It has simple manipulation, but it's not going to be an easy challenge Understand the physics of things and explore the silhouette.

name: Royal Block
summary: Step into the fast-paced arena of RoyalBlock.to, a competitive block-based Battle Royale game. Players worldwide align and clear blocks, strategizing to outlast their opponents in a grid showdown. Crafted by a dedicated solo developer, RoyalBlock.to offers a unique and refreshing twist on classic puzzle mechanics. With a commitment to regular updates and a completely free-to-play model, this game is a testament to passion-driven development. Dive in, challenge yourself, and see if you have the strategic prowess to be the last player standing.

name: Rolling Jump
summary:
Help Lighty save the light of the world by escaping from the dark evil creatures in this incredibly FUN and ADDICTING game! Simply jump from each wheel up into the sky and stars to protect the light of the world.
In Rolling Jump, your goal is to help the hero, Lighty, jump up into the sky and away from the dark evil creatures as fast as possible.
Learn secrets of the game like double tapping, jumping onto walls, and discover how to attain the rainbow path to help Lighty save the light of the world, and ultimately prove his worth.

name: Rockman: New Year 2020
summary: A small hack to celebrate New Years 2020, Year of the Rat/Mouse.

name: Rockman 2014 New Year's Hack
summary: Puresabe’s hack to celebrate the year of the horse in 2014!

name: Rockman 2015 New Year's Hack
summary: Rockman 5 2015 New Year’s Hack

name: Rockman 2018 New Year's Hack
summary: A small hack to celebrate New Year’s 2018.

name: Rockman 2019 New Year's Hack
summary: A small hack to celebrate New Year’s 2019, Year of the Boar/Pig.

name: Roots of Cinder
summary: The doors of hell have been opened, and now demons walk the earth. Embark on an action-packed and mysterious adventure where you will have to confront the most dangerous enemies and solve the most intricate puzzles. All with the help of an extensive arsenal of weapons and summonings.

name: Rock n' Roll Racing Hack v16
Rocky & Bullwinkle
summary:
An unreleased Intellivision game from 1983.

Math mode to this game. "Rocky and Bullwinkle must stop the evil Boris and Natasha from robbing a train full of priceless valuables. While Boris uses "Upsidasium" to float the valuables up to Natasha's waiting helicopter, Rocky must fly around and intercept them. When Rocky catches the valuables, he gives them to Bullwinkle for safe keeping."

name: Roch Series
summary: A compilation of all 8 maps and 1 secret map of the Roch series.

name: Roch Island
summary: One of the biggest and most detailed city maps ever as a tribute to Pascal Rouaud's amazing Roch series

name: Road Rampage
summary: Avoid all the cars and try not to crash in this fast paced endless highway game!

name: Robo Blaster
summary: BLAST ROBOTS before ROBOTS BLAST you. Let's play a twin stick arcade shooter called ROBO BLASTER!

name: Rock A Bye
summary: "Rock a Bye" is a cute 3D platformer where you play as a baby, bouncing, dashing, and collecting outfits in 5 dreamy worlds.

name: Rogue Nova
summary: An intense, fast-paced real time strategy space opera, with a cast of colourful characters through a planet hopping adventure. Do you have what it takes to escape the relentless Baron protect of Princess Valeria?

name: Romance Club: Stories I Play
summary: Immerse yourself in romantic visual stories where you control what happens!

name: Royale King
summary: Win and be the royal king only you! Think right and jump at the right time.. Only one can win! Be it you!

name: RoboCop: Rogue City - Alex Murphy Edition
summary: Pre-purchase now to get the blue version of the hero's armour from RoboCop 2 and a "Pitch Black" version of your Auto-9 weapon.

name: Round The U-Bend
summary: Small base/industrial-style map. A reinterpretation of the original DM5 - part of than's ongoing DMxRMX series. The map source is included.

name: Roll me Home
summary: Roll the character with the rudder and jump. As usual, it's a space bar It has simple manipulation, but it's not going to be an easy challenge Understand the physics of things and explore the silhouette.

name: Root of all Evil: Infernal Science - Part 1
summary: Large underground research facility.

name: Root of all Evil: Infernal Science - Part 2
summary: Second part of Root of all Evil. A large underground research facility.

name: RoGlass
summary: RoGlass is a tile-based roguelite puzzle game where you place unique tiles to score points and unlock new spaces. Reset the board once you're out of tiles but keep progress on achievements, unlocks, etc. Keep expanding the board and try to unlock every achievement!

name: Rogue Ottoman
summary: Rogue Ottoman is a steampunk-Ottoman themed action rogue-lite game where you play a female protagonist to save the dynasty from collapsing. You'll explore a sprawling battlefield through Istanbul. Use your swords and attack with your special ability. No checkpoints. Die, upgrade and repeat!

name: Rocky & Co
summary: A brand new adventure featuring Rocky Memphis from ICON64!

name: Rotting Jam
summary: Rotting Jam is a collection of seven maps created over a period of two weeks for Arcane Dimensions with the theme "Decay and disrepair".

name: Roll The Bones
summary: Select spell-dice for your loadout, roll them and wreak absolute havoc! This high-paced pixelart roguelite will let you build unique loadouts with extremely interactable spells. Let's roll some bones!

name: Roads Construction Sim
summary: Embark on a thrilling journey into the world of civil engineering and road construction with Roads Construction Sim.

name: Roboctletes
summary: A futuristic robot track and field game for playdate.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Haunted Halloween
summary: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Halloween themed table with a focus on gimmicks, randomness and a center play-field spinner! Perfect for the Spooky at heart!

name: Rogue Tactics
summary: Rogue Tactics is a turn-based strategy game with RPG elements. Fight, learn new spells, recruit new creatures into your squad and improve them.

name: Romanticized Dreams of a Post-Apocalyptic Cowpoke
summary: Romanticized Dreams of a Post-Apocalyptic Cowpoke is a top down action shooter with randomly generated loot, levels, and enemies. Find unique weapons and upgrades to blast, explode, laser, and kick your way through an army of dastardly bandits!

name: Room Cleaning 2
summary: Room cleaning 2 - Continuation of the first part of the game! This time you will plunge into the medieval magical world and put things in order in every room that you meet on your way! You have to try out the role of a student who has just been hired!

name: RogueMusk
summary: RogueMusk is a fast-paced action shooter with a third-person view in a cybersecurity setting. While running vast distances, collect scattered particles of matter, pick up temporary upgrades and conduct targeted fire at the sentry droids. Buy upgrades for your pistol and carefully watch your step.

name: Rodent Rumble
summary: Get ready to scurry and scuffle in the most adorable competition around, Rodent Rumble! Whether you are battling it out in Block Party for the Golden Acorn or testing your skills in Rodent Royale against opposing squads – this is every fluff for themselves! Are you ready to scurry to victory?

name: Romance is Dead
summary: A visual novel centered on university student Maddie as she encounters various mysteries and the characters involved in them.

name: Roll the Ball
summary: Balance, pace and win the race! Embark on a thrilling journey with Roll the Ball! Dive into vibrant visuals across three unique biomes as you race against the clock to reach the finish line. Choose from three engaging game modes, Time Rush, Challenge and Speed Run and try to reach the top!

name: Robo Rush
summary: Robo Rush is a fast-paced action platformer focused on finishing one level as fast as you can!

name: Rocket Smash
summary: Rocket Smash is a minimalist 2D physics and destruction arcade game. Navigate through countless arena levels, relentlessly smashing, bashing and crashing into enemy rockets to annihilate them. This game is all about precision, strategy, and the joy of destruction!

name: Rocket Jump Race
summary: Have you ever wondered what would be races like if wheels never invented? You are about to find out. Rocket Jump Race is a FPS racing game that we compete with the explosive force of our weapons. If you are here to be the last player standing by destroying your rivals, you came to the wrong place.

name: Roam
summary: Roam is a 2D Action-RPG platformer with roguelike, metroidvania and survival elements in a procedurally generated open world. You have to explore the surrounding lands and the depths of mysterious caves that have existed for centuries at the bottom of the local lake.

name: Rogue Racer
summary: Race across the continent against the police and rival racers alike, survive bizarre encounters and become the Rogue Racer.

name: Rocko's Modern Life: Match-Master
summary: Generic memory game featuring images from the Nickelodeon cartoon.

name: Rolling for Romance
summary: Rolling for Romance is a Slice-of-Life dating sim where you find companionship through the magical world of Dungeons and Dragons! Go through your first year of college as you make friends, bond with your fellow club members, and potentially roll your way into one of their hearts!

name: Rose Guns Days: Season 1
summary: Rose Guns Days: Season 1 is the first visual novel in the Rose Guns Days series, which consists of five chapters and covers the year 1947.

name: Road Adventures USA
summary: An edutainment game released by The Learning Company in 1999. Players must travel across America to various tourist destinations in a limited timespan with a limited budget while competing against AI opponents.

name: Rose Guns Days: Season 2
summary: Rose Guns Days: Season 2 is the second installment in the Rose Guns Days series, which consists of five chapters and covers the years 1947 and 1948.

name: Rose Guns Days: Season 3
summary: Rose Guns Days: Season 3 is the third installment in the Rose Guns Days series, which consists of seven chapters and covers the years 1948 and 1949.

name: Rose Guns Days: Last Season
summary: Rose Guns Days: Last Season is the fourth and final installment in the Rose Guns Days series, which consists of six chapters and covers the years 1949 and 1950.

name: Rose Guns Days: The Best
summary: Rose Guns Days The Best is a re-release of Rose Guns Days, which includes all content from Season 1 to Last Season and a special new scenario.

name: Robot Detour
summary: Wrap your head and wire around numerous puzzles of Robot Detour, and become the smartest and strongest robot of them all!

name: RoboCock
summary: You are a Robo-Chicken that has been sent to hell for your many evil acts. Now you only have one purpose. Kill!!!

name: Rogues of Europa
summary: Rogues of Europa is a gothic roguelike RPG. Fight the physical and metaphysical evils brewing below the surface of a rapidly modernizing society.

name: Romans: Age of Caesar - Starter Pack
summary: The Steam Starter Pack is perfect for new players looking to kick start their Roman domination in Romans Age Of Caesar.

name: Rotten Flesh
summary: Rotten Flesh is a cosmic horror survival game where you have just lost your dog named Roy and you have to find him by shouting for "Roy" on your microphone. Venture deep into the sewers where your dog was lost - however, something else can also hear your screams in the tunnels.

name: Robot Fight
summary: Robot Fight is an Action game, published by Homevision, which was released in 1983.

name: Rouge.exe
summary: Rouge.exe is an unofficial horror game based on the Sonic.exe creepypasta featuring the character Rouge the Bat.

name: RoboCop: Rogue City - Alex Murphy Pack
summary:
The ''Alex Murphy'' pack throws you into the thick of the action for an even more exhilarating experience. It includes:
- The ''OCP Shotgun'' side arm
- The hero's damaged armour, taken from the first RoboCop film (cosmetic)
- The ''Prototype'' version of the Auto-9 gun (cosmetic)

name: RoboCop: Rogue City - Vanguard Pack
summary: The "Vanguard" pack includes the blue version of the hero's armour from RoboCop 2 and a "Pitch Black" version of your Auto-9 weapon.

name: Rose
summary: “The journalist who lost his daughter unveils the veil of truth with his light.”

name: Roach Race
summary: You wake up in a hostile world, among people unknown to you and your only task is to reach the finish line first.

name: Road to Exotics!
summary: Arcade-inspired racing game, Cannon-Style! Race against up to 300 racers simultaneously, A unique perspective on arcade racing.

name: RODB: Rhythm of Deck Builder
summary: Let your heart and body dance to the rhythm! A groovy nonstop card game. The world's first Roguelike Deckbuilder that combines "Rhythm Game" and "Card Game"!

name: Rogue Tides
summary: Set sail on a dangerous adventure! Crush unrelenting waves of enemies and build your ship! Challenge hard bosses, each with their own unique challenges! Can you stand the tides? Will you sink or swim?

name: Rodent Retribution
summary: Take on the role of a battle-hardened feline on a mission to eliminate a ruthless rat infestation in the underground world. Armed with powerful weaponry and cat-like agility, embark on a relentless journey through breathtaking subterranean environments in your quest for vengeance.

name: Rogue Glitch Ultra
summary: A roguelite action platformer in a vibrant glitch-ridden world. Amass a huge arsenal from over 150 weapon options and face hordes of enemies and tough boss fights.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Thanksgiving Throwdown
summary: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Thanksgiving themed table for the season of harvest.

name: Robots at Midnight
summary: Robots at Midnight will have you embracing intense combat, unravelling deep lore, and discovering what it means to be human. In this Action RPG, explore the world of Yob as Zoe, a scrappy hero searching for her past and protecting her future.

name: Rogue Realms
summary: Roguelike tower defense where you craft your defense while controling your hero of choice. Navigate through procedurally generated maps and face unpredictable waves. Every run will offer a unique challenge that will make you adapt your strategy and master tower placement and upgrading!

name: Roseline
summary: Roseline is an ambitious fantasy visual novel, focused on cinematic storytelling and a narrative about love, grief and finding purpose. Follow two childhood friends, Ash and Lily, in this first chapter of a large, impressive tale.

name: Room
summary: In ROOM players find themselves trapped in an unnerving and ever-shifting nightmare where escaping one room only leads to the discovery of another, each more sinister than the last.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Winter Whimsy
summary: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Ultra-wide winter themed table with 2 plungers and multi-ball madness.

name: Rogue Glitch Ultra: Upgrade
summary: A roguelite action platformer in a vibrant glitch-ridden world. Amass a huge arsenal from over 150 weapon options and face hordes of enemies and tough boss fights. Jump into multiplayer (up to 4 player co-op online or local) to collect, unlock, and upgrade for endless replayability.

name: Road Runner
summary: In Road Runner, the player takes control of the Road Runner. The Road Runner must run along the road, avoiding trucks, landmines, falling rocks, etc. and also not get caught by Wile E. Coyote. The Road Runner must also eat birdseed along the way or he will become faint and Wile E. will catch him. The Road Runner can earn points for eating the birdseed and also by making Wile E. get hit by trucks, falling rocks, etc. The Atari 2600 version has a difference from the other versions, in that the Road Runner isn't required to eat the birdseed but can do so for the points.

name: Rolling Crash
summary: Top down racing game in which the player collects dots Pac Man-style on several lanes while avoiding collisions with the other car.

name: Rogue Survivalist
summary: Choose Knight, Mage, or Rogue. Face enemies on 6 maps, level up, unlock unique abilities, and become a hero in this thrilling action RPG.

name: Roguelike Adventures and Dungeons
summary: Do you like roguelike dungeon crawling games? Or exploring Minecraft world for dungeons and structures for loot? Tired of all that tech stuff and just want more fun? Then this pack is for you. It is completely focused on adventuring and exploration, looting and fighting. Fight you way through the dungeons, improve your skills and gear, complete quests and conquer new undiscovered dangerous dimensions. There is no time to relax because as you grow stronger, gathering better equipment mobs will also gain health and becomes stronger!

name: Rock Band 2 Deluxe
summary: Rock Band 2 Deluxe is an improvement mod for Rock Band 2, which enhances the look of the game and adds various quality-of-life upgrades.

name: Rogue Knight
summary: Experience fast-paced rogue-lite gameplay. Explore ever-changing locations and fight vicious enemies in souls-inspired 2d combat. Every run you will find variety of items and spells to compliment your playstyle, as well as resources to upgrade your town for future runs.

name: Rocket Frog
summary: In this challenging precision platformer, a bubble gum chewing frog bites off a bit more difficulty than he bargained for.

name: Rolus in the Outskirts
summary:
Funny, fresh, and full of heart: A story of one unlucky cyclops, the grimy town he lives in, and the miracle bestowed upon it!
Rolus in the Outskirts is an action-adventure that blends the gameplay of The Legend of Zelda, the humor of South Park and the heart of dead-end America. Meet endearing characters as you explore the ramshackle world of The Outskirts, risking it all in pursuit of a dollar-menu cheeseburger.

name: Robin Hood: The Siege
summary: Robin Hood the Siege is a gun game in the style of games like Operation Wolf series based on the famous character, the game was published only in Europe in the year 2004 by Phoenix Games.

name: Royal Romances: Cursed Hearts - Collector's Edition
summary: Join a noble prince and a beautiful princess on their quest to vanquish evil, unearth hidden family secrets, and fight for a moment of respite in each other's arms!

name: Rot In Hell
summary: Rot In Hell is an action adventure game that draws inspiration from souls like genre. Rot in Hell" offers players a harrowing journey through a twisted world as Damien, the tormented priest, challenging them to confront their inner demons while battling external forces of darkness.

name: RoonSehv: NeTerra
summary: A Myst-like fan-game based on the story of Myst. The game takes place in the world of Myst in a parallel story of Atrus and his family.

name: Roko's Basilisk
summary: You find yourself in a utopian setting, immersed in the matrix of an omnipotent AI that holds all knowledge and wisdom. There is no clarity as to how you got here, but a mission looms before you.

name: Rocket League: Whiplash
summary: Rifting over for the world of Fortnite comes the Whiplash.

name: Rocket League: Season 13
summary:
Tape your Season highlights on VHS.
The 90s and early 2000s, a time that was bold, radical, and most importantly: destined to return in Rocket League Season 13! Get ready for reminiscent nights at Mannfield—Season 13 kicks off December 6.

Here’s the 4-1-1 on this Season’s Rocket Pass Premium. Upon purchase, you’ll auto-unlock the Ace Car Body. Go up the Tiers to unlock other new items like the RC Antenna, CRT Wheels, Primo Car Body, yadda yadda yadda…

name: Ropin' Ranch
summary: Welcome to Ropin' Ranch, the ultimate Free-To-Play online ranch game that invites you to step into the boots of a seasoned rancher. In this expansive world, you'll take charge of your very own ranch, tame wild horses, and breed horses with real-world genetics. Unlock horses in over 150+ colors and get unique horses every time with markings! Ropin' Ranch offers an immersive and educational experience, blending the thrill of ranch life with the intricacies of horse genetics, illnesses, and more. Raise goats for meat, milk, or showcase their excellence in the show ring, and for the first time, experience the joys of managing gentle giants - cows! Train your cows for work or show, or raise them for meat or milk and sell them to the rodeo! Ropin' Ranch also strives to bring awareness to real world problems such as horse overpopulation, wild horse problems, cattle factory farming and more.

name: Rogue Slime
summary: Rogue Slime: An engaging isometric 2D roguelike adventure where you maneuver a slime character through dynamic dungeons, utilizing slime ball attacks and a variety of power-ups to overcome diverse enemies and evolving challenges.

name: Rocket Racing
summary: From the developers of Rocket League comes Rocket Racing, a supersonic arcade racer that lets you drift, fly, and boost your way to the finish in a rocket-powered car! Climb the ranks and test your skills in Ranked or pull up to Casual Racing and enjoy the thrill of racing without high stakes. Want to race against the clock? Drop into Speed Run and put your best time on the leaderboard.

name: Rooftops & Alleys: The Parkour Game
summary:
Rooftops & Alleys is more than just a game about Parkour & Freerunning. It’s the adrenaline rush of landing an impossible trick combo, defying gravity, and feeling like you’re flying… until you crash face-first into a dark alley 30 meters below.

In solo or with your friends, explore in total freedom massive-parkour-ready maps. Reach every corner of your playground to uncover hidden spots — time trials, trick challenges, and more! In multiplayer, dive into game modes like TAG, Capture the Flag, Trick Battles, or simply freeroam with your friends!

name: Rolley-Ball
summary: Try to roll a ball out of several mazes/puzzles.

name: Rock and Roots
summary: Rock and Roots is a captivating VR journey where you wield the power to dictate the ebb and flow of battle. Summon your enigmatic guardians of the woods with a magical hand to face the challenges. Conjure spells, dive into the magic world and reclaim your rightful place on the throne!

name: RoPan
summary: RoPan is an action game, in an open mini map in which you can explore every corner, you will find traps and enemies everywhere and so complete missions from the salesman Saber and you will have several weapons and items to help you.

name: Roll Over Princess
summary: From the tower of mysterious ruins exuding an enigmatic power, the only things you can bring back are knowledge, memories, and experience. Amidst numerous challenges, combine equipment, legacies, and allies to conquer the top floor!

name: Royal Romances: The Cursed Hearts DLC
summary: Unravel the enigmatic tale, confront the shadows of the past, and steer your destiny towards a love that transcends the ordinary!

name: Rookie Guard and the Queen
summary: A young soldier, Royd, just passed the exam to become a guard in the palace! While doing a routine night patrol during his probation period, he discovered the dark secret of the queen and his life was never the same...

name: Rogue Fable IV
summary: Rogue Fable IV is a traditional rogue-like game which combines the depth, complexity, and challenge of the genre classics with a shorter, more tightly focused game length.

name: Rosas are Red
summary: Meet Rosa, a kind-hearted girl who wants to open up to you in more than one way! Take her on dates, choose your activities and fap your way into her heart.♡ Develop your relationship through your choices. Friend, Lover, Master. Which one are you?

name: Robocop vs. Predator
summary:
Robocop is involved in an awesome adventure against Predator, but the terrible alien is not the only problem that he'll face. More troubles from the future are coming, but some friends also, to fight this final war and save the future of the human race!

This game is a lovely tribute to the cult movies of 80s and 90s. If you loved them as my team, you'll like this little gem we made for you.

name: Rockman 2024 New Year's Hack
summary: A small hack to celebrate New Years 2024, Year of the Dragon.

name: RockMen X
summary: A Mega Man X-style action game in which Iris plays an active role.

name: Road Rash
summary:
The Master System version of Road Rash retains the vast majority of content over its Mega Drive counterpart, though most of the graphics were re-drawn for the smaller resolution and fewer colors given by the hardware. On the Master System, the top speed is lowered, and much of the road-side scenery has been removed, and there appears to be fewer racers on the track at any given time. While the track layouts are broadly the same, hills are less pronounced on the Master System, and take longer to complete due to the aforementioned speed issues.

All digitized sound has been removed, as has the rev counter in the HUD. The Game Gear port is much the same as the Master System conversion, but has to reduce the size of its HUD further in order to fit all important details onto the screen. This also means less of the road is visible to the player.

name: Rockman X3: New Year 2021
summary: A small hack to celebrate the Chinese New Year 2021, Year of the Ox.

name: Rockman X3: New Year 2022
summary: A small hack to celebrate the Chinese New Year 2022, Year of the Tiger.

name: Rockman X: New Year 2023
summary: A small hack to celebrate the Chinese New Year 2023, Year of the Rabbit.

name: Rocket League: Game of the Year Edition
summary:
Rocket League Game of the Year Edition is a digital download-only release of Rocket League, collecting three DLC packs along with the original game.

Unlike the Collector's Edition, no individually-released cars are included.

It was not made available for Xbox One, as the standard edition was updated with the GOTY Edition DLC.

On 2019-10-23 Psyonix announced the GOTY Edition would be removed from storefronts and no longer sold.

name: Rocket!
summary: Build a stronger ship with each play session as you earn resources needed to upgrade your ship and apply stronger weapons. Customize your ship to your play style and tackle greater and stronger enemies as the levels continue in this endless roguelite.

name: Rokumon Tengai Mon Colle Knight GB
Road Runner
summary: An unreleased Atari 5200 port of Road Runner.

name: Rogue-Like: Evolution
summary: You are a new Mutant who has the ability to be immune to all other Mutant powers including the girl with the deadly touch Rogue. She's intrigued and susceptible to your influence so you can either play nice and show her the love she's been missing or train her to be your lap dog.​

name: Room Escape
summary: Helen is a young woman who hardly ever leaves her home. Bored one night, she turns on the TV only to see a broadcast announcing an evacuation for her neighborhood. Locked inside, she must solve puzzles in order to find the key and escape her house.

name: RoboSync
summary: RoboSync is a puzzle game where you will need to use logical reasoning and precision to complete the challenges. Release and lock passages at the right time to synchronize your robots' movements and achieve perfect synchronization to release all the locks at the same time.

name: Rokumenhappi
summary: Dice are fun! Everyone knows the rule that if you roll it, the position of the surface will change. This geme is a puzzle game that arranges such dice.

name: Rocket Knight Adventures: Re-Sparked
summary:
The mightiest mammal to ever rocket to stardom is back in a three-game, Carbon Engine-powered collection that includes:
- Rocket Knight Adventures
- Sparkster: Rocket Knight Adventures 2
- Sparkster

name: Rogue Dimensions
summary: An Old School 2d Platformer, twin stick shooter, arcade roguelite adventure. Destroy the crystals blocking your way to freedom and earn new abilities along the way while teleporting between random levels at will.

name: Rose & Camellia 2
summary:
Welcome back to the elegant art of feminine conflict.

A year has passed since Reiko triumphed over the dark matriarch Madame Camellia and assumed the title of Grand Madame of the Tsubakikoji clan. Saori, the second daughter of the family, who Reiko defeated so ignominiously, can no longer contain her stress level, and at long last she vows revenge on the woman who humiliated her.
Can Saori defeat Reiko and reclaim the life of luxury and indulgence in which she grew up?

name: Rose & Camellia & La-Mulana
summary:
Mulbruk, self claimed heroine and Ancient has been sleeping for 3000 years within the ruins of LA-MULANA.
She’s fighting for the title of Heroine of La-Mulana!

name: Rock Canvas
summary: On Rock Canvas, you are the artist! With the help of a variety of tools, create sculptures for Rocky's cave. But be careful, Rocky is a little demanding with his sculptures, he will tell you what tool to use for his next great masterpiece!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Baker's Best
summary: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Party down with these Night Club themed tables!

name: Robot Adventure
summary: Join IP-One in his adventure to escape the facility. Filled with autobots, moving platforms to jump across, flying UFOS and all other manner of foes that block your path!

name: Rogue Galleon and the Haunted Treasure
summary: Rally your band of rogues to battle the spooky monsters haunting the Pirate's galleon! In this top-down shooter + rogue-lite game, power up with temporary upgrades, then spend gold on permanent power once you fall in battle.

name: Room Escape: Strange Case 2
summary:
Can you escape from Asylum?

In Strange Case 2: Asylum you need to investigate the mysterious case about mental hospital.

name: Road
summary: Road - A Driving / Endless Runner type game in which you can Collect Coins, Magnets, Boosters, Overcome Obstacles such as Moving Plates, and Other Cars. All with Fun Music and Cool Visuals. The game also has Basic Settings and Score Saves.

name: Roadside
summary: Start your own in-game store/business and sell to other players! Join the in-game law enforcement and stop crime, or cause in-game crime and havoc but don't get caught! In this game, you get to experience both player and NPC parts of the world!

name: Roach Hotel
summary: Prevent roaches from invading a hotel by stomping them.

name: Rogue's Hexagon
summary: A turn-based puzzle game set in a hexagonal world where you strategically move and throw powerful daggers to solve dozens of puzzles and optional challenges.

name: Room 13
summary: You are inside an endless hotel but there is a way you can escape. Search in the hallways of the hotel and find the changes within them to reach Room 13.

name: Rolling in the Maze
summary: In "Rolling in the Maze", players operate a small ball to challenge the maze. In order to reach the end, players need to crack according to the different level mechanisms of each level.

name: Rock Life: The Rock Simulator - Rock Pack #2
summary: Unlock more of the most rocks of rocks... in this Rock Pack! Known as the more special rocks in Rock Life: The Rock Simulator. You can use these special rocks in both the Multiplayer mode, "Rock Together", and in the Singleplayer mode, "Become Rock".

name: Robo Rob
summary: Robo Rob: Dive into this compact, rage-inducing puzzle adventure that's sure to test your patience and skill.

name: Rose Cottage
summary: A point and click ghost story, set in a Victorian mortuary. A haunting story with a fully voiced cast of characters. Featuring hand painted locations and characters in 4K resolution.

name: Rogue Ninja: Elemental Onslaught
summary: Create your own build by strategically combining ninjutsus and perks. Maneuver through movement and engage with enemies, survive as long as possible.

name: Robot Pong
summary: A variant of pong exclusive to the Atari 2600 as games 49-50 of the launch title Video Olympics

name: Road Warriors
summary: Survive on the road in this post-apocalyptic world! Road Warriors is a casual game with rogue-lite elements where your goal is to create the strongest build in one run!

name: Roofcats Band: Suika Style
summary: What do cats do on the roof? They play jazz, rock, metal and more! In this Suika-like game, you must match the cats to make new musicians appear, all while avoiding overflow and dealing with a crazy dog that shows up to mess things up. Will you be able to hear a killer guitar solo on the last cat?

name: Rockit!
summary: Rockit! is a difficult arcade game about trying to not crash rockets. Duck and weave around progressively challenging obstacles to be crowned the ultimate rocket pilot.

name: Rock Tetrus
summary: Place the rocks, make a solid line, make the line crumble and fall! There are an infinite amount of strategies! Made by 1 person, inspired by a fake mobile game ad. Enjoy!

name: Robocop 2D 3
summary: One cyborg stands between the OCP army of crazed robotic cops and their plan for complete control... Robocop!

name: Robot
summary: VT03 (16-bit graphics) port of Robot.

name: Rock Pit
summary: Rock Pit is a fantastic cave platformer. It features lots of baddies, cave exploring, funny cut scenes, hand drawn graphics and a rock soundtrack!

name: Rockman Tennis
summary: Released in 2007, Rockman Tennis is a tennis game starring the cast of the Classic series! There are seven playable characters, including an unlockable X! Each character has their own special move that can be performed when its meter is filled. For example, Mega Man unleashes a powerful charge shot… while Shadow Man clones the ball (isn’t that cheating?). There are also four cups with varying court types. With multiple skill upgrades from Auto’s shop, this game has more depth than some may imagine!

name: Roof Rails
summary: Roof Rails is a casual game where you play as a character who has to jump from one roof to the next while holding a pole that grows by collecting pieces.

name: RoboCop Versus the Terminator
summary: A cancelled NES game based on the RoboCop Versus The Terminator comic book series. The game is a side-scrolling shooter where you play as RoboCop, shooting through various Terminators and robots on your quest to destroy Skynet.

name: Rosetta
summary: In this game, you can turn the foreign vocabulary you know (and that you didn't know until five minutes ago) into your power. Defeat the powerful enemies coming like a tide and survive tenaciously.

name: Rock Climbing?
summary: It's a difficult game but it should be easier than real rock climbing.

name: Rope'n'Fly 4
summary: Use your ropes to swing a destructible ragdoll from one skyscraper to the others. You have full control over your ropes, touch on a building or object to throw your rope there, touch again to release it and fly through the sky. Perform various kinds of jumps to get achievements, attach to flying planes, jets or ballons and try to beat your friends or all other players by competing with them for the best score.

name: Rockin' Racket
summary: Rockin’ Racket is a narrative driven, fast paced, pop punk band management game with an undercurrent of teenage angst as you try to hold together a band of rowdy younger siblings, keep the crowd happy, and manage your frugal earnings while booking larger venues to rocket your band to stardom!

name: ROM: Remember of Majesty
summary: Embark on an epic journey through a captivating realm teeming with marvels and trials in ROM: Remember of Majesty, an immersive MMORPG brought to you by Kakao Games. Elevate your gaming adventure by unlocking exclusive benefits through redeem codes. This article is your go-to resource for a detailed breakdown of free coupon codes for ROM, guiding you through the process of redemption to amplify your overall gaming experience. Explore the magical world of ROM and seize these opportunities for enhanced gameplay!

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Weezer Song Pack II
summary: Play “Beverly Hills”, “Perfect Situation”, and "Pork and Beans" by Weezer on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Road Bustle Online
summary: Road Bustle Online is a competitive online game for up to 8 players on the road in real-time, set in the streets of the Road Bustle world. Bright graphics and pulsating rhythms set the stage for adrenaline-filled sessions. Navigate your way through increasing traffic, dodge vehicles, and outsmart your opponents to reach the finish line. Ready? On your marks!

name: Rock 'N' Roll Clams
summary:
There's a Motion in the Ocean...

Help Caspar Clam and Band shake, rattle and roll their way from the Bottom of the Ocean to the Top of the Charts!

Get out of your shell and hang on to your pearls as you send the Record Business into a spin!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Prehistoric Paradise
summary: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Prehistoric themed tables that pack a blast from the past!

name: Rocket League: Season 14
summary:
DIVE INTO A FRESH AQUADOME ARENA IN ROCKET LEAGUE SEASON 14 !

Rocket League Season 14 submerges players in aquatic ambience. Kick off in a new version of AquaDome and deck out your car in maritime items !

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Retro Revival
summary: 3 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Retro style tables with gameplay inspired by EMs of the past.

name: Rosenkreuzstilette Bundle
summary: This bundle contains both the series from Rosenkreuzstilette: "Rosenkreuzstilette" and "Rosenkreuzstilette Freudenstachel".

name: Royale Online
summary:
Royale Online invites you to an enchanting MMORPG experience! The game unfolds in a thrilling universe, focusing on the epic struggle among three kingdoms. Each kingdom brings together heroes of different classes, plunging into the heart of an epic war.

As players immerse themselves in the rivalry and strategy between kingdoms, they also have the opportunity to unravel the powerful secrets of the magical stones within the game. These mystical stones, when shattered by the warriors of the kingdom, grant unique enhancements. Heroes steadfastly breaking the stones can gain superiority over their enemies, elevating their kingdoms and altering the course of the war.

Royale Online offers an unforgettable MMORPG experience with its impressive graphics, rich storyline, and strategic depth. Take part in the epic struggle between kingdoms, guiding characters with unique abilities, acquiring powerful allies, and discovering the power of magical stones. Royale Online calls you to an epic adventure – join the war between kingdoms and write your legend!

name: Rox 64
summary: The Rox conversion for the Commodore 64 further iterates from the original game for the VIC-20. In this title Jeff Minter pays tribute to the classic arcade game Missile Command.

name: Road Toad
summary: Embark on a whimsical journey with Road Toad, a charming arcade adventure featuring a goofy toad navigating minimalist landscapes, collecting power-ups, and facing quirky challenges.

name: Roots of Fury
summary: This couch co-op Hack and Slash RPG lets you play as a scientist who shrunk herself to battle swarms of insects threatening the roots of her plants. Team up with an ant hive that serves as your base — craft weapons, plan your attacks, and fight through an action-packed underground world.

name: Road To Valhalla: Carola
summary: A 2D retro game based on the lore of the Spanish Streamer Carola. In this adventure you will travel through a fantasy world exploring platform levels, completing missions and defeating enemies alongside powerful bosses.

name: Roshamboss
summary: Rock Paper Scissors, but with abilities that break the rules. One player picks a raid Boss, three others draft Heroes to take them down. Strategize, improvise, and read minds in this 1v3 card game–last team standing wins.

name: Roboglitch
summary: He needs to escape.

name: Road of Death
summary: This is a fun and casual puzzle game where you can continuously shoot, eliminate more monsters, and challenge your strongest score!

name: Royal Affairs: AI Romance
summary: Royal Affairs is a date sim game where the use of AI not only makes the characters and stories come alive, but also makes every palace romance and strategic conspiracy come to life. Players will experience the highly interactive and personalized choices brought by AI technology, and every decision will affect your power and love path. From in-depth conversational interactions to the details of giving birth and raising children, AI makes everything extremely real, providing a royal life experience full of challenges and fun. Get ready to explore the medieval kingdom empowered by AI and start your palace romance adventure.

name: Rooster
summary: A heartfelt, story-rich casual puzzle adventure celebrating the best of ancient Chinese culture. Explore an exquisitely hand-drawn world with delightful surprises, from cooking, finding hidden objects, paper crafting, and more. Guide Rooster in an emotionally rewarding tale about family and love.

name: RoboSquad Revolution: Founder's Pack
summary: Experience the perks of being a Founding member of the Iron Orchestra! Secure your Founder's Pack to support the revolution and instantly unlock exclusive items. You'll get instant access to skins, weapon wraps, NOVA, attachments, emotes, executions and holograms, including the new Zoran skin Magma.

name: Rockman X Shùxué Xuànfēng
summary: Rockman X Shùxué Xuànfēng is a licensed Mega Man X series video game released for home computer only in Taiwan by Strawberry Software. Rockman X Shùxué Xuànfēng has six challenges where the player faces a Maverick from Rockman X3. Players can register their names and save high scores, with a leaderboard showing the highest score from each player in each games. In five challenges the player uses X to hit (by shooting or touching) a robot with a number corresponding to the answer of the question. There is a time limit of 60 seconds to each question. The boss attacks him if the answer is wrong, and he faces the boss after making 500 points. The stage is cleared after making 1000 points, and the player can print a certificate.

name: Rockman Dash Zhěngjiù Dìqiú Dà Màoxiǎn
summary: Rockman DASH Zhěngjiù Dìqiú Dà Màoxiǎn is a licensed Mega Man Legends series video game released for home computer only in Taiwan by Strawberry Software. Rockman DASH Zhěngjiù Dìqiú Dà Màoxiǎn is an educational game with six challenges, one being the main game mode and the other five extra challenges.

name: Rockman The Puzzle Battle
summary: Rockman The Puzzle Battle is a game released by Capcom on July 1, 2011 for docomo, au and SoftBank branded mobile phones in Japan.

name: Rockman no Dot Art Logic
summary: Rockman no Dot Art Logic is a Rockman themed picture logic puzzle game. Each puzzle completed could be downloaded as an emoji to Deco Mail.

name: Rockman Dash Golf
summary: Rockman Dash Golf is a spin-off sports game in the Mega Man Legends series that was released to Japanese mobile phones, available via the i-mode internet subscription service. In the game, players have the ability to play as Rock (Rockman in-game, high power and low technique), Tron (Toron in-game, balanced), or a Kobun (low power and high technique) on a variety of golf courses.

name: Rockman Bug Sweeper
summary: Rockman Bug Sweeper (ロックマン バグスイーパー Rokkuman Bagu Suīpā) is a Mega Man themed Minesweeper game released by Capcom for mobile phones in Japan. Instead of mines, Mega Man and Beat deal with hidden bugs.

name: Rota
summary: Use your Playdate's crank to swing from anchor to anchor as you try to beat your high-score while avoiding the inevitable.

name: Ronny's Climb
summary: Relive the 90s in this 16-bit inspired retro platformer! Explore colorful worlds alongside Ronny and their adorable furry friends and help them jump, dash and fight their way to the top of the mountain. Can you overcome the challenges and reach the summit?

name: Room
summary: When I woke up, I was in a small room. Escape through the endless rooms.

name: RoadHouse Manager
summary: Bartend and run a roadhouse in this AI-enhanced roguelite-sim! Patrons once impressed, will become permanent barflies that can be hired as staff, or sent on quests in the mysterious mist. Upgrade your roadhouse, hire a band, and build your Signature Cocktail, with 333 ingredients to choose from.

name: RogueLive
summary: Choose your heroes, watch them explore dungeons, and complete missions. In Roguelive, each hero has a unique personality that you need to consider when sending them on missions. Form a party with the warriors that suit your liking, watch how they explore the dungeons, and create your very own party.

name: Robot Girl's Dream: Robot Battle Championship
summary: This game is an RPG game that follows the growth of a robot girl who has lost her memories. Players can aim for victory in the robot battle tournament, the main objective, and also enjoy interactions with both humans and robots.

name: Roguelike Chess
summary: Roguelike Chess is a turn-based strategy game inspired by chess, in which you control a piece and need to destroy the others, acquiring skills during your turns through the card system. Customize your game with skins from the store and return to the board for a new play.

name: Rogue Resonance
summary: Hack and slash through hordes of enemies and formidable bosses. Enhance your abilities with each skill pickup, augmenting your dash, melee combos, and powerful spells as you grow stronger. Uncover the mysteries of this captivating 3D top-down action-packed roguelike adventure.

name: Rockhopper
summary: Rockhopper is a single player asteroid mining rougelike featuring procedurally generated asteroids, robust upgrade paths and dark exploration with enemies and ancient secrets to uncover.

name: Roll A Blade
summary: Dice-Building Roguelike with turn-based combat and customize-able dice.

name: Rougien
summary: Space Shooter

name: Romance Fantasy
summary: It's a two-person production game for fans by V-tuber 'Lee Jooin'.The development of the game began with the support of many 'Churros(fans)' written in the ending credits. Enjoy the romance fantasy stories of 'Lee Jooin' and 'Churros'

name: Rogue Trooper
summary: Rogue Trooper is a Genetic Infantryman (G.I.) of the future whose entire battalion was wiped out on their first mission in the Quartz Zone of Nu Earth. Rogue must navigate many platform levels and several first person style flying levels to get to the root of the treachery. He is assisted by three bio chips containing the personalities of three of his dead buddies; Gunnar, Helm and Bagman - unfortunately, Bagman's silicon is deteriorating. The plot is helped along with comic pages between levels. This game is based on the long-running 2000 AD comic character of the same name.

name: Roomka
summary: You woke up in a cell in the basement. What now?

name: Rogue Night
summary: Fight through hordes undead, and collect their heads to unlock permanent upgrades while you gather resources to build your base. Choose your class, and preferred weapons. Explore dungeons to find rings, tools, and blueprints, and rescue NPCs who unlock new structures and provide various resources.

name: Rogue Stargun
summary: Rogue Stargun is an action-packed space combat sim where you pilot 5 unique starfighters with interactive VR cockpits in a story-driven single player campaign consisting of over 24 unique missions covering both land and space.

name: Roadway Traffic Racer
summary: "Roadway Traffic Racer" is an exciting and thrilling game for lovers of high-speed racing on the highway.

name: Route8
summary: "You're lost on Route 8. You must find a way to escape. This eerie road is terrifying.""Night falls, the phone rings. Who are you? You find yourself driving along Route 8, repeating endlessly."

name: RollTale
summary: 3D and Rhythm Based Music Game Jump and avoid obstacles on the platform

name: Rolling Combine
summary: Combine Fruits and get score in this mass physics 3d Game!In Rolling Fruits, you combine 2 same fruits for next bigger one. You can use this unique physics in game to combine same fruits!

name: Rock and Girls
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Rod-Land
summary: The Game Boy port of Rod-Land allows the player to strike enemies with their wand whilst climbing a ladder, making the game a slight bit easier to play.

name: Rooftops
summary: Rooftops is a Call of Duty 4 fan-made campaign which involves new and exciting scripted sequences, fun gunfights and cool new cutscenes to support the story. It takes place in a fictional universe independent from the original game's story, revolving around S.A.S. Task Force 99, which becomes involved in an undercover Russian operation in Italy.

name: Rooftops 2
summary: Rooftops 2 is a Call of Duty 4 fan-made campaign that brings lots of visual improvements in the core game, a lot of assets and features are borrowed from the original Modern Warfare 2 and 3. It is a direct sequel of Rooftops, taking place immediately after it ends.

name: Road Engineer
summary: You are a Road Engineer. Build roads and bridges to optimize traffic, cost, speed or distance for different vehicles on a lot of various and challenging levels!

name: Rogue Sky
summary: Master gravity-defying flight mechanics and time-bending powers in this bullet hell rogue-lite where strategic depth meets intense gameplay. Unravel synergistic upgrades and enhancements as you stop the alien invasion from ever happening. Are you ready to dominate the skies?

name: Road Dinner Simulator
summary: Road Dinner SImulator is an exciting cafe management simulation game where you'll become the owner and head chef of a small but cozy cafe on the edge of a picturesque highway. This game allows you to immerse yourself in the atmosphere of culinary adventures and business.

name: Rod-Land
summary: The NES port of Rod-Land adds new platform stages and the ability to jump.

name: Rogueborne Fury
summary: Rogueborne Fury is a combination of rogue-like, bullet hell, and dungeon crawler, with procedurally generated dungeons and enemies. Discover unique weapons, collect items, and level up your character. Fight your way through relentless hordes and cunning bosses.

name: Rollerboy 2
summary: Rollerboy 2 was a classic side-scrolling platformer game developed in Java in the early 2000s. Players controlled a character on rollerblades navigating through various levels filled with obstacles, enemies, and challenges. The game featured smooth gameplay mechanics, colorful graphics, and catchy music, providing an enjoyable experience for players of all ages. With its addictive gameplay and level design, Rollerboy 2 became a beloved title among fans of retro gaming. In an effort by the community to preserve the game, it was resurrected through reverse engineering and can still be found online today for players to enjoy.

name: Room
summary: I thought it was just an ordinary day, but I accidentally entered this endless cycle of rooms. Among the countless terrifying and anomalous things, there is a girl who seems like she shouldn't exist here.

name: Robot Multitool
summary: Robot Multitool is a puzzle adventure about a multifunctional robot. You can control a flying arm, cling to a rope, shoot, release an electric charge. You will have to go through fascinating puzzles, skill tasks and battles with robots.

name: Rogue Girl
summary: Rogue Girl is a roguelike game that will immerse you in an exciting adventure, where you will play as a beautiful devil girl called upon to fight an army of sinister zombies. Your path of progress depends on your decisions. Various types of enemies, random rooms, and skills.

name: Rogue Survivors
summary: Rogue Survivor is a casual top-down shooter game where you try to survive as long as enemy waves finishes. Choose different heroes and different skills to make better builds.

name: Rocklings
summary: Rocklings is a strategy game where you explore endless caves, strategically mining rocks to build and expand your base. Unlock upgrades to discover new technologies in a curated campaign, or unleash your creativity with a built-in level editor.

name: Royal Decree!
summary: Inspired by boardgames and roguelike deckbuilders, we crafted a unique single-player strategy card game. Craft your deck, resolve events and crises, enact royal decrees, all while fighting to stave off the collapse of your kingdom and legacy.

name: Robzawar
summary: Robzawar is an addictive game that plunges players into the heart of an exciting struggle for survival in an alien world. As the main character, you find yourself in the role of a tough robot whose spaceship has crashed on a treacherous dinosaur planet.

name: RollScape
summary: Roll, strategize, and upgrade your way to victory in this accessible and ultra-satisfying, yet captivating roguelike. Will you reach the end before running out of rolls? KEEP MULTIPLYING!!

name: Rouge Tank
summary: 2D Tank Bullet Hell with powerups, and endless enemies. Play for your personal Highscore

name: Roboloop
summary: The puzzle game where you program a loop of commands to help a pair of robots navigate a factory floor

name: RocketRecoil
summary: Change the past by propelling yourself towards the future. Or something like that. Just blow yourself up with rockets to move around. The game's hard to play.

name: Robo Pose
summary: Robo Pose is a difficult game about Robot that needs to strike the right Pose in order to overcome procedurally generated obstacles.

name: Rope-Kun Adventure
summary: A very unique rope action game in which the main character "Rope-kun", who wields a rope, overcomes various gimmicks! The possibilities for ropes are endless, from carrying objects, to bouncing balls, to tying up and defeating enemies! Overcome with him the many difficulties that await you!

name: Royal Card Clash
summary: Defeat the royals in this solitary card game! This game is a total reimagining of classic card games like Solitaire, with just you and a deck of playing cards. You will have to think carefully and play your cards right to achieve victory.

name: Rocket Engineer
summary: Rocket Engineer is a simulation game about designing, testing and launching your rockets to explore. Rocket Engineer focuses on the engineering aspect of rockets, while allowing a fun exploration experience.

name: Roommates
summary: You have just entered the society, and since you have not found a satisfactory job for several months, you have to share an apartment with others. Your roommates is three lovely beauties, and then you will have a wonderful journey with three roommates and the people around you

name: Room231
summary: Room231 is a single player horror game, which is based on the famous creepy pasta called "Backrooms". Player must find an exit to leave room231 and reach the truth of room231.

name: Romantic Escapades
summary: "Romantic Escapades" is an ancient Chinese love simulation game. Through the development of the plot, players gradually develop relationships with various beauties in the game, and then gradually develop deeper and deeper intimate relationships.

name: Romance in the Cityscape
summary: Tired of the everyday life of a small town, you decide to start a new life in Vine City. There you will have to develop relationships with girls, build your path to love and adventure, plunging into an exciting world of new opportunities!

name: Rova
summary: A Cosy Space-Rover Simulator.

name: Roguesphere
summary: The whole universe is against you, but you fight anyway. Travel around planets and smash through anything in your way in this one finger game.

name: Road Racer
summary: Racing game

name: Rosen's Brigade
summary: Horizontal shooter

name: Romace
summary:
A visual novel with a diverse cast of characters from various ethnicities, exploring romance and relationships through an asexual lens.

This is an ongoing collaborative project created to showcase some aspects of the ace experience, by a team of three ace students for their honours year at university, There are multiple paths and endings, including platonic endings, available within our prototype!

name: Robot Arena Survivors
summary: Robot Arena Survivors is a single-player arena auto-shooter. You are piloting one of your own Hovercraft Units to fight against many waves of deadly robots. Unlock powerful abilities and rewards to get the job done.

name: Roaches: The Birthday Party
summary: Game includes 7 funny roach birthday party pictures as puzzles. Each puzzle is available as 25, 49 or 100 pieces. There is no time limit, reference image is always available during assembling. Take your time, enjoy assembling and have a fun with roach party pictures!

name: RoboSquad Revolution: Maverick Supporter Pack
summary: Embrace the Maverick spirit with Logan Paul hologram, exclusive weapon wraps, signature emotes, and Maverick Zoran skins in this epic supporter pack!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Aquatic Adventures
summary: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Dive deep with these aquatic themed tables with a unique center playfield kickback mechanic.

name: Ronin Rush
summary: Drawing inspiration from classic Hack & Slash, Beat ‘em Up, and SHMUP genres, we introduce our unique "Slice ‘em Up" adventure unfolding in fabled Japan! Navigate this Yokai-infested world utilizing a variety of tools, such as kunai, weapon arts, spirit abilities, and of course, the iconic katana!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Tabletop Terror
summary: 1 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Classic Tabletop Board Game themed ultra-wide table with multiple playfields!

name: Robin Hood: Shadow of Nottingham
summary: Liberate Nottingham from the dark alliances of Prince John as the daring outlaw Robin Hood. Stick to the shadows of the forest, explore the secrets of Nottinghamshire, fight the enemies of King Richard, gain the favor of factioand shape the fate of Nottingham forever. A historical fantasy RPG.

name: Roy Rattler
summary: Roy Rattler is a survival-horror FPS about being trapped in a theme park after a biotech experiment gone wrong brings it's collection of characters to life as murderous mutants! Engage in non-linear exploration and tense combat with limited resources as you search for an escape!

name: Rogue Citadel
summary: Unlock new defences, collect powerful items and create game-breaking synergies in this roguelite tower defence survivors game.

name: Rosy Rubicunda
summary: A small 4-map (+ 1 intro and 1 credits map) collaborative wad between OverflowingMocha and Stephyesterday. Features somewhat tough microslaughter and a cute color palette.

name: Rogue Light Deck Builder
summary:
Rogue Light Deck Builder is a digital wooden board game.

Your house needs a deck. You have a hammer. You have wood and you have nails. The light outside is faulty. You work, you earn. Freedom is $1,000,000.

Build a deck. Use your hammer. Drive the nails in. Scrimp and save. Freedom is just around the corner.

name: Rock 'n Roll
summary:
Your task is to guide the ball through a total of 32 levels. The path is stipulated, but also watch out for rumours giving tips regarding secret short-cuts.

Fundamentally there are two things which you must beware of in order to reach the finish unscathed: Firstly certain obstacles will deduct energy from your ball and secondly the ball must not be all-owed to fall into the precipice.

The world is constituted of 7 continents, each having it’s particular peculiarities. Each has it’s own signature tune and landscape.

name: Roped In
summary: An (optional) NSFW wild west love story between you and your lifelong cowboy best friend.

name: Rocket Arena 3
summary: All the goodness of Rocket Arena 2 and much much more. Rocket Arena 3 will redefine what a mod can and should be, going beyond simple gameplay and map additions and adding to the core engine itself. Thanks to the power of client side code in Quake 3, a huge number of features never before thought possible will now take Rocket Arena 3 to that next level. Welcome to the next generation of Rocket Arena, and the next evolution of Quake.

name: Rocket Arena 2
summary: Rocket Arena 2 is one of the most popular Quake 2 mods of all time. It's innovative "multi-arena" maps allows players to choose from up to 10 arenas on a single level, and have matches going on in all of them simulatnously. The refined "pickup" mode introduces players to the fast-paced teamplay style of Clan Arena.

name: Rogue Soul
summary:
Rogue Soul is an endless running platformer game developed by SoulGame Studio.
It has you take control of the titular character, Rogue Soul, as he runs through the city looking to raise the bounty on his head to 5,000 Soulons in order to become more famous than Borin Hood, the current most famous criminal in the city.

name: Rogue Soul 2
summary:
Rogue Soul 2 is an action platformer game developed by SoulGame Studio. It's the sequel to Rogue Soul.
Much like its predecessor, Rogue Soul 2 is a platformer game in which you control the titular hero, Rogue Soul, who runs automatically, and wreak havoc on enemies who would rather have him dead. However, Rogue Soul 2 is more story-driven and has a set of levels to be completed in linear progression rather than simply trying to get the best score you can. The game also has many other bonus modes that can be unlocked by reaching various milestones in the game.

name: Roskur's Run
summary: Roskur's Run is an evolution of classic 90's "Hedgehog" physics-based platforming with a deeper move set, upgrades, and a non-linear world to explore. The loop: Explore > Collect > Upgrade > SPEED RUN > Unlock > Explore

name: Roman City Tycoon
summary: Are you ready to build your own roman city and protect?

name: Roman Empire Farming
summary: Can you cultivate the lands of the ancient world and forge a prosperous legacy for generations to come?

name: Roguelites in Space
summary: Two roguelites in space! Enjoy a deck building and a space shooter with generated systems and enemies! Make your builds on each run and survive to the end!

name: Round My Corners
