summary: Round My Corners transforms your desktop with smooth, rounded edges, seamlessly integrated for a sleek look. Customize effortlessly, enjoy low resource consumption, and elevate your digital experience. Join the Round Corner Cult and embrace the future of desktop aesthetics today!

name: Rooster
summary: A Game Boy / Browser game based on "Rooster" by Alice in Chains.

name: Robot Trivia Funtime
summary: Robot Trivia Funtime is a multiplayer trivia game for PC, with a built-in question pack editor and Workshop support. It supports up to 6 other players on Steam and includes optional AI bots to play against.

name: Roomba Ruckus
summary:
Why do cats randomly bolt around the house at 10:51 PM?

The answer, my dear reader, is simple. They're protecting their homes. You see, cats have been fighting an endless war for centuries against a nearly invisible menace: Dust Bunnies.

Every night, these mischievous little creatures rise up from the cracks in the floorboards to cause havoc, but our faithful felines stop them in their tracks.

In all this time, all the cats have been able to do is break even. They stop the bunnies, but expend all their energy for the day simply holding them off until the next. (Why do you think cats nap all the time? They're exhausted!)

Today, though, the tides turn in the cats' favor with the latest technology on offer.
Enter: The Roomba

With this dust-defeating droid, the cats don't need to lift a paw to protect their people! Finally, they can diligently defeat their fearsome foes!

name: Room 14
summary: You are inside an endless Highschool but there is a way you can escape. Search in the hallways of the school and find the changes within them to reach Room 14.

name: Rocktopus
summary: Dive into a beautiful ocean of stop motion sea creatures and use eight of your fingers to control the eight legs of a xylophonic octopus. 'Rocktopus' is a music game with no rhythm required that works with QWERTY, AZERTY, and Dvorak keyboards. It was made for Stop Motion Jam 2020 with RAD studio, play dough, googly eyes, Fruit Loops, feathers, and artificial bacon bits. The jellyfish are real jelly!

name: Romance Choice
summary: Romance Choice is a short and strange, 4th wall breaking dating simulator with a surprising amount of emotion and some very clever twists.

name: Rosetta and the Well
summary:
Meet Rosetta Halloway, a kind and hardworking young adult with a curious streak and a love of gardening.

In her backyard is a stone waterwell filled to the brim with black water.

The fact that this well didn't previously exist there is one thing, but then strange noises start coming from within it, which prompts Rosetta to investigate.

Out comes a mysterious mermaid, Galatea of the Well, who appears to be particularly interested in getting acquainted with her.

So, what exactly is this piscine stranger's deal? Do you have the strength to find out?

name: Roomba Out!
summary:
What's more annoying than the noise made by a Roomba? NOTHING! It's never a Shiba Inu's responsibility to withstand such an artificial "idiot."

Because you know what... they can ONLY turn RIGHT! So loud and unintelligent, the robot doesn't deserve to stay at my house. It's time to throw it out.

Roomba OUT! is a strategy game where the player needs to control the Shiba Inu to "guide" the Roomba out of the house, based on the fact that the idiot robot can only turn right when facing obstacles.

name: Roomba Rail Rider
summary: Play as an extremely cool bird grinding on a plasma trail behind a winged roomba, as you shoot floating crystals to the beat of the music!

name: Rogue Bot Adventure
summary: Rogue Bot Adventure is an on-rails 3D platformer. Your goal is to collect the 10 parts of your ship and escape the enemies and hazards of this mysterious planet, including robots, lasers, acid, meteors, and more. Jump, slash, and reflect using your ancient artifact.

name: Roiders
summary: Become an asteroid miner and loot your way to supremacy! Fight waves of vicious aliens or battle against your friends.

name: Rocket Poker
summary: Master the art of deck building in this rogue like dopamine infused poker adventure. Combine enhancements to boost your deck with up to 18 unique modifiers on each card at once.

name: Rocket Panda
summary: Enter a thrilling journey to save Biscuit Land from the clutches of the wicked Biscuit Head! Join Rocket Panda and his loyal band of Badgers as they take flight to rescue their kidnapped comrades and reclaim their homeland.

name: Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade
summary: "City building" and "Trade" simulation game by Rota, the princess of the forest country! Rota strives to realize her plan for sea trade with the entire world. Let's greatly develop the port town of Portamare through the production, import and export of goods, and business negotiation battles!

name: Roberto el Lagarto
summary: Take on an exciting stealth mission as Roberto the Lizard, a cunning thief. Use special abilities to avoid enemies while you steal valuable treasures in a museum full of challenges.

name: Roboban: Colors
summary: Roboban: Colors is a single player Sokoban style puzzle video game in which you control robots that have to reach their recharge sites, but not before ordering the boxes in their corresponding destination.

name: Rock Life: The Rock Simulator - Rock Pack #3
summary: Unlock more of the most rocks of rocks... in this Rock Pack! Known as the more special rocks in Rock Life: The Rock Simulator. You can use these special rocks in both the Multiplayer mode, "Rock Together", and in the Singleplayer mode, "Become Rock".

name: Roku and Rei
summary: Dive into the world of Roku and Rei, a puzzle game where the protagonists move in reverse directions! Use their ability to interact with color-coded objects and tackle mind-bending challenges.

name: Rolling Lee
summary: A game where you control a rolling ball named Lee!

name: Robert on Earth
summary: Running a special underground farm in the distant and desolate future, exploring various crop abilities. Mining, fishing, meeting new robot friends, discovering new unknown areas, and exploring the truth that belongs to you

name: Road Master 3D
summary: Beautify the environment and build roads that everyone will like. Plant seeds, water them, and cut them after they grow to create a beautiful environment. Building roads has never been this fun. Show what a good builder you are in this easy-to-play game.

name: RobinWords
summary: RobinWords is an word puzzle game that challenges players to form words from a given set of letters. Players can enjoy a single-player mode against an AI or compete with friends in multiplayer mode.

name: Rocket Racing: Fuse Starter Quest Pack
Rock Band 3: Deluxe
summary:
Rock Band 3 Deluxe is a mod for Rock Band 3 with the intention to improve and expands upon Rock Band 3 in every way possible.

With custom track themes, a higher song limit, an FC indicator, break countdowns, an expanded HUD, up to 60FPS venues, "padtar", fully customizable gameplay, many pro chart upgrades, and so much more.

name: Roll: A Puzzle Contraption
summary: Roll is a creative puzzle game where you build contraptions out of stickers to roll, fling, and guide a hamster to its goal. Collect stickers as you complete puzzles, then build your own wacky contraptions for Hammy.

name: Roll 'n' Watch
summary: Roll 'n' Watch is a simulated marble racing game where we bring the marble customization, beautiful tracks, customization, and the randomness of the beloved trending races you watch below those videos on social media.

name: Robot Street Fighting Games
summary: Ready yourself for rescue of girl from robot games vs machine games. Robot fighting tournament starting in new grand robot fighting games.

name: Road To Siren Hills: Dark Journey
summary:
Your car has died in the middle of nowhere.

"Rockman 3: Burst Chaser is a level & gameplay hack.

Aside from level edited stages, Burst Chaser’s main feature is that Rockman moves faster!

Give a toast to a retired prison guard, everyone drinks the punch and they all pass out or die. Then you walk out of prison and start your life anew on some mean streets.

Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven is a full remake of the groundbreaking non-linear RPG Romancing SaGa 2, which originally launched in Japan in 1993.

Embark on an adventure featuring both new and classic SaGa franchise features, complete with Japanese and English voiceovers, original and rearranged compositions, and much more! This is an ideal entry point for new players and provides an amped-up experience for longtime fans.

name: RoboKiden
summary: RoboKiden is an innovative team-based action game where five players collaborate to control a single mecha in strategic battles. Integrating Web3 technology and blockchain, the game uses the $KIDEN token for in-game transactions and NFT trading. Players can earn and trade $KIDEN, enhancing gameplay with digital ownership and economic opportunities. Developed by The Breach Studios and powered by Elixir Games, RoboKiden offers a unique gaming experience with vibrant characters and dynamic battles.

name: Rotosaurus Adventure

name: Rocket Car: Ultimate Ball League Machines - Premium Edition
Rosa's Garden
summary:
A calm gardening game.

Rosas Garden is a calm and poetic flower game about gardening with roses. Dig little holes in the ground, find seeds, plant them and watch how slowly a rose grows. By combining fully blossomed roses, you can breed new seeds. There are over 40 combinations available and each rose is named after a famous women, paying a small tribute to their lives and achievements.

name: RoboGal: Gaga Delta Lady
summary: Rei-Bo was living peacefully on the island of Plutobell, until a giant spaceship crashed into the place! This is a fun and humorous saga to solve this incident full of obstacles and traps! Choose the levels in the order you want, defeat the ship's members and get their weapons in RoboGal!

name: Rocket Crowbar
summary:
Some mods out there work to provide a realistic atmosphere or a sense of being a part of a military unit. Others seek to bring popular movies to Half-Life in order to replicate the feeling of the movie in a game. Still others evoke fear and revulsion with a dark, gloomy feel. And then you have mods that make you laugh your ass off. Rocket Crowbar is of the latter type, and one of the best out there right now. If you're looking for wacky fun, Rocket Crowbar delivers. In spades.

Rocket Crowbar is basically a weapons modification mod, but the new HL 1.1-compatible version has a couple of extra tricks up its sleeve. First of all, the server can enable a CTF mode on any deathmatch level. All you have to do is make sure teamplay is on and that at least two teams are listed in the server options. Best of all, you can have up to six teams for some really chaotic fun. Secondly, the mod includes the option of a little pregame poll. The person hosting the server just has to edit the appropriate text files in the mod directory and activate the poll via a console command (see below). There is also a very basic bot included, if you're really short on people to kill. All right, you say. Enough with the extra stuff; let's see the weapons!

All of the Rocket Crowbar weapons have different effects than the standard Half-Life ones. Most notable is the secondary fire on the crowbar, which fires a rocket (and thus, the name of the mod). Weapon balance is taken up a bit in Rocket Crowbar; many weapons are quite lethal. If you're the type who's used to shrugging off a few hits and only trying to dodge shots from big weapons, you're in for a rude awakening. Fortunately, the "drunken rocket" effect helps to offset the crowbar as a major weapon. I won't list all of the new effects here, as there is fun to be had in discovering what things do. The Glock has a secondary fire that will push you a little in the direction you're facing. This lets you boost yourself to higher places without the complete mobility provided by the usual grappling hooks, which is a nice balancer. Another example of a highly lethal but fairly balanced weapon is the "gravity well" hand grenade. The effect is quite spectacular, but it's easy to get hoist with your own petard when using them. The rocket launcher throws out a friendly NPC, which is actually a very powerful proximity mine. Other effects include the shotgun firing a flying scientist, snarks with eye lasers (and the ability to look through the snarks' eyes) and the tau cannon's teleport effect.

name: Robinsons: Play the Game with Tim Henman
summary: Cross-promotional LCD game for Robinsons fruit drink and Wimbledon athlete Tim Henman

name: Rocket Crowbar: Source
summary:
Remember the good old days with Rocket Crowbar, when you could throw a rocket from your crowbar, use gravity grenades to suck enemies (and sometimes yourself) in, and fire scientists from your shotgun?

Now, it's evolved and upgraded.

* Silly multiplayer action, full of stressed out situations
* Tons of goofy weapons
* RC2 will be making use of the new physics engine more than before

Current features

Weapons:

- Rocket Crowbar. Yes, it's in and it is working pretty well!
- Two gravity grenades:
- Repel Grenade. Explodes in a pushing wave, sending anything around it flying! Cars aren't good cover anymore.
- Orbit Grenade. Instead of exploding, it starts disobeying the laws of physics, hovering up into the blue sky above. Not only that, it attracts most objects, be them heavy, light or a not-so-careful player, and brings them up with it! Warning for harsh landings. Try stacking a few of them together...
- Constant laser tripmine: Fires out a laser which will burn any players who come into contact with it
- Pulse laser tripmine: Fires out a powerful laser every 5 seconds which will instantly kill the player
- Repel Satchel/SLAM: Same as the grenade except you can trigger it, great for traps!
- The Incinerator: A Satchel/SLAM which sets all nearby objects on fire... including players.
- Scientist Shotgun: Fires a scientist ragdoll at your foes! And man, they hurt.. Secondary fire fires a scientist on fire (Fire! Fire!) which explodes after a few seconds.
- The Heavy Duty Physcannon: Cars...
- Ninja Rope: Worms style! Can even pull objects towards you for broader ways of use... just watch out for the walls!

Maps:

RC_Deathcube - Inspired by the classic killbox, this box can really be filled with death, with four boulder traps and lots of ways to combine the RC weapons with mass killing..

Other features:

* When pushed too hard into a wall, you get hurt!
* Gravity gun can push players

Updates as they come!

name: Robbers in Disguise

Progress through puzzles, traps and unexpected situations using coordination and dexterity to complete your mission!

The mechanics are mainly based on physics and environment. It’s played with a controller on an undivided screen.

summary: "Battle Roosters" is a solo-developed 2D top-down shooter where players must survive each round by collecting yellow energy dots on the field, navigating map obstacles, and employing various tactics to vanquish monsters, earn coins, and secure rewards.

name: Robox
summary: A German text adventure game with High-Res graphics and text published in 64'er Software Extra Nr.04: Abenteuer-Spiele - Volume 1. In the distant future you're the winner of a trip to a holiday planet. And an adventure ensues....Swiss Commodore 64 game developed by Laro Schatzer and Marc Pilloud.

name: Robot Battle
summary: Robot Battle is a sci-fi action game. Players need to use random items to fight enemies in random levels, survive as much as possible, and finally find a way to escape from this planet. The rougelike elements of this game make each adventure completely different for players.

name: Robo Dome
summary: Compete in the famed Robo Dome championship as Rei Castor. Test your ability in this roguelite shoot em’ up against a barrage of enemies and projectiles. Face off against giant robots and other contestants in an attempt to come on top of this year’s Robo Dome championship in Valhalla City.

name: Rockman & Forte FC
summary: A demake of Mega Man & Bass in 8-bit style.

name: Rooftop Rascal: The Spooky Cat
summary: In "Rooftop Rascal: The Spooky Cat," take control of a nimble cat scaling fire escapes and rooftops in a Halloween-themed adventure. Test your quick thinking and jumping skills as you climb higher and higher to reach the rooftop.
developers: Christian Marcell de Oliveira trading as chroda
publishers: Christian Marcell de Oliveira trading as chroda

name: Roots of Harmony
summary: Text-based 4X with a focus on turf war and resource management. Roots of Harmony is an old-school keyboard-controlled casual game where you have to lead your colony to different stages of development, while facing various threats and managing your doctrines and disciples.

name: Robert's Spooktacular Ghost Train
summary:
Do you like those fairground ghost trains? Have you ever wanted to create your own?

Now you can!

Robert The Skeleton needs your help with his ghost train!
So build your ride, try it out yourself, open it to the public to collect points and unlock more scares!

Make it SPOOKTACULAR!

name: Rottweiler
summary: an interactive essay on memes, labels, cauterization, and the decay beyond idealism.

name: Royalty Free-For-All
summary: Royalty Free-For-All is a hand-drawn cartoon Party Brawler featuring an original cast of characters inspired by the public domain! Join Dorothy, Sweeney Todd, Mother Goose, and more as they duke it out in hand-drawn platform fighting mayhem!

name: Royal Montgomery Raceways
summary:
Royal Montgomery Raceways is a vintage racing game set between the years 1913 and 1939; covering the golden age of racing across the world.
RMR is still in development.

name: Rolling Ex.tre.me
summary: Street luge arcade game by Galeco in which you slide down a mountain against other competitors in an illegal race.

name: Robinson Crusoe
summary: As Robinson Crusoe, a 17th-century castaway, you must survive on a tropical island in this action-adventure game. Explore a dynamic world, uncover secrets, craft tools, build shelters, and defend against dangers. Your choices shape your fate—will you conquer the wilds or fall victim to them?

name: Rogue Point
summary: Welcome to Rogue Point, a 4 player, cooperative shooter. Team up with friends and build an elite tactical team. Plan and execute challenging missions in a dynamic Rogue-Lite structure with hundreds of ways to play.

name: Rockman 5: Double Jumper
summary:
Rockman 5: Double Jumper is a hack that features a new skill for Rockman, the Double Jumper (press the jump button on mid-air to perform it, like Forte and Zero).

The hack also features:

- new level designs
- new boss move patterns
- new weapons behavior

name: Rottenroots
summary: Rottenroots is a branching narrative role-playing game set in a dystopian world where conformity means survival. Guide Salem through moral dilemmas, time-pressured choices, and dynamic character interactions. Your decisions shape his personality, relationships, and fate in this gripping story.

name: Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade: Nekozeno Shin - Collaboration Commemorative Residentization DLC
summary: A collaboration DLC project between "Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade" and Vtuber "Nekozeno Shin"! The phantom thief "Nekozeno Shin" appears in the world of "Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade" transformed into a pixelated character!?

name: Rough Rivals
summary: Experience the perfect blend of American football and bar brawling. Be brutal and cunning, customize your team, upgrade your players, and dominate the field! Challenge your friends in split-screen to relive the joy of couch gaming. May the fiercest one win!

name: Rogue Loops
summary: Rogue Loops is a roguelite action game where a trapped family battles to escape an endless loop. Combine unique skills and relics to create powerful synergies against the loop’s guardians. As you grow stronger, so does the loop—can you break free from this relentless cycle?

name: Romania Prop Hunt
summary: Romania Prop Hunt is a multiplayer game where you play with your friends and hide as a prop, an object from the game, and the Hunter tries to find them!

name: Roam
summary: ROAM is a silly sandbox game where you play as a wild horse! Customize your horse and five members of your herd and explore the open world! Reunite and take care of your herd! Breed your horses to welcome new foals! Choose to cause havoc in the local towns! However you play, roam free!

name: Robot Hunt
summary:
Robot Hunt is a new fun FPS game where your mission is to destroy a number of robots.

You should try to get as high score as possible on the three difficulty levels, easy medium and hard. So you have to be careful using your ammo.... and your health, because you get more points of these.

There are two courses to play on .... for now.

name: Rooftop Rascal: The Glitch Cat
developers: Christian Marcell de Oliveira trading as chroda
publishers: Christian Marcell de Oliveira trading as chroda

name: Rocket League: Season 17
summary:
High-score chasing and racing await as we press play on Rocket League Season 17. Prepare to level up your Soccar skills as this neo-arcade-inspired season kicks off on December 4!
⁠
In Season 17, try out the Online Free Play feature, battle for supremacy in the Neo Tokyo (Arcade) Arena, master the new Split Shot game mode, and look forward to leveling up a new Rocket Pass!

name: Robo Ride & Glide
summary: Ride, Glide, and collect powerups to upgrade your hover car, and gain an advantage against your friends in a random mini game

name: Rogue Monster Rush
summary: Rogue Monster Rush is a blend of roguelike and tower defense. Collect and command an array of monster defenders, unleash strategic player abilities, unlock tons of upgrades, to defend your town from the invading robots.

name: Robbing the Princess
summary: Join Alec and Suzy as they try to steal a ship's cargo in this short point and click adventure game

name: Rocket League: Season 15 Rookie Pack
summary: Unlock the Tygris car, CNTCT-1 Wheel, Silencer Decal painted Black for the Tygris Body, and the Hat Trick Player Banner in the Season 15 Rookie Pack!

name: Rocket League: Painted Power Bundle
summary: The Painted Power bundle is available for a limited time! Unlock Gold Painted Octane, Gold Painted Dueling Dragons Goal Explosion, and more Painted Black Market and Exotic items.

name: ROAM: Wild Horse Simulator
summary: ROAM is a silly sandbox game where you play as a wild horse! Customize your horse and five members of your herd and explore the open world! Reunite and take care of your herd! Breed your horses to welcome new foals! Choose to cause havoc in the local towns! However you play, roam free!

name: Robot Fury: Mech Combat Simulator
summary: Robot Fury is a mech combat simulator where you can feel like a true robot warrior. Fight enemies with a powerful flamethrower, soar into battle with your jetpack, and finish off foes with precise machine gun headshots. Customize your mech and engage in exhilarating, epic battles!

name: Rocket Simulator
summary: Travel with your spacecraft throughout the solar system based on realistic Kepler's laws of gravity. Invent your own routes between planets, use gravity, explore space, trade, upgrade your spaceship and enjoy the beautiful scenery!

name: Roots and Recipes: Farm and Restaurant Simulator
summary: Grow crops, cook meals, and manage your restaurant in a colorful low-poly world! Balance farming and cooking, expand your farm, and delight customers with fresh, delicious dishes.

name: Room and a Half
summary:
Play a hilarious game full of surprises and challenges!

Will you be able to win the game of Room and a Half?
Help an extremely funny and unique set of characters - in a hilarious game that will surprise and challenge you all the way to the final stage....

name: Room and a Half 2
summary: One Roach to rule them all

name: Rose Guns Days
summary: multilingual HD-upscale version of 07th Expansion's Rose Guns Days by Mangagamer.

name: Road59: A Yakuza’s Last Stand
summary: Born as the heir to a crime syndicate, yet longing for an ordinary and peaceful life, the kind-hearted protagonist fights desperately to protect their loved ones. Set against a backdrop of towering skyscrapers, this visual novel weaves together the lives of 23 characters in a modern-day legend.

name: Rootmare
summary: Step into a world where the pursuit of beauty leads to unimaginable horror. As Nate, face off against mutated monstrosities and navigate a labyrinth of danger with limited resources. Expose the truth behind COSMIC’s experiments, while not succumbing to the nightmare within.

name: Road Rash 2
summary: An unreleased Game Gear port of Road Rash II.

name: Roger Kills The Smiths!
summary: Murder the members of the Smith Family from the hit tv show "American Dad". Explore the residence and destroy your targets using a variety of weapons.

name: Ropebound
summary: Swing through ropes and overcome obstacles.

name: Royal Kingdom
summary:
From the creators of Royal Match comes a brand new match 3 puzzle adventure in Royal Kingdom, starring the extended Royal Family!

You’ll meet King Richard, King Robert's younger brother, as well as a charming cast of new characters, including Princess Bella and the Wizard, to embark on a journey to build legendary kingdoms! Solve match 3 puzzles to explore new lands and defeat the Dark King & his army!

name: Robotville: Dawn of Robot AI
summary:
Play Robot, Play! Embark on an extraordinary adventure in a vast, open-world playground, where a futuristic world brimming with endless possibilities awaits you and where robots reign supreme! In this massive immersive 3D open world sandbox you can explore city sky islands, lush serene nature on surrounding islands, and even a subaquatic realm. Race against the clock in thrilling super runs, find hidden collectibles, discover Easter eggs, compete in unpredictable challenges, or simply wander and marvel at the stunning scenery while you navigate through diverse ecosystems and explore this endless 3D open world sandbox.
Robotville is a 3D open world sandbox filled with wonder and excitement, where endless exploration and replayability are limitless. With teleports to all world locations, traveling throughout the game is a breeze to breathtaking nature landscapes filled with realistic plants and animals from planet Earth and other alien worlds, all brought to life with stunning realism. Immerse yourself in a vibrant universe where robots and nature coexist in perfect harmony.

name: Rock, Paper, Scissors, Boom!
summary: Rock, Paper, Scissors, Boom! takes the concept of traditional RPS (Pro term), and disregards it.

name: Road Island Adventure
summary: Embark on an epic journey in Road Island Adventure, an open-world RPG set in a vibrant world of living cars! Compete in high-stakes races, uncover the mysteries of a strange signal, and build your dream community while exploring a diverse island full of charm and discovery.

name: Rooftop Rascal: The Claus Cat
summary: In "Rooftop Rascal: The Claus Cat," take control of a nimble cat scaling fire escapes and rooftops in a Christimas-themed adventure. Test your quick thinking and jumping skills as you climb higher and higher to reach the rooftop.
developers: Christian Marcell de Oliveira trading as chroda
publishers: Christian Marcell de Oliveira trading as chroda

name: Rookie Table Tennis
summary: 3D local multiplayer ping pong game

name: Rodgerbints: Romance and Scandal in High Society
summary: Experience a story of glamour, romance and secrets. Make key decisions that will change the fate of the characters. Every choice matters!

name: Robo Rescue
summary: Dive into an electrifying retro arcade adventure with Robo Rescue! Set in a pixelated cyber world, players control a courageous ship tasked with saving the hapless robo-citizens scattered across grid-like mazes.

name: Robot Anarchy
summary:
The Retro 90’s FPS You’ve Been Waiting For!
The world is under siege by the ruthless robots of the MacroCyber corporation.

name: Roller-Skating
summary: Roller-skate through challenging stages!

name: Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade: Aname Momo - Collaboration Commemorative Residentization DLC
Rod Roll
summary: Keep rolling! Gift drops every hour!

name: Roost
summary: 'ROOST' is a brief atmospheric First Person Horror-Exploration game, set in the fictional North-East English town of Mournbrough - a place harbouring dark secrets and seemingly lost to time. Welcome to your happy place.

name: Rockitty
summary: Learn the power to ricochet to rebound your way back to your ship, meow!

name: Rome: Nightmares of Empire
summary: Rome: Nightmares of Empire is an Action game with RPG elements, charming pixel graphics and interesting mechanics. Defeat your opponents, acquire and create equipment, improve your skills to face the great threat, rise up, hero and save Rome !

name: Royal Wars: Farm TD
summary: Royal Wars: Farm TD is a free-to-play tower defense game where strategy meets luck. Place randomly selected towers, merge them to unlock higher tiers, and defend your kingdom through multiple levels. Plant crystals, manage resources, and prepare for epic battles.

name: Rolling Star
summary: Bursting with hilarious dialogue and comical encounters! The second installment of the super-exhilarating Metroidvania series is here!!

name: Room Washer
summary: A thrilling game full of satisfaction as you become a sponge character and clean up rooms! Clear stages by scrubbing away dirt with a cute character while dodging enemies. Once you play, you’ll be hooked on the fun!

name: Ropuka's Idle Island
summary: A cozy idle game that sits anywhere on your desktop. Watch the frog cut grass, upgrade his tools, and decorate the island while you work or relax.

name: Roulette Dungeon
summary: Roulette Dungeon is a turn-based rogue-like where you spin a roulette wheel to defeat your enemies. Master the balance between strategic planning and unpredictable luck by placing bets, using special abilities, and collecting items to outsmart your foes and conquer the dungeon.

name: Roulette Rush
summary: The setting is a demonic casino with bosses themed around different casino games- Black Jack, Bingo, Slot Machines, and yourself with a Roulette themed weapon. Earn chips, place bets, and become more powerful!

name: Rolling Macho: Tumbling to Earth
summary: Rolling Macho: Tumbling to Earth is a rolling action game where you roll and squat your way back to Earth after being stranded in space.

name: Robin Hood: Sherwood Defenders
summary: As the legendary Robin Hood, fight the Sheriff's forces in the open field by defending the Merry Men's allies from invasions in this tower defense game. Produce resources, build up your fortifications, place units, and then join in the battle yourself!

name: Roommate: Asami - Oku-sama wa Joshikousei
summary: As the newlywed husband of your student Onohara Asami, you live with your student bride and help her with homework as well as the rigors of living together and keeping the marriage a secret in school.

name: Rocket League: Season 17 Veteran Pack
summary: Unlock the Sentinel car (Sky Blue), Nucleon Clutch Wheels, Toon Sketch Boost, and Toon Sketch Trail in the Season 17 Veteran Pack! You'll also get 500 Credits! Be sure to get this limited-time pack before it's gone!

name: Rope'n'Fly 3: Dusk Till Dawn
summary:
Rope'n'Fly - From Dusk Till Dawn is the sequel to the app Rope'n'Fly.

Use your ropes to swing a destructible ragdoll from one skyscraper to the others. You have full control over your ropes, touch on a building to throw your rope there, touch again to release it and fly through the sky. Perform various kind of jumps to get achievements, attach to flying planes or balloons and try to beat your friends or all other players by competing with them for the best score.

name: Rotational
summary: A short platformer where instead of controlling the character, you rotate the stage.

name: Rogue Gladius Survivors
summary: Aim to be the fastest conqueror in the world with special moves and the strongest build! Rogue Gladius Survivors is an Isekai Musou SpeedRun survivors-like game.

name: Roots Devour
summary: Extend your roots, imbibe fresh blood, and expand without end. Roots Devour is a strategic exploration game centered around a card-connecting mechanism. Drive your frenzied roots through swamps and over frozen mountains, invading human cities until the darkness... descends.

name: Robes & Wrinkles
summary: You have been betrayed... Climb your tower, reclaim your throne and show that good-for-nothing apprentice whose boss in this first-person, physics-based power-fantasy game! Let none escape your wrath, even the rats...

name: Roadkill Agora
summary:
Go out into the city and find yourself. Converse with wayward spirits and the dead at dawn. Walk a mile over twisting streets and wander through the alleys and nooks of a dreaming world.

Explore a city as it shifts and moves over the course of several days.
Find your way into over a dozen unique interiors.
Collect the trinkets of the brooding streets and make yourself an identity.
Talk with several NPCs as they enter and leave the stage.
Discover the city's secrets, maybe even a secret ending if you can.
Sweet dreams.

name: Rocket League: Season 17 Rocketeer Pack
summary: Unlock the Dingo car (Titanium White), Ultralex Wheels (Black), Interstellar Decal (Crimson), and Ambustion Boost (Titanium White) in the Season 17 Rocketeer Pack! You'll also get the Shark Attack Goal Explosion (Burnt Sienna) and 1000 Credits!

name: Rock 'N Racing Off Road & Grand Prix
summary:
This pack includes the games: Grand Prix Rock 'N Racing and Rally Rock 'N Racing.

Enjoy 2 games in 1 with this irresistible speed games pack!

name: Robot Boxing: Real Fighting Steel Battle
summary:
Clash of Titans, Built for Battle!
Unleash Steel Fury, Rule the Arena.
Robot Boxing: Where Legends are Forged!

name: Robmembor
summary: Help Hannah, an Alzheimer's patient, by solving puzzles followed by a witty robot - become a mind repairer now!

name: Rock Flipper
summary: Rock flipping simulator

name: Rocket Squad: Infinity
summary:
Rocket Squad is a team-based first-person shooter.
Infiltrate perilous planets, gather resources, and return safely to your shelter.
Utilize each character's unique abilities and strategically form your team to restore order to the universe.

name: Rocket Boots Mania: Space Train
summary: Rocket Boots Mania: Space Train is a 100% free endless runner with a twist—you’re in full control. Rocket-Jump, Wall-Run, and Fly to rescue lost cargo on a speeding space train. Race through the galaxy or relax with the chill vibes of vast space vistas.

name: Rock Crusher
summary: Crush, upgrade, explore! This incremental clicker puts you in control of a little rock crusher on a mysterious planet. Uncover its secrets and your destiny as you complete the skill tree.

name: RockBeasts
summary:
Lead a band of misfits on a roller-coaster ride to stardom in the age of MTV, rock anthems, and bad haircuts. ROCKBEASTS is a story-driven, role-playing management game that puts you in the shoes of a manager of an up-and-coming rock band.

Rock ‘n’ Roll Band Manager: This band has real potential, but they need your help to live up to it. Their tunes can revolutionize the music industry and redefine genres - but what good is a great song if no one hears it? It’s your job to land your clients a record deal and negotiate the terms on their behalf. Will you help them fight for their creative freedom, or sell them out to the industry bigwigs?

Coffee and Cigarettes for Breakfast: Sex, drugs, and rock ’n’ roll can only get you so far. Somebody has to make sure the band is in shape to play the next gig. This is where you come in. Make sure they eat a half-decent meal every now and again, fix their gear, get them to rehearse… Hope you like herding cats!

Don’t Stop Me Now: It’s your job to book the venue, finalize the setlist and ensure the gig goes according to the plan. Each successful performance is a step toward fame and glory. Sure, that “club” was just a grimy basement, and the audience barely outnumbered the band - but even rock legends have to start somewhere, right?

name: Road Toads
summary: Road Toads is a frantic local multiplayer party game for 2 to 8 players. A twist on the classic Frogger, Road Toads pitches you against your friends as you barge into each other across roads, woods and rivers.

name: RoboSamurai
summary: RoboSamurai is a 3rd-person fast-paced sword-fighting action/slasher game about Nix: a robot mechanic turned katana-wielding fighter. Set in a cyberpunk dystopian city filled with corruption and tyrannical corporations waiting for him to let his guard down.

name: Rock 'N Roller
summary:
In Rock'N Roller, the player takes control of a buggy that must find, in each of the 30 stages, the six parts of a prototype car, which are hidden throughout the stage.

In each stage there are three types of enemies: fast cars, armed off-roaders and a giant helicopter equipped with missiles. In addition, there are various traps (such as dangerous bridges, oil puddles, mines, etc.) that must be avoided and a fuel limit that must be taken into account.

name: Rogue Hands!
summary: A rogue game aimed at delivering a thrilling experience, crafting a powerful genre, and pushing forward to the end!

name: Rogunky
summary: Descend into the unknown in this unique roguelike platformer! Brave a constantly shifting dungeon filled with deadly monsters, traps, and powerful relics. The deeper you go, the greater the challenge. Uncover secrets, explore diverse environments, and fight to discover what awaits at the bottom.

name: Roll a Dice
summary: "Roll a Dice" is a dice game full of strategy and luck, combining classic props and set effects. In this 8x6 building table, players need to roll dice, activate cells, and trigger different effects to accumulate points and challenge higher goals.

name: Rogue Conflict
summary: Rogue Conflict is a turn-based strategy roguelike. Combining tactical wargame combat with procedural roguelike features, Rogue Conflict is a game made for both wargamers and general turn based game enthusiasts alike.

name: Rotschwert
summary:
Fast-Paced Action Slasher

- Face dozens of strange machines, built for a strange purpose
- Cut through enemies before they can take a shot, or engage from afar by summoning your "friends"
- 4 Segments to traverse, holding vague hints and recollections
- 4 modes of play for experienced and newbie Visitors, each with its own finale
- 2 stranded Rabbits connected by fate
- 1 bedtime story to be told

name: Rock City Empire
summary: Digital Chocolate's budding Empire franchise makes a detour into downtown Rock City, turning the one-time nightclub management sim into a tour of duty in the metal bar scene. Instead of just overseeing one club, players must now juggle three exploding rock venues, giving the game a serious infusion of depth or difficulty, depending on your ability to keep booking new talent to please ever-fickle tastes, buy new equipment, and keep the staff happy. It's a smart evolution for the Empire franchise -- this is not an easy re-skin like The Sopranos Bada Bing! Manager.

name: Rogue Rampage
summary: A high-speed FPS where you harness powerful skills, combined with roguelike elements in a survival shooter. Level up, acquire powerful items, and fight against stronger enemies to stay alive! Build a different loadout in every run and discover the best strategy to dominate the battlefield.

name: Roses Shoot Red, Violets Shoot Blue
summary: Join Rose and Violet in an epic twin-stick shooter quest! Use their color-coded shots to defeat matching foes as you battle through prairies, deserts, glittering caves, and more. Outsmart enemies, conquer powerful bosses, and restore your kingdom in this vibrant adventure!

name: Robbery Day
summary: This is a first-person shooter where the player controls one of three characters. Each has two types of weapons, allowing them to adapt to different tactical situations. The gameplay combines dynamic shootings and robberies.

name: Rock Island
summary: Explore the mystery of the mysterious cube at the center of Boulder Island, dig out endless treasures, wake up the sleeping little boulder people, and lead them to create prosperity!

name: Roads of Rage
summary: Burn rubber in this action packed beat 'em up featuring car centric combat! Rage through the streets of Road City smashing any vehicle in your way with one of 4 unique characters. Fight your way through 8 levels and bosses using never before seen car martial arts!

name: Road 7
summary: Road 7 is an endless arcade racer. Dodge obstacles in classic mode or cruise freely in peaceful mode. With five difficulty levels, it suits all skill levels. Occasionally, you'll enter anomalous zones with surprises or hybrid zones blending different environments.

name: RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business
summary: RoboCop: Rogue City – Unfinished Business is a new standalone adventure of RoboCop: Rogue City. OmniTower is their fortress, violence their language. Face elite mercenaries all the way to the top of the tower and enforce the law amidst the chaos!

name: Rocket Penguin
summary: Rocket Penguin is a unique 2D flying game that may seem simple but requires master-level skills to reach outer space.

name: Rootbound
summary: A physics-based action adventure about a plantling’s quest to save its home from a mysterious blight. Equipped with your sentient backpack, you venture into a broken world. Meet lost souls, solve ancient puzzles, fight dangerous monsters, and uncover the secrets of a long-forgotten civilization.

name: Rorry's Race
summary: How far can you drive in Rorry’s car? You have 3 different levels to drive through. Good luck!

name: Rogue Candy
summary: Welcome to the sweet and chaotic world of Rogue Candy! A 3D Action Rogue-Like FPS where the landscape is crafted from sugary treats and the inhabitants are living, jiggly candy creatures.

name: Rogue Monster Theolodorus
summary: An entry for 7DRL Challenge 2025. A traditional roguelike (turn-based, grid-based, permadeath, no metaprogression) meets a deckbuilder cardbattler with win16 visuals and chip audio.

name: Room 54: Horde Survival
summary: Survive at Hordes of Creatures in this 'Spin-Off' modality of our Main Title - Room 54. Gear up , unlock new weapons / abilities and fight!

name: Road Storm
summary: PICO-8 arcade shooter/racer.

name: Rocket League: Season 18
summary:
Get ready for the soccar celebration of the decade, just not this decade. Buckle up and blast off to the near future in Rocket League Season 18 starting March 14 at 9 AM PT.
⁠
⁠In Season 18, drift into the all-new Futura Garden Arena and experience the next generation of competition. But even at the dawn of a new age, style is everything — and few things say timeless like a mean lean muscle machine.

name: Romestead
summary: Rome has fallen! Rebuild civilization in this action-adventure survival game for 1-8 players. Fight, build towns and earn favor with the Roman gods! ...or just farm your crops.

name: Royal Revolt!
summary: Royal Revolt is a reverse T-defense game with beautiful 3D graphics and intuitive touch controls! Lead your soldiers to victory against your greedy relatives who have stolen your father’s throne.

name: Rogue Zodiacs
summary: A content-rich, turn-based roguelike with truly endless replay value achieved by having countless varieties because all contents are unique. 250+ unique abilities, 200+ unique relics, 16+ locations, 40+ hazards, 90+ unique enemies, and the 12 Zodiacs guarantee each of your runs will be different.

name: Rosabella: Eternal Light and Magic in Harmony
summary: Meet Rosabella, a young girl with a heart full of curiosity, who discovers that she is the only one who can restore the lost light to the kingdom where she lives.

name: Rocket Delivery: Space Wok
summary: A backpack building run-and-gun game! Fill your backpack with guns, blast away space bugs, and deliver noodles to hungry customers!

name: Roomballs
summary: Soccer meets air hockey with an incredible twist: fast-paced, zany robots inspired by your favorite pop culture icons. This isn’t just about speed and strength; strategy, quick moves, and clever plays are the keys to victory. This game guarantees endless fun and high-octane action.

name: Roodies Factory
summary: Imagine being the owner of a factory and going back years later it was abandoned because your brother has recently gone missing? This is a game you wouldn't want to miss...

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake: Scenario "Tiger and Wolf Unleashed"
summary: A hypothetical scenario featuring alternate paths taken by Sun Jian and Lu Bu.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake: Scenario "Tiger Generals of the Three Kingdoms, Locked in Battle!"
summary: A scenario where Wei, Wu, & Shu are further split, returning the land to chaos.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake: Scenario "Valor Triumphs"
summary: A struggle between valiant warriors in Zhongyuan. A bonus scenario for "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS 8 REMAKE." Accessible via New Game, Scenarios, and then "Valor Triumphs."

name: Roads of the Middle Ages: Collector's Edition
Rollover
summary: Rollover is a brutally punishing climbing game where every roll could be your last. With unpredictable, difficult physics and a movement system designed to test your limits.

name: Rolling Toss
summary: It's a run puzzle game where you have to make the blocks roll and reach the goal. Various gimmicks will appear on each stage! Not only aim for the goal by using the jump when the blocks split, but also aim to clear the stage by making full use of the various gimmicks that appear on the stage!

name: Rollercoaster Creator
summary: Use your mouse to draw a path that collects the required coins and reaches the exit.

name: Row Divers
summary: Row Divers is a short, experimental incremental game about diving into dungeons in the form of rows, shooting enemies, collecting resources, and upgrading your bow to conquer the depths!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Steampunk Stories
summary: This DLC includes two steampunk themed tables: "Silent Streets", "Steampunk City" and some accessories.

name: Royal Defense: Ancient Menace
summary: The dwarven kingdom struggles against the Ancient Menace, who only wants to crush the dwarves and claim their territory. To defeat the monstrous hordes, you must construct defensive towers and units and learn to wield powerful spells.

name: Road Motel Simulator
summary: Road Motel Simulator is a co-op management game for up to 4 players, where you run your very own roadside motel. Host guests, renovate and expand your property, and hire staff to help deliver the best experience possible. Build, manage, and grow your business in a detailed, realistic environment.

name: Rogue Drone Hunter
summary: Hunt down rogue AI machines in this action roguelike with card-based deckbuilding. Battle in real-time, but pause to unleash powerful card combos from your deck. Explore ancient futuristic ruins, gather powerful upgrades, and fight to defend humanity from a mysterious mechanical threat.

name: Rooftop
summary: Get away! Muscular zombies are too powerful! [Rooftop] is a third-person action game with horror feel in where you escape from an abandoned building to the rooftop.

name: Rocketpult Mini
summary: Launch rockets from catapults on Playdate!

name: Room Football: Wetlands
summary: Puzzle, artillery, casual puzzle video game with realistic physics.

name: Rollick N' Roll
summary: Marvelous marble runs, with a modern twist. Rollick N' Roll combines fun physics with intuitive controls to deliver a joyful puzzle experience for all ages. Expand your collection by unlocking fun vehicles and playsets, but be prepared for things to get a bit chaotic.

name: Royal Romances: Fortunes and Foes - Collector's Edition
summary: Love has conquered evil: the reign of King Illeon is over, yet danger lurks in the shadows. Will you shape the destiny of the kingdom, or let chaos reign?

name: Routine Soul
summary: An RPG adventure game with Souls-like style. It features free exploration in a vast world, turn-based battles, collections of various equipment and skills, multiple endings and playthroughs. Under its magnificent and fantastical plot, there are countless Easter eggs and surprises hidden.

name: Rotate or Die
summary: Rotate or Die throws you into a heart-pounding, high-speed adventure, where danger lurks around every corner.

name: Rogue Rubber
summary: The ultimate bath battle. Blast your way through 12 waves of enemy ducks to become the ultimate bath-time companion in this point and click shooter.

name: Rodent Mafia
summary: Takes place after the events of The Last Ramparts, you are a survivor from the last city trying to find a new place to live, problem is.... you have stumbled upon the rodents territory.

name: Rocket Hit
summary: Explore every star system, orbit numerous stars, maneuver to various planets, and survive asteroids the longest aboard countless miniaturized rockets in Rocket Hit.

name: RoboSoul
summary: The game features a dynamic left-and-right hand weapon system, allowing players to freely mix and match weapons for maximum carnage as they face relentless waves of enemies. With its retro pixel art style and intense action, ROBOSOUL delivers a nostalgic yet exhilarating arcade experience.

name: Roxy's Dream Mansion
summary:
Roxy wakes up at home but soon she realizes that this place is not her home.

Help her face her fears in this mystery and puzzle video game. Join Roxy on her adventure inside a mysterious mansion.

name: Roulette Hero
summary: Roulette Hero is a strategic roguelike deckbuilder where you assemble animal companions to defeat towering mechanical beasts. Line up the perfect squad on your roulette wheel, spin to activate your animals' abilities, trigger game-changing synergies, and turn the tide of battle!

name: Royal Randomizer
summary: This is a Randomizer mod for Persona 5 Royal. It randomizes the enemies in (almost) every encounter in the game with any enemy.

name: Robot Hospice
summary: "Robot Hospice" is a 2D pixel art adventure game where beloved robots spend their final days in a hospice. As a new staff member, you will gently yet painfully bid farewell to these cherished machines that once lived alongside humans.

name: Roadside Egg Stand
summary: Bring the residents of Reine the freshest, finest eggs! Raise cute chickens, collect their eggs, and sell them at roadside egg stands scattered throughout the village. Decorate your egg stand, collect your daily earnings, restock with fresh eggs, and read the heartfelt letters from the villagers.

name: Rocky the Brave Pup: Love, Friendship and a Midnight Mission
summary: Rocky, a brave little dog, embarks on a nighttime adventure to recover something very special. Along the way, he discovers that heroism comes in all sizes.

name: Rotate & Roll
summary: Rotate & Roll is a physics-based browser game. Across 40 levels, use the arrow keys to rotate the stage and cause the balls to collect coins and reach the end.

name: RogueJack21
summary: RogueJack21 is a Blackjack-inspired deckbuilder where you build and upgrade your deck to battle your opponents. Navigate through procedurally generated casinos and take revenge on The House, the ruthless mafia ruling Noir City that stole everything from you.

name: Rosaline
summary:
Step into the world of Rosaline, a kinetic visual novel series by EvoSky Entertainment!

Follow the journey of Rosaline, a strong-willed flower in life's dark garden, as she navigates through treacherous paths and unforgiving hardships. From her tragic childhood to becoming the world's most deadly assassin, Rosaline's story is one of resilience, mystery, and adventure.

name: Rock and Scroll
summary: In Rock and Scroll you follow Sisyphus who is now cursed to be the very boulder he pushed up the mountain, as he tries to outwit the gods one last time in this literal side scroller platform game.

name: Room Girl Paradise
summary: It is an erotic game in the form of sims, and the genre advocated by the production company is "3D life simulation porn game".

name: Robots and Murder
summary:
Human "Reese Urchin" wakes up in an unknown room, unable to contact his partner.

How did Reese get there?

What happened to his robot partner, iBeaux?

And will he seek a way out...?

name: Rod & Ripple
summary: A fun fishing game where you catch fish, sell them, meet the weekly quota, upgrade your equipment, and fill out the AquaDex! The further out you adventure, the stranger and more difficult fish you may encounter, but be wary of sharks at night and in deeper waters...

name: Room Service
summary: Jacob White, a young man in need, took a job at an old motel. It seemed easy: clean rooms, survive the nights. But he soon noticed increasingly unsettling things. Adding to his pain was the recent loss of his wife.

name: Rose Riddle: Fairy Tale Detective - Collector's Edition
summary:
Help Rose Riddle solve the mystery of her missing parents and uncover the secrets of her past during a wild and wonderful road trip through a fairy tale realm!

Each level is a race against time to collect and manage resources, complete quests and unlock the next level. Players who prefer a relaxed adventure will enjoy the option to remove the time limits, while veteran gamers can try their hand at a mode designed to challenge their skills.

Regardless of the mode chosen, the player will enjoy the same eye-popping visuals, catchy original music and laughter-filled story, and have the opportunity to earn special achievements and unlock a wealth of Collector's Edition bonus content.

This Collector's Edition includes the following extras
- Bonus levels
- Game Guide
- Music
- Heroes
- Wallpapers

name: Robot Rampage
summary:
Grab your robot and get smashing!

Rampage through cities as a giant robot! Stomp, burn and nuke your way through randomly generated city levels! Can the military defences of the humans stop you?
How far can YOU rampage?

name: Rogue Scum
summary: Sci-fi action-roguelike survivors bullet-hell with dialogs.

name: Roadkill
summary: You dodged death once — but it's not finished with you yet. Alone in an eerie town, you must search, hide, and survive while a relentless mechanical predator stalks the streets. Stay alert. Stay alive.

name: Rolling Thunder: Vietnam
summary: Rolling Thunder: Vietnam is an intense first-person shooter set during the Vietnam War. Engage in fierce combat on land, air, and sea with tanks, helicopters, boats, and jets. Master teamwork and communication to dominate chaotic battlefields, where every decision shapes the outcome.

name: Room Football: Sand Storm
summary: Puzzle, artillery, casual puzzle video game with realistic physics.

name: Rope Raider
summary: Climb Your way up with only one button, one grapple and one man. In this precision-based rope-swinging platformer

name: Robot Unlock
summary: Robot Unlock is an open-ended puzzle game with 75+ levels. Design your own solutions and optimize them for speed, instructions or space and compare with other players. Create your own levels, challenge other players and solve community made ones.

name: RollingBall
summary: This is a physical simulation rolling ball game. You will control the rolling ball to move to the destination across platforms.

name: Rogue Ninjas
summary: In Rogue Ninjas, survival demands cunning and precision. Manage a squad of elite ninjas through twisting dungeons, strengthen your inventory with rare enhancers, and battle ruthless bosses in this dice-driven roguelike adventure.

name: Rotten Sails
summary: Sail cursed waters to hunt valuable artifacts from cursed islands. Manage your ship, explore dangerous ruins, and deliver treasures to the Armada Guild before darkness claims you.

name: Road Riot Combat Racing
summary:
Road Riot is the global sensation that defined the Combat Racing genre!

This addictive, action-packed shooter will put your driving skills, reflexes, and concentration to the ultimate test! Dodge missiles, destroy enemy cars, and leave a trail of mass destruction as you race to the top of the worldwide rankings!

name: Robot Anomaly
summary: Your job is to inspect all produced robots. Investigate unauthorized hardware modifications and rogue behavior. And escape the building! You are the only human there, but you are not alone.

name: Rogue Snake
summary: Rogue Snake is the latest evolution of the classical snake game. We've added combat and roguelite mechanics - earn levels, upgrade your Mecha Snake and defeat bosses while dodging enemy attacks!

name: Rolly Rails
summary: Ride Fast, Build Big, and Race to Victory

name: Ronin's Way
summary: A brutal exploration and survival game for 1-4 players, set on an island archipelago inspired by far Eastern culture. Engage in epic katana duels, build and fortify your settlement, raise your army and forge your own masterless path.

name: RogueCraft
summary: Merge, build, and defend in this roguelike tower defense game! Face waves of enemies and epic bosses, evolve your towers, and unlock upgrades for endless replayability and tactical depth.

name: Road to Olympus
summary: You have no destination, only the path.

name: Rock Quest: A Rhythm Adventure
summary: Rock Quest: A Rhythm Adventure is a hybrid rhythm-action RPG where battles play out as high-stakes musical showdowns. Hit notes in time to attack, miss and take damage. Lead your rock band through a weird New Orleans teeming with danger and mystery.

name: Rogumon
summary: Battle, collect and upgrade dozens of Rogumon in this creature-collecting roguelite. Unique items, moves, and abilities ensure that no two attempts will be the same. Enter the fray alongside your team as you together seek to escape from the eternal prison of Torment.

name: Royal Odyssey
summary: Royal Odyssey is a fast-paced, top-down space shooter inspired by classic Shmups. Pilot Prince Zayven’s ship through a deadly asteroid field, upgrade your ship, and navigate the dangers of space to complete his heroic mission.

name: Robot Rhapsody
summary: A futurist fairytale exploring AI themes, technology, existentialism, and strange transformations in a suffering world. A retro-inspired JRPG presentation of a modernist, character-driven drama.

name: Roguecraft DX
summary: The modern Amiga hit, winner of the Retro World Award at the 2025 Debug Indie Game Awards, comes to Evercade in an all-new expanded, enhanced form!

name: Room 808
summary: Room 808 is a surreal horror game where you wander endless hotel halls in search of your room. Something feels off. Spot the anomalies, and try to get to your room before the hotel halls trap you forever.

name: Rolly
summary: Rolly: Is a 3D physics platformer, Balance the tiny ball and jump between platforms while having a little adventure.

name: Robug Rampage
summary: Robot Mashing Mayhem

name: Roadside Research
summary: Roadside Research is a 1 to 4 player co-op gas station simulator. Except you’re aliens. And undercover. Do very human things like restocking shelves while preparing for the invasion. Just don’t get caught.

name: Road Food Simulator
summary: Run a roadside Pizza restaurant with your friends. Play solo or in Co-op with other players. Make pizzas fast and fill orders. Keep your customers happy and get more orders. Improve your restaurant as your income increases.

name: Rosemary Village
summary:
Play as Ferdinand, a young adventurer in search of a new journey. In Rosemary Village, even the simplest adventure can put a lot at stake, and in it, Ferdinand's will and power will be his main weapons.

Turn-based combat, varied environments, optional activities and interesting characters are just a few examples of what you can expect from the game, as well as mechanics that will make you replay Rosemary Village over and over again...

name: Rogue Rollers
summary: A pinball roguelike where you battle through chaotic arenas and cursed dungeons, unlock powerful upgrades, and choose branching paths as you bounce, bash, and roll your way through an ever-changing world.

name: Romeo is a Dead Man
summary:
Latest ultra-violent sci-fi action title from Grasshopper Manufacture and Suda51.

Step into the blood-soaked boots of Romeo Stargazer, a man pulled back from the brink of death by a time paradox gone wrong. Now reborn as Agent Dead Man of the FBI Space-Time Division, and armed with the mysterious Dead Gear mask, Romeo must chase the universe’s most dangerous fugitives across alternate realities.

Blending high-octane gunplay, brutal sword combat, and over-the-top sci-fi insanity, Romeo Is a Dead Man is GhM’s bloodiest action game yet. Players can expect mind-bending twists, outrageous gimmicks, and a deeply cathartic combat system that turns enemies’ powers against them in universe-shattering battles.

As Romeo tears through the multiverse, he’s also on a desperate quest to find Juliet, his mysteriously vanished girlfriend. With a narrative that fuses love, loss, and metaphysical chaos, Romeo Is a Dead Man offers a stylish and unpredictable journey through the very fabric of time itself.

Can you survive the bleeding edge of space-time? Or will you become just another ghost in the paradox?

name: Robots and Planets
summary: It is time, the planets have been invaded and need saved from infinite destruction. The enemies must be stopped from causing any more chaos. Go through challenging space puzzles and seek to be the hero and save the planets within your solar system!

name: Rotten
summary: Rotten is the ULTIMATE 2D top-down horde survivor game! Fight massive hordes of bizarre enemies! Upgrade your equipment, create crazy combinations between all of the different weapons and modifiers and become an unstoppable force!

name: Rogue Shapes
summary: Rogue Shapes is a fast-paced roguelike bullet hell where you battle waves of deadly shapes, level up, and choose powerful upgrades. Complete challenges to unlock new playable shapes, each with unique weapons. How long can you survive the chaos?

name: Roach Post
summary: Roach Post is a roguelike puzzle game where you place polyomino stamps to teleport packages. Combine shapes, colors, and roach worker effects, build your deck, gather power — and make sure every delivery gets through!

name: Royal Vermin
summary: Climb, throw, and survive in this chaotic 2-4 player physics-based party game! As your preferred critter caught in a sudden flood, you must fight in a massive trash pile to claim your crown as the true "Royal Vermin."

name: Room Football: Shipyard
summary: Puzzle, artillery, casual puzzle video game with realistic physics.

name: Room Football: Dark Place
summary: Puzzle, artillery, casual puzzle video game with realistic physics.

name: Royal's Gambit
summary: Royal’s Gambit is a retro-style, turn-based card strategy game. Battle through 80+ stages of face card patterns by playing cards equal to their health, build your deck, boost your score with smart plays, and survive multiple modes—or start over from the beginning.

name: Roomgaze
summary: ROOMGAZE is a meditative room decorator game that allows you to become a real designer. Help to create a room of dreams for your customers from the meta-universe, but don't forget about yourself!

name: Roam0120
summary: A point and click horror game linked to Feldup's AT Connect ARG

name: Robo Sham Boro
summary: Yo! Rock paper scissors, rock paper scissors, rock paper scissors! It's an RPG about rock paper scissors! Go on a wacky adventure full of personal growth and rock and paper and also scissors to figure the dark secrets behind a Christmas murder, smart guy.

name: Roulette Pro Simulator
summary: Roulette Pro Simulator drops you into the thrill of the spin—heart racing, palms sweating, and pure excitement as the ball bounces toward your fate. Will luck be on your side, or will you be shaking your fist at the wheel? There's only one way to find out!

name: Rollo Pollo
summary: The evil robots want to eat all the baby chickens! Plan your strategy by placing the arrows and blocks on the correct tiles and solve the puzzles. Move your chicken around the map and save all the chicks in each of the 100 levels.

name: Rouletum
summary: Roulette-based rogue-like with a bit of supernatural. Place your bets, use under-the-table chips and mystical sigils to claim your prize. Using your wits, a TON of luck and some help from strange places you can rise to the top of the Rouletum Casino!

name: Rocket League: Back to the Future Car Pack
summary: Celebrate one of the most anticipated days of the last 30 years in Rocket League with the official Back to the Future DeLorean Time Machine!

name: Rocket League: Fast & Furious DLC Bundle
summary: Drive Dom Toretto's Dodge Ice Charger from The Fate of the Furious, his iconic 1970 Dodge Charger R/T from the film that launched the epic Fast & Furious saga, and Brian O'Conner's 1999 Nissan Skyline GT-R R34 from 2 Fast 2 Furious. Each car comes with Wheels and six unique Decals.

name: Rocket League: McLaren 570S Car Pack
summary: Compete with the ultimate, modern sports car in Rocket League! The McLaren 570S Car Pack is designed to thrill with a fusion of high-class design and luxury.

name: RoboSoul: Chariot
summary: 《RoboSoul: Chariot》 Retro pixel co-op adventure! Control Blue & Red piloting a transforming chariot (driver + 4 gunner seats) with slick morphing animations. Battle the Resistron Army - just don't fling your teammate off!

name: Rocket League: MLB Fan Pack
summary: Customize your Battle-Car with baseball cap Toppers, Flags, and Player Banners for all 30 MLB teams. Plus, the DLC comes with a Baseball Rocket Boost, and an MLB-branded Flag and Player Banner for game time.

name: Rocket League: Knight Rider Car Pack
summary: A shadowy flight into Rocket League! Knight Industries has crafted its own K.I.T.T. 2000 to champion the cause of aerial goals and epic saves. Self-driving capabilities not included! I’m sorry Michael.

name: Roofgrown Life
summary: Roofgrown Life is a cozy idle farming game. You can collect fruits in various regions, plant and harvest them, complete customer orders, upgrade your vehicles and house, and explore to unlock new points of interest on the map.

name: Road to Wealth
summary: Embark on a text-based RPG in a brutal fantasy world. Make choices, manage gear, and battle enemies through a non-linear story. Explore diverse landscapes with immersive art and sounds. Enjoy mini-games like dice and lockpicking. Survive or save often in this challenging game.

name: Rotorsim: Helicopter Simulator
summary: Retro-style helicopter simulation built with love and focused on easy to pick up mechanics. Fly around and test your skills with 3 different aircraft in a dynamic, mission-filled world.

name: Rob Your Friends or Die
summary: Rob your friends or die is a 4-player co-op game. Force your friends to take the "cursed" scroll, avoid the evil spirit and be the last one standing to win.

name: Rotata
summary: Rotate your way to victory!

name: Roller Loop
summary: Roller Loop lets you experience high-speed rollerblading like never before. With fast-paced gameplay and the unique ability to rollback, it’s up to you to push the limits of each level and forge your own path. Race at over 200 km/h through various tracks to reach the heart of the system as quickly as possible!

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV: Wall of Fire
RoundUrbs
summary: RoundUrbs is a tiny relaxing city builder game where you place different commercial, residential, house, nature, industrial etc. circular tiles connected to each other to create unique and beautiful city.

name: Rocket League: Season 19
summary: Celebrate 10 Years of Aerials and Epic Saves in Rocket League Season 19!

name: Road Trip to the End of the World
summary: Road Trip to the End of the World is a visual novel about the death of a friendship. When Andy and her imaginary friend Fishy set off on a road trip to crash their ex-best friend’s wedding, will they know when to hit the brakes?

name: Roguebots Arena
summary: A pvp arena shooter featuring roguelike progressions within a match! Pick a class and jump into a chaotic fight! Combine skills and abilities for (stonk) synergies Combo, snipe, assassinate, troll, throw people off a cliff, give handicap, do whatever you want to have fun!

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV: Wall of Fire
summary: Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV Wall of Fire is a gripping strategy simulation set in ancient China. Devise strategies against foreign rulers and take control of their cities to grow your own empire.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms II
Romance of the Three Kingdoms VII: Power Up Kit
Romance of the Three Kingdoms VI: Power Up Kit
Romance of the Three Kingdoms X: Power Up Kit
Romance of the Three Kingdoms IX: Power Up Kit
Romance of the Three Kingdoms XII: Power Up Kit
Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack
Robbing Time
summary: An online co-op horror heist game for up to 5 players. Play as Robbers, sneak around evading Superheroes and pull off the ultimate heist! Use the loot to buy gadgets and face even stronger enemies!

name: Road Cafe Simulator
summary:
Help tired travelers and create for them the most cozy tourist restaurant. Let every stop at your establishment become a real feast!

In Road Cafe Simulator puts you right in the middle of the action in the role of a roadside cafe owner. Start your own road cafe, serve appetizing dishes and turn your humble stall into the hottest hotspot in town. It's all about great food, satisfied customers and growing your business.

name: Rollbot
summary: RollBot is a parkour and time-attack shooter. Play as an ultra-fast third-person combat robot. Complete over 30 levels across three campaigns, and explore an endless stream of community-made creations using the level editor.

name: Road to Empress
summary: Step into the shoes of China's most legendary empress and experience her extraordinary life in this high-risk, full-motion video journey. Navigate desire, darkness, schemes, betrayal, and redemption with wisdom and courage. Seek rebirth and revenge, but face tough moral choices. How far will you go?

name: Roller Heist
summary: Roller Heist is a stylish action game where you glide through museums around the world recovering looted pieces. Armed with a paintball gun, skate and splat your way past security guards and repair history.

name: Row Hard
summary: Paddles, splashing of water and hard racing. Build your team, coach, mentor and lead them through tough choices to Olympic gold. Learn the price of victory! Deep story with resource management and rhythm sports races. What are you willing to sacrifice to win?

name: Rockoon
summary: Rockoon is a game that combines a linear narrative with dark humor and third-person shooter elements, offering the player an unconventional experience while reflecting a unique comic inspired style. Be a master of the sword and save the troubled.

name: Room 502
summary: A cynical high schooler, Hae-eun's mundane life takes a colorful turn as she and her dorm roommates in Room 502 unravel mysterious incidents on campus. This game blends academy life, mystery, and youth in a captivating detective adventure.

name: Robo Oh vs. Uchu Mega Fight
summary: With simple 2-button controls,anyone can jump in and enjoy the thrills of tag-team fighting action. This game is developed using the 8-bit fantasy console PICO-8.Experience the dynamic animations that push the limits of this tiny engine!

name: Robots With Guns
summary: Robots with Guns is a PvP rouge-lite shooter where you have to outplay your opponents with fast-paced shooting, dashing and gathering items! Each time you win, your opponent gets stronger. Overcome this imbalance to claim ultimate victory!

name: Rogueball Recess
summary: Today you are the captain! Draft your winning team from a lively cast of jocks and geeks in this Roguelike team builder, set in an early 90s schoolyard. Combine cliques’ unique abilities to build powerful synergies, and dominate the other teams in Rogueball Recess.

name: Rockman EXE 6: Dennoujuu Glaga
summary: The original version of Mega Man Battle Network 6: Cybeast Gregar. It has Completing requests will increase your rank up to Master. It has some of its content (namely the jobs from the Request BBS) locked behind Modification Cards (later known as Patch Cards), whereas the international version, for the lack of the e-Reader feature, have these features unlocked by default. It was also compatible with Rockman EXE Battle Chip Stadium and the Beast Link Gate, unlike the later releases.

name: Rockman EXE 6: Dennoujuu Falzer
summary: The original version of Mega Man Battle Network 6: Cybeast Falzar. It has Completing requests will increase your rank up to Master. It has some of its content (namely the jobs from the Request BBS) locked behind Modification Cards (later known as Patch Cards), whereas the international version, for the lack of the e-Reader feature, have these features unlocked by default. It was also compatible with Rockman EXE Battle Chip Stadium and the Beast Link Gate, unlike the later releases.

name: Rockman EXE 6: Dennoujuu Falzer - Beast Link Gate DX Edition
Rockman EXE 6: Dennoujuu Glaga - Beast Link Gate DX Edition
Rockman EXE 4.5: Real Operation
summary: In the Virtual Console version, the 8 Battle Chip Gate exclusive Navis (StarMan, NapalmMan, IceMan, ElecMan, PlantMan, KnightMan, ShadowMan, and Bass) can be unlocked by pressing L and R in the Navi Select menu.

name: Rocket Wrestling Entertainment
summary: Throw it down in the newest sport league of 2073: Rocket Wrestling Entertainment. Pelt your foes with a barrage of rockets and powerful takedowns to stand on top!

name: Rogue Words
summary: Rogue Words takes the familiar word-building mechanics of Scrabble and infuses it with a tactical, endlessly replayable “roguelike” loop. Players craft words to advance through progressively challenging levels, earning coins based on their efficiency and skill. These coins become currency for upgrades, allowing you to enhance or swap letter tiles or purchase powerful boon – special items and potions that significantly alter the scoring rules. (Tom Rolfe, TapSmart)

name: Royal Jest
summary: A story-driven theatrical experience about family, world-domination, and capitalism.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Makin' Music
summary: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Recording Studio themed tables packed with groovin' beats!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Roman Renaissance
summary: Roman Empire themed tables with multiple playfields and controllable ball gates.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Viking Ventures
summary: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Viking themed tables filled with

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Great Gangs
summary: 3 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Gang Warfare themed tables with mischievous misadventure!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic - Movie Magic
summary: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Movie Studio themed tables with an emphasis on rollovers and ball gates!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Candycopia
summary: Candy themed tables with activate-able ball gates.

name: Royal Detective: Incident at Ashford
summary: Take action against a seemingly unstoppable foe! Gigantic stone knights are laying waste to the kingdom of Ashford, and it’s up to you to protect the helpless and frightened people before it’s too late.

name: Rogue Drifter
summary: Drift or Die in this rogue-lite car combat game where you build your dream battle rig, mow down mutant hordes, and master stylish drifting to survive the apocalypse.

name: Rosie's Reality
summary: This game is set in the year 2048, where the player controls a rescue robot named Rosie to help restore malfunctioning robots that have been hacked.

name: Royal Envoy: Campaign for the Crown - Collector's Edition
summary: Someone wearing a black cloak broke into the royal palace. The stranger was fearful and grim, and challenged the King's right to the throne. He accused the King of being unable to manage the kingdom, and demanded to be elected King himself! Help the King win the elections in this time management game.

name: Robot Beekeeper
summary: A sci-fi game where you help restore collapsed ecosystems on an alien planet. Raise and breed bees, grow native plants from bee produce and automate production as you stabilise the planet's ecosystems.

name: Rookie Basketball Shoots
summary: Step Up. Lock In. Shoot to Win.

name: Royal Envoy Super Pack
summary: Help Cedric defend and save his kingdom over the course of these time management games available in one download for the first time. This super pack contains the entire Royal Envoy series.

name: Road Truckers: New Beginning
summary:
Live a trucker’s life in the first trucking sim RPG. Explore villages, cities and wilderness in a fully customizable truck. Get on-foot to eat, sleep, and help people along the way. Your goal: to bring back prosperity in your region. Drive, grow, and inspire!

Experience trucking on a new level: by driving and interacting with the world around you. Make your truck unique by customizing it mechanically and visually, inside and outside. Meet people and decide how to approach them. Enjoy the beautiful scenery in different weather conditions. But most of all, see the change you’re making by supporting the economy.

name: Rotten Heart of Yours
summary: What kind of cruel world forces a woman to contemplate which of two indescribable horrors would be more ideal? Mallory comes home to find her friend. A short linear visual novel, to play in 5-10 minutes.

name: Robo Rhythm
summary: Slash to the beat in this stylish pixel rhythm game! Battle unique bots across 6 different songs! Climb the corrupt megacorp’s tower and reclaim your stolen volcano! Find out who you're unhinged nemesis is and bring justice.

name: Ronald Rump: Fake Assassin Simulator: Save America Again
summary: It's early July, and you're a crook named Thommatt One Mangi. You've been employed by an anonymous contractor to go to President Rump's rally, and fake an assassination. You're promised a lifetime amount of eggs!

name: Robot with a Ram Cannon
summary: Command a robot armed with a physics-based rammer weapon. Slam enemies into walls and hazards, ram hazards into enemies, and use obstacles as weapons!

name: Rogue Paper Scissors
summary: What if Rock-Paper-Scissors became a roguelite extraction deckbuilder? You'll build a deck of deadly choices, master bizarre traits, and craft powerful hybrid cards. Extract your loot, or risk everything for the next floor. Sometimes, the best strategy is knowing when to run.

name: Rotten Crop
summary: Rotten Crop is an atmospheric horror game based on the lost game "That Evil Farming Game". Can you hide what you've done from your neighbors and the police? More importantly... can you live with it?

name: Roborobi
summary: Roborobi is a brutal 2D action platformer. Our little buddy Roborobi just can’t stop moving. Master a variety of moves to take control, and clear every stage to achieve victory.

name: Rogue Raccoon
