summary: Play as a fast and cheeky raccoon on a clear mission: clean out the food court, one hidden snack at a time. Jump, wall-jump, dash in eight directions, and use your trusty boomerang to defeat enemies, trigger secret mechanisms, and make your way through wild traps and dangerous exhibits.

name: Rogolf
summary:
ROGOLF is a minigolf roguelite, where each level has its own rules and each run is different.
Play mini-golf, buy equipment and score enough points to reach the top!

name: Rollover Alien
summary: "Tumbling Alien" is a casual puzzle game, this game uses a classic pixel style, the picture is simple but full of challenge. Players need to control an alien to shuttle through the blue laser gap, by tapping the screen to adjust the height of the alien roll, avoid collision with the laser.

name: Roadside In Hell
summary:
Rogue-like RPG in which you rip off the bodies of your enemies and attach them to your own.

A game in which the protagonist is cast into hell and aims for heaven by force.

You can customize your own body by "dismembering" enemies you meet along the way and attaching their body parts to yours.

name: Rockin' Hell
summary: Rockin' Hell is a rhythmic metroidvania where you play as Victoria, a rock star who must fight her way through Hell using musical weapons. Time your attacks to the beat, explore infernal realms, defeat bosses, and earn a second chance at life.

name: Roads Yet Traveled
summary:
"Do you think you can change the world? No matter who you are, you can only do so much, you have so little time to make a difference."

Like so many times before you are off to your first day of class. It's not an easy thing, first day jitters, but you manage. This is your life now, a cycle of moving and new beginnings. Always in flux, nothing staying the same. And today is no different.

In a flash everything is gone. With no clear way home, how will you manage? Will your new companions be able to keep you safe? Or will it all be too much?
Keep going though, you have nothing else to lose.

name: Ronnie Park
summary: Welcome to Ronnie Park! "Ronnie Park” is a game about exterminating ghosts and protecting the theme park in time. The ghosts do not like light, so shine a light on them to repel them. The extermination of ghosts must be done during the night. To do so, you need to work efficiently.

name: Rookie
summary: Rookie is a factory roguelite clicker game with a lot of upgrade possibilities. Produce the bad goods until the Police will come for a "visit".

name: Rook
summary: Cutesy arena chess game.

name: RovNav
summary: Program rovers with a visual Node Graph system to Navigate Complex Grids. Connect Movement, Sensor, and State Nodes to build custom logic. Use dropdowns to configure actions and wires to define flow.

name: Roguelike Journey to the West: 100 Ways to Slay Erlang Shen
summary: "Roguelike Journey to the West: 100 Ways to Slay Erlang Shen" is a 3D light-strategy roguelike that blends shooting, action, and tower defense into fast-paced gameplay. Gameplay:Auto-attack while equipping any 6 weapons—survive 20 waves, defeat all final bosses to win!

name: Room Football: Abandoned Factory
summary: Puzzle, artillery, casual puzzle video game with realistic physics.

name: Rolling Hare
summary: Rolling Hare is a simple platformer game where you play as a Hare who likes to roll alot. You must collect all carrots in different worlds!

name: Rolling Hare 2
summary: The Rolling Hare is back! You must plow through different levels to collect all carrots!

name: Room XIII
summary:
ROOM XIII is a first-person psychological horror game focused on atmosphere, exploration, and symbolic narrative.

You play as Father Joseph, an exorcist with a dark past — once known inside the Church for handling cases that were never meant to reach the public. Now, he lives in isolation, tending to a small, forgotten countryside church, trying to live a quiet life far from the shadows that haunt him.

Everything changes when he receives a call from an old friend: a newly acquired hotel, currently under renovation, has become the center of disturbing and unexplained events. Workers speak of voices, apparitions, and an overwhelming sense of dread.

As Joseph investigates, he begins a slow and unsettling descent into a place where reality blurs with hallucination, and every room may hold fragments of something far more personal — and sinister — than he expected.

ROOM XIII is a game about guilt, faith, and the things we bury deep inside. Get ready for symbolic puzzles, shifting environments, and fear that gets under your skin.

name: Rocket Strike: Deep Space
summary: Push your limits, dodge destruction.

name: Robina Hood's Monster Hunt
summary: Robina likes to say she robs from the rich and gives... But yet she never has any spare gold to share with ME! Though maybe I can at least persuade her to take a shot or two at Twilly... meh heh heh!

name: Rot Together
summary: A first-person co-op horror game for up to four players set in a medieval world. Explore a procedurally generated map and fight a mysterious cult. Brew potions, kill monsters, chat with your friends. Survival is not guaranteed!

name: Rogue Reigns
summary: Rogue Reigns is a dark fantasy rogue-like deck-builder that weaves together the haunting narrative depth and corrupted world-building of games like Elden Ring with the strategic card combat of Slay the Spire. Fight, discover, dies and repeat.

name: Robo Miner: Remastered
summary: Dig deep, collect ores, and upgrade your robot in this remastered classic mining adventure with improved graphics and smarter gameplay.

name: Robokill
summary: Journey to Mars orbital station Titan Prime, a desolate outpost infested with a hostile army of ultra-violent robots. Knock out motion-sensing gun turrets and blast your way through room after room of swarming droids to liberate Titan Prime. Destroy the enemy spawning hubs while avoiding deadly falls, electro-charged mines and traps. Gain experience, pick up abandoned weapons and shields, collect cash and hidden loot to *upgrade* your Mecha with a powerful suite of new armaments and defensive tools. But be warned, drop your guard for even an instant and the droids will swarm you. Keep moving!!

name: Rock Paper Scissors Action!
summary: You know the rules: Rock crushes Scissors. Paper wraps Rock. Scissors cut Paper. In Rock Paper Scissors Action, the classic game is taken to the next level — something only possible in the world of video games.

name: Road Kings
summary: Drive a 40-ton semi hauling cargo across the coastal plains of the American South, managing multiple jobs, trailers, and routes. Grow reputation from rookie to veteran owner-operator, dodging disasters and rivals to become the hero of the open road.

name: RogueViz Collection
summary: The discovery of non-Euclidean geometry has changed how we perceive the world... but geometry goes even more exotic than that! Games of various genres designed for Thurston and space-time geometries.

name: Robotics!
summary: Teach your robot to walk and become the best robot trainer in the world! Teach your robot to fight and battle against real players!

name: Root: The Marauder Expansion
summary:
The Marauder Expansion introduces two new factions to the Woodland: the Lord of the Hundreds and Keepers in Iron!

Two New Factions!
Lord of the Hundreds – Oppress the Woodland and burn it to the ground if need be. You suffer no dissent.
Keepers in Iron – Lead your exiled order of devout knights into battle to recover ancient relics. For glory!

New Tutorials!
Learn the ins-and-outs of our latest arrivals in new Faction Tutorials!

New Challenges!
Six new challenges with both Normal and Heroic modes test your strategic wiles!

New Achievements!
Eight new achievements push you to conquer the Woodland as never before!

name: Rock Paper Clash
summary: Rock Paper Clash is a multiplayer battle arena where your only weapons are the timeless trio: rock, paper, and scissors. Join friends and players from around the world in the ultimate game of chance and strategy across a variety of unique arenas.

name: Road Warrior
summary: Horizontal (left to right) shooter where you drive a car and shoot other cars and motorcycles on the road.

name: RoboDoc Jr.
summary: A fun space adventure game where kids become alien medics! Use cool futuristic tools to help friendly aliens across 12 exciting missions. Solve puzzles, fix alien tech, and save the day with steady hands and smart thinking!

name: Rocket Golf: Tap
summary: A physics-driven, side-scrolling golf adventure where timing, terrain, and wind challenge your every action. One ball, infinite shots.

name: Rotten Survivor
summary: Rotten Survivor is the ULTIMATE 2D top-down horde survivor game! Fight massive hordes of bizarre enemies! Upgrade your equipment, create crazy combinations between all of the different weapons and modifiers and become an unstoppable force!

name: Roguebound Pirates
summary: Roguebound Pirates is an adventure roguelike with deep ship customization. Plunder ships, search for lost treasures and create game-breaking builds to take your place as master of the seas.

name: Rose of Wind
summary: Revive a legendary tavern and restore its former glory! Cook delicious meals and craft alcoholic drinks, expand your inn, order supplies, and welcome guests. Create a cozy place where the paths of travelers and adventurers cross!

name: Rock Band 4: 6th Anniversary Free DLC Pack
summary: Add Rock Band 4 - 6th Anniversary Free DLC Pack to your Rock Band song library. Pack includes "Girl Scout Cookies" - Mom Jeans., "Like No Surprise" - Oldsoul, "The Title Track" - Origami Angel, "Cosmic Thrill Seeking Forever" - Prince Daddy & The Hyena.

name: Row Away
summary: Row your way through various river terrains, enjoy the journey through nature, and hopefully make it to the end of the river.

name: Roxanne The Forgotten Path
summary:
Roxanne: The Forgotten Path is a 2D metroidvania that combines exploration, deep narrative, and challenge.

Awaken as Max, a memoryless traveler trapped in a fragmented world. Face hostile creatures, solve ancient puzzles, and survive deadly traps as you recover fragments of your past. On Steam

Every death is a lesson, every victory brings you closer to the truth. Travel through vibrant environments, from deep jungles to forgotten caves and places where reality breaks down.

Will you dare to discover Roxanne's secrets and face what lies beyond the forgotten path?

name: Rogue Pong
summary: Just a simple brick-breaker game with some rogue-like elements and a bit of random stuff (totally unrelated to the plot)

name: Roads to the Red Night
summary:
“Roads to the Red Night” is the story of Beckett, a jazz singer and sex worker surviving in the North African fictional city of Khandra under European colonialism. Set in the 1950s, the novel is inspired by the writings of the beat generation, a group of mostly gay authors that revolutionized American literature back in the 50s and 60s, particularly the works of William S. Burroughs, who spent years of his life in Tangiers. Like him, Beckett is a junkie, hooked on a terrible drug called Moloch.

The mechanics are simple: the protagonist can use the drug for short term benefits in his rolls, but the long term consequences of its use can bring problems in the future. Beckett is a messed up anti-hero, but deep down he has a good heart, can you balance his addiction with his chances for redemption?

“Roads to the Red Night” is not a dating sim, but it does have some plot relevant NSFW scenes that are completely optional. The plot is driven by political intrigue and sci fi body horror influenced by the works of artists like David Cronenberg or Ken Russell.

name: Rock Band 4: 4th Anniversary Free DLC Pack
summary: Add 4th Anniversary Free DLC Pack to your Rock Band song library. Pack includes 'Two Shots' - Duck & Cover, 'Don't Let Her Go' - Newfane, 'Time For Crime' - ORION, 'Fall Apart' - Shocked Laura. Compatible with Rock Band 4 only.

name: Rock Band 4: 8th Anniversary Free DLC Pack
summary: Add Rock Band 4 - 8th Anniversary Free DLC Pack to your Rock Band song library. Pack includes "She's Got Sorcery" - I Fight Dragons, "Black Earth, WI" - Ratboys, "Pack of Smokes" - Blame It On Whitman. Compatible with Rock Band 4 only

name: Rock Band 4: 5th Anniversary Free DLC Pack
summary: Add Rock Band 4 - 5th Anniversary Free DLC Pack to your Rock Band song library. Pack includes "Some1Else" - Blame It On Whitman, "Run With You" - Radio Compass, "Masquerader" - Ravi Shavi, "Stevie Sees" - Toad and the Stooligans. Compatible with Rock Band 4 only

name: Rock Band 4: 7th Anniversary Free DLC Pack
summary: Add Rock Band 4 - 7th Anniversary Free DLC Pack to your Rock Band song library. Pack includes "Blood for the Blood God" - Ben Quad, "Where the Heart Is" - Sweet Pill, "End of the World" - Gulfer. Compatible with Rock Band 4 only

name: Roid Chimp
summary: A 2D platformer in the vein of Super Mario World, Megaman, and Sonic, play as Roid Chimp, a personification of our collective rage at a terrible system. Run, climb, and punch your way through a world to explore, filled with books that increase both regular stats and elemental upgrades.

name: Rogues of Titan
summary: Descend into the sprawling underworld of a moon ruled by a psychic order, whose sinister secrets have broken free. Play as both rogue enforcer, and exiled psychic as you fight, flee, navigate puzzles, and invoke transnatural powers in this otherworldly survival horror.

name: Rowen's Grand Adventure
summary: A classic Point and Click Adventure with a low-stakes plot, and filled to the brim with British humour.

name: Ronin Heart
summary: Ronin Heart is a pixel-art samurai fight inspired by samurai themed games. Take up your katana and challenge the five bosses.

name: Royal Hentai: Boobs & Pussies
summary: Royal Hentai is a puzzle game where the goal is to collect all the images of hot attractive girls by moving the puzzle pieces.

name: Rochinko
summary: Rochinko is a dark fantasy pachinko-roguelike where you launch arcane orbs into boards swarming with monsters and treasure, watching them ricochet through pegs in a cascade of destruction and gold. Upgrade your gear, master unique ball powers, and survive through 100 levels to save the Shadowlands.

name: Rocket League: Season 19 Elite Pack
summary: Unlock the Dominus car (Black), Dieci (Black) and Pyrrhos (Titanium White) Wheels, Distortion and Bubbly Decals, Ambustion (Titanium White) Boost, the Lightning (Black) Trail, and the Mic Drop (Titanium White) Goal Explosionin the Season 19 Elite Pack!

name: Rocket League: Season 19 Rookie Pack
summary: Unlock the Endo car (Forest Green), Twista: Infinite Wheels (Black), MG-88 Decal (Lime), Artesian Boost, and the Pigeon: Anodized Topper in the Season 19 Rookie Pack! Be sure to get this limited-time pack before it's gone!

name: Rocket League: Season 18 Veteran Pack
summary: Unlock the Masamune car (Purple), Satiness Decal (Orange), Chakram Wheels (Black), Xenosplash Boost (Pink), and the Surfboard Topper (Pink) in the Season 18 Veteran Pack! You'll also get 500 Credits! Be sure to get this limited-time pack before it's gone!

name: Rocket League: Season 18 Rocketeer Pack
summary:
Pack includes:
- Dominus (Titanium White)
- Fennec (Gold)
- Dueling Dragons: Yin & Yang Goal Explosion
- Krew Loyal Decal (Titanium White)
- FGSP (Black) Wheel
- Zomba (Titanium White) Wheel
- 1000x Credits
and more!

name: Rocket League: TriTrim Wheels
summary: Blade-sharp and effortlessly brilliant. Roll up to the Arena with the TriTrim Wheels that make a bold statement with every rotation. Grab them for free and get ready for a cutting-edge ride!

name: Rogue Skies
summary: Conquer the skies in this tactical roguelike deckbuilder! In Rogue Skies, you'll assemble your crew, load the cannons and defend your airship from raiding sky pirates as you blow them out of the sky!

name: Rolls and Girls
summary:
This is the puzzle with a several levels of difficulty and beautiful artbook. All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years of age.

In this game you will plunge into the memories of beautiful girls and see some moments of there life. Collect the puzzle and open their memories. Good luck!

name: Roles & Dice
summary: Roles & Dice is a dynamic online virtual tabletop RPG! Dive into worlds you create, assume roles, and strategize in turn-based battles. Real-time exploration and imaginative map creation await. Ideal for Game Masters and players seeking dynamic, interactive adventures!

name: Road to Fame
summary:
Road to Fame is a street racing game. It is set in "Old Steel City" where the mayor, unable to put an end to illegal street racing, decided to start entirely legal street races for professionals. The player is an amateur driver who is trying to earn his position in the racing world.

The game offers a training mode, where the player can choose any track and practice driving around it, and an arcade mode, which consists of a series of time trials (where the track must be completed within a limited time) and races against other players. Completing the races grants the player money, which can be used to purchase better cars. The game also contains a workshop where the player can repaint his car, or buy decorations.

There are 10 tracks to choose from and 27 cars, based on actual car brands but with false names; each car has slightly different capabilities.

name: Room For One!
summary: Race your friends to the last available hotel room in this online platforming racing game. Speed and skill are all you need to make sure you're the one coming out on top!

name: Road Trucker
summary: Get behind the wheel of your truck and go on a long journey along difficult forest roads.

name: Room Football: Apocalyptic Wasteland
summary: Puzzle, artillery, casual puzzle video game with realistic physics.

name: Room Football: Petrol Station
summary: Puzzle, artillery, casual puzzle video game with realistic physics.

name: Room Football: Cursed West
summary: Puzzle, artillery, casual puzzle video game with realistic physics.

name: Roulette Club
summary: Play against the devil and experience the thrilling roulette game. Accept the call from hell and challenge other online players in PVP betting points to become the undisputed winner in the club!

name: Room Football: Royale Lands
summary: Puzzle, artillery, casual puzzle video game with realistic physics.

name: Room Football: Junk Town
summary: Puzzle, artillery, casual puzzle video game with realistic physics.

name: Rock and Stone
summary: Rock and Stone is an idle background mining game where you play as a dwarf, mining rocks for valuable loot. You can sell your loot on the community market for profit or use it to get new gear and gold. Equip different gear—from common to legendary—to boost your stats and mine even more effectively.

name: Rocket Spin Orbit Glide
summary: Rocket Spin Orbit Glide is a fast-paced arcade game where you control a spinning rocket, thrust forward with precise timing, dodge deadly obstacles, and collect power boosts to soar through space. The farther you go, the higher your score!

name: Royal Sort
summary:
Welcome to Royal Sort, the game where sorting is fun! Drag and match three objects to build your own royal kingdom!

Your mission is simple: Find the perfect match of three and merge them to complete the level! Combine toys, teacups, crowns—anything in sight! They'll disappear, making room for more. But be careful! Mismatched items will get in the way and slow you down. Think fast, plan ahead, and use cool tricks to clear the board your own way.

name: Rocket!!
summary: You are Rocket, a Fox-Rabbit from out of this world! Strange monsters have begun to appear & are causing chaos wherever they go, it's up to Rocket to put a stop to that!

name: Rock Paper Scissors: The Final Match
summary: Rock Paper Scissors: The Final Match is a horror-themed twist on the classic game, where every win draws you deeper into the darkness. Climb the leaderboard and prove you're the ultimate survivor.

name: Rotten Woods
summary: Take on the role of a brave hunter and embark on a dangerous journey through an abandoned village where mysterious monsters are waiting at every turn.

name: Room Dot Exe
summary: Unleash your creativity with Room dot Exe! Design your dream room with endless furniture, colors, and accessories, playable on PC or phone!

name: Roley's Arcade Collection
summary: Get 10 arcade games in 1 with Roley’s Arcade Collection. A reimagining of classic arcade games with a fresh new look.

name: Royal Rampage
summary:
Royal Rampage is a real-time player-versus-player strategy game where players assemble teams of warriors and battle in fast-paced arena matches. The game takes place on a dynamic three-lane battlefield, where mana management and tactical deployment determine the outcome of each duel.

Players can collect and upgrade a roster of unique heroes, each with distinct abilities, and build customised decks to suit different strategies. Matches are designed to be short and competitive, with ranking systems and rewards for progression.

name: Rollo Boi
summary: Rollo Boi is a thrilling controller-based physics puzzle platformer where you take on the role of an adventurous rolling ball. Your mission? Collect coins, unlock powerful abilities, and conquer vibrant worlds filled with challenges!

name: Roulette Simulator 2026
summary: Dive into one of the most realistic roulette gambling simulations of all-time. Test your luck against the roulette wheel as you place your bets. Roulette Simulator 2026 has been remastered with a massive graphics overhaul and an all-new gaming interface.

name: Room Football: Ranch
summary: Puzzle, artillery, casual puzzle video game with realistic physics.

name: Rooftop Story
summary: An epidemic strikes, and the city enters a state of lockdown. As a community volunteer, you have to grow fruits and vegetables in the rooftop vegetable garden, pick wild vegetables in the public green space, and work together with the residents of the community to tide over the difficulties.

name: Rododendron
summary: tetris 3D

name: Robot Detective
summary: Investigate the grisly murder of Philip Cartel in this dazzling sci-fi post-apocalyptic visual novel. You play an android detective piecing together their past while meeting strange and exotic characters, traveling a brutal world and unraveling the many mysteries it holds.

name: Ronza
summary: Ronza is a tense survival game where you sit at a PC, uncover dark secrets, play games and listen for dangers creeping near. Strange characters stalk you, each with their own way to counter. Stay alert, react fast, and survive the night while the computer pulls you deeper.

name: Ropoko for Nintendo Switch
summary:
What made the MZ-700, which couldn't even display graphics, a national computer?
Only the MZ-700 knows the answer...

name: Rogue Bricks
summary: Classic brick breaker action evolved! Blast through bricks, grab epic loot, and level up your game. Customize your playstyle with mods and star shards. Build your perfect loadout and bounce beyond limits!

name: Robo Rampage
summary: You have travelled to Planet Junk to battle the fiercest robots in the solar system. Take charge of your heavily armed RoboMe in an epic battle between man and machine. Your mission is to turn the never-ending robot army back into a pile of junk. Pick up massive guns, upgrades and awards as you pile up defeated robots in your mission to build the tallest Kill Hill. Will you rise to the challenge?

name: Room Football: Hangar
summary: Puzzle, artillery, casual puzzle video game with realistic physics.

name: Romantic Young Man
summary: After much hardship, you finally become the noble young master of the Murong family. Beauties surround you, supreme martial arts are within your grasp, yet you are forced to plunge into a world of family vengeance and national hatred. As the saying goes, ‘Once in the jianghu, one cannot act by one’s own will.’ In the little time you have, how can you achieve both love and dominion?

name: Rot Forever
summary: Rot Forever is an FPS horror game set in a decaying megastructure.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms Hadou
summary: Romance of the Three Kingdoms Hadou is a strategy simulation game in which a cast of unique officers from the Romance of the Three Kingdoms fight against each other! Aim to unify China with the heroes of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms!

name: RockStars!
summary: "RockStars!" is a third-person action adventure game set in an alien planet with a 70's retro psychedelic style. When Aero's rocket minivan crash lands on a hostile alien planet, they must use the abilities of different instruments to find their band members and escape.

name: RoadCraft: Rebuild Expansion
summary: Explore two new maps, Contamination and Washout, in Rebuild Expansion for RoadCraft. Mitigate chemical disasters, navigate flooded swamps, and deploy six unique vehicles. Requires the base game RoadCraft to run.

name: Robo's Sandbox
summary: Robo's Sandbox by RoboArray lets you play as Carl in a dynamic, evolving world. Meet quirky characters like Bob, Jeff, and Carl’s Cat, explore new locations with each update, and interact with objects, tools, and a money system. Seasonal events and decorations keep the sandbox fresh and immersive.

name: Road Turbo
summary: In Road Turbo, the quiet suburban streets turn into your racetrack. You begin alone, a single runner facing a line of barrels, barricades, and enemies. With every step forward the pace quickens, and the challenge grows sharper. Collect boosts, find the right gates, and suddenly one becomes many. Your tiny crew doubles, triples, and surges down the road, transforming into a force powerful enough to crash through whatever stands in the way.

name: Rohan II
summary: In a mythic world, players choose from multiple races and classes, join guilds, battle in large-scale PvP, claim territory through boss wars, and explore dungeons and fields. The game also features a unified account system and a free economy allowing open trades and market transactions.

name: RoundZ
summary: A round-based zombie shooter in VR and on PC. Battle zombies, upgrade weapons, face tough rounds and play with your friends. Join forces and immerse in the world of RoundZ to see if you can survive the apocalypse.

name: Robotic Space Zamboni
summary: You are the Robotic Space Zamboni. Clear the ice!

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake: Destiny and Strategy Expansion Pack
summary: A boundless Three Kingdoms experience. Enjoy the series' 40th anniversary with new elements, events, and Chinese voice options for the "Play as All Officers" feature of RTK 8 REMAKE, which allows you to play as any officer in the Three Kingdoms.

name: Rotem
summary: Rotem is a unique and challenging tile puzzle game featuring three distinct puzzle modes: Tile Rotator, Tile Swapper, and Rotem Puzzle. With 240 themed images, 20 ambient music tracks, and a variety of difficulty levels, test your logic and problem-solving skills.

name: RogueVirus
summary: Grid-based action roguelike where you face chaotic encounters against computer viruses. Build and upgrade your antivirus using a vast array of commands and add-ons in order to survive.

name: Rogue Pirates
summary: Rogue Pirates is a swashbuckling roguelike turn-based RPG about captaining your crew of pirates through hostile seas. Recruit daring pirates to join your crew and lead them into peril and plunder. Battle sea monsters, other pirates and civilization itself all for the quest of becoming a legend.

name: Rolling Core
summary: Rolling Core is a 2D platformer set inside a colossal, ancient factory coming back to life. Play as a small machine part breaking free, navigating shifting machinery, evading hostile robots, and unlocking new abilities to escape the factory’s ever-changing depths.

name: Rogue Runner
summary: Rogue Runner is a high-speed running, rogue-like, third-person shooter, action, and parkour game. You must run to break the cycle. As you run, you'll discover different possibilities. Run, Kill, Die, Try new skills, and Repeat to break the cycle!

name: Roulette Heist
summary: Step into the shadows of a luxurious nightclub casino, don your mask, and join 4 to 6 players in a deadly multiplayer game of wits and chance. Bullets are your only companions in this life-or-death showdown.

name: Rotten Life: Desert Prisoner
summary: "Rotten Life" is a dark medieval RPG where you play a desperate mercenary. Complete lethal contracts, explore cursed dungeons, and manipulate warring factions. In this brutal world, survival means getting your hands dirty. No heroes - just blood, gold, and hard choices.

name: RocketShip Go Up
summary: Navigate treacherous caverns in RocketShip Go Up, a physics-based 3D game. Master your thrusters to deliver packages, dodge beams, turrets, and falling debris—or speedrun for the fastest flight. Precision is your lifeline.

name: Robot Warfare War Game
summary:
Pilot upgrade and conquer in the ultimate sci fi mech warfare experience
Fight on Mars and the Moon.

name: Road Burners
summary: Road Burners is a 1999 motorcycle racing arcade game developed and released by Atari Games. It features a tilting motorcycle and the ability to be hooked to other like machines for up to 8 simultaneous players.

name: Robicon
summary: Robicon is a tactical tower defense game with roguelite elements. Place and merge your towers, experiment with different builds, and crush endless waves of robotic enemies. Adapt, upgrade, and survive.

name: Rogue Cell
summary: Rogue Cell is an arcade-styled game about absorbing cells, avoiding hazards, collecting DNA, and upgrading on a path to become the biggest and toughest microscopic organism in the primordial soup.

name: Rock Clicker
summary: Rock Clicker is a clicker game where you have to click on a rock to get minerals. Every so often, rocks or other minerals will fall into your inventory. You can exchange these for different items on our website to customize your profile and complete your collection.

name: Rogue AI: Idle Domination
summary: A Rogue A.I. simulator that sits at the bottom of your screen. Take over the world while taking care of other tasks!

name: Rocrasher
summary: PUSH and SMASH!!! Savor the ultimate thrill of crushing everything in your way! Crushing the little figures along the road will increase the boulder's size and weight, granting it greater acceleration and diving force!

name: Roar Rampage
summary: Roar Rampage is an action game where you become a furious dinosaur on a mission to destroy everything in sight! Smash buildings with powerful punches, block incoming bullets, and stay fierce even when helicopters attack from above. Wreak havoc, unleash your rage, and leave the city in ruins! Are you ready to roar and rampage?

name: Room 404
summary: Room 404 is a first-person Chinese horror game.Players must discern anomalies within an endlessly looping corridor, make decisions,and attempts to unravel the mysteries surrounding themselves and the four floors of the apartment.

name: Rogue Melee
summary: Rogue Melee is an action Roguelike where you fight your way through a randomly generated dungeon. As you descend deeper, every floor has a unique theme, cast of enemies, bosses and treasure to find. Additionally, you will also acquire stronger weapons and items that empower you on your journey.

name: Royal Lord
summary: In "Kingdom Monarch", you are a monarch and can build the kingdom of your dreams! You need to build city walls, assign jobs to villagers, recruit soldiers, repel hordes of monsters at night, and expand your village during the day.

name: Rondoku
summary: Fill elegant diagrams with the correct numbers using three simple rules. Rondoku invites you to think, take your time, and enjoy beautifully hand-crafted challenges.

name: Ropeat
summary: Ropeat is a fun top-down shooter in which 2-10 players use their robots’ repeat-mechanic to win: Each player gets copies that repeat exactly what they did a few seconds ago. Plan carefully ahead or just dive into the chaos and win against your friends!

name: Rolla
summary: Play as the monster from the movie series that never existed, ROLLA. ROLL. EAT. REPEAT. Fast paced arcade game with chunky old school 3d graphics: eat people, destroy whole cities and battle with cops, army and government agents! Uncover the secrets of what ROLLA is and where it is from.

name: Roguemon
summary:
Roguemon is a fan-made Pokemon game that turns Pokemon into a roguelike adventure! Capture a pokemon, train it up, and fight your way through Kanto's toughest trainers, tackling challenges along the way.

The goal is to win by locking every pokemon type and finishing a run without fainting. on your journey, you'll receive prizes to help you on your way. Curses will hinder your path.

name: RoadCraft: Aramatsu Bowhead 30T
summary: Get the Aramatsu Bowhead 30T, a powerful tracked heavy dump truck, with a 360-degree rotating base, equipped with a large dumpster and caterpillar tracks and capable of pouring up to 30 tons of sand and serving as a sand refiller for other trucks.

name: RoadCraft: Rebuild Edition
summary:
Get the Rebuild Edition of RoadCraft and receive the following content:
• The base game
• The Rebuild Expansion, which includes 2 maps filled with new contracts, activities, and utility vehicles
• The Invictus Type A, a powerful and unique scout vehicle, available at launch

RoadCraft – Rebuild Edition is a realistic construction and logistics simulation game where you manage a disaster recovery company tasked with rebuilding regions devastated by natural disasters. Players clear debris, repair infrastructure, and rebuild roads and bridges using over 40 vehicles, from bulldozers to cranes.

name: RoadCraft: Invictus Type A Scout
summary: The Invictus Type A Scout is a rugged search and rescue truck with a military-inspired design, a powerful engine, and a stable base. Built for rough terrain, it delivers reliability and control, making it ideal for overcoming extreme in-game challenges.

name: Rogue Inferno
summary: Rogue Inferno is a grid-based roguelike deckbuilder where every move counts. Choose your hero, build your deck, master tactical movement and powerful combos, and adapt your strategy to save your loyal dog!

name: Roman Rumble
summary: WRESTLING MEETS ANCIENT GLORY! Unleash chaos in the Roman Colosseum as the crowd roars with every WHAM and SLAM!

name: Rosie
summary: Rosie is a Choose Your Own Adventure Horror experience that takes place inside a series of pop up books.

name: Ronin Awakening
summary: Ronin Awakening promises players a visually stunning and emotionally charged experience, as they guide Takashi through a breathtaking world steeped in Japanese folklore, facing formidable enemies and forging alliances with divine entities in a quest for redemption and survival.

name: Robot-LE
summary: A point-and-click adventure game based on a story where humanity is about to die soon, because of the sun exploding and taking everything with it. Humanities attempt to save their species, working with the most talented scientists in the world to build a sophisticated AI robot to enter space, find habitual planets, and then return with data to prove the existence of another exoplanet. So, they come up with Robot-LE.

name: Road to Karatl
summary: On the road to the sacred shrine of Karatl, lost souls entrust you with their stories. In this contemplative Visual Novel, listen to their truths and perhaps, at the journey's end, you will discover your own.

name: Rookie Knight
summary: Rookie Knight is a fast-paced 2D action-platformer where you step into the boots of a young knight on his very first adventure. Run, jump, wall slide, and strike down enemies as you explore vibrant biomes filled with danger and discovery

name: Road Tripped Live
summary: A chaotic co-op road trip where you hit the road livestreaming to find the next breaking news. The crazier it gets, the more your stream blows up. How many viewers can you get while staying alive? Storms, UFOs, T-Rexes... You'll never guess what'll be next.

name: Roxy Raccoon 3: Troubles in Time
summary: Roxy Raccoon 3: Troubles In Time is 2.5D platformer for all ages and a throw back to collectathons of the past. Explore four uniquely themed worlds as you prevent the witches dastardly schemes, conquer endless minigames and save the future!

name: Rocket League: Season 20
summary: Head to the Boostfield Mall in Rocket League Season 20!

name: Rocket Rally
summary: Simple controls. Fast runs. Top-down 2D rally game. Race short courses, beat target times, and go for the gold!

name: RoboFarm
summary: Build, automate, and decorate your dream farm! Deploy robot workers, unlock powerful upgrades, and watch your crops thrive while you relax, raising profits to your satisfaction. Save and share your creations, tune in with the music, and experience the world of RoboFarm.

name: Rock Band 2 DX: Guitar Hero Live
Romancing Walker
summary: Romancing Walker (Original japanese title: With Walker) is a game made using RPG Maker 2000 created by FLARE and translated into English by rm2Kfanboy. The story is a combination of a traditional roleplaying game and a dating sim, and draws heavily on the harem genre.

name: Rootless
summary: Guide Trask, a young seedling born into a cave-dwelling family that fears the outside world. Uncover the secrets of a mysterious tree and fight to save everyone trapped in their isolated home. Explore strange environments, absorb animal traits, and overcome dangers in this adventure.

name: Romb
summary: Romb is a short psychological horror game set in a mysterious confined room. Follow the voice's instructions each day if you want to make it out alive; no matter how wrong it feels.

name: Romance is Dead
summary: A Grim Reaper's job is never done. So when your scythe suddenly breaks, you have to venture to the center of Limbo to forge a new one! Fortunately, you have the souls of some HOT GOTHS to accompany you. Solve puzzles, flirt with goth cuties, find lost treasures, and survive deadly hamster attacks!

name: RoboLeague
summary: A competitive 5v5 football game where skill, strategy, and teamwork decide every match. Plan precise plays, master unique abilities, and outsmart opponents in fast-paced, skill-driven matches.

name: Rotato
summary: Spin. Shoot. Survive.

name: Robot-Mail Rush
summary: Welcome to a world where even robots can care! You are an automated postman whose task is to deliver important letters to every corner of the city.

name: Rogue Descent
summary: A challenging Auto Battler, Roguelite, crawl through an ever changing pixel art dungeon. Plan your path. Make tough choices. Maybe even survive the descent...

name: Robot Recycler Ryn
summary: Build your own custom combat robots, piece by piece! Weld, saw, and shape metal to perfection. Lead your creations into battle as you follow Ryn in Story Mode, or craft freely in Construction Mode.

name: Rostov
summary: You've been kidnapped and need to escape a serial killer. In this first-person horror game, you're constantly being hunted and never know when he'll find you. Grab anything you find along the way and try to survive.

name: Roulette of the Void
summary: The demon from the void calls you to play. If you lose, he pulls the trigger! Complete the various mini-games that appear before you and use the points you earn to survive!

name: Royal Watch: The Throne's Duty
summary: A strategic game of royal observation and deduction.

name: Rollerball 464
summary: You are in control of cleaning bot Robo_1. Clear as many cobwebs as you can, as fast as you can!

name: Robot Space Frenzy
summary: All the robots on Space Station 451 have gone berserk! Only one human is left alive! Can she survive the onslaught and escape? Blast your way through homicidal robots in this groovy throwback retro FPS!

name: Rosaluna: Moonlit Vengeance
summary: Four years have passed since a perpetual winter shrouded this reimagined, mystical North Vietnam. As Rosie, experience a deeply personal journey of emotional escalation and high-stakes battles in this visceral blend of real-time action and turn-based strategy.

name: Root
summary: In the deepest part of the forest lives a large tree, whose shade is so dense that even the most powerful light cannot dispel it.

name: Rocket League: Season 21
summary: It’s a full-on French takeover in Rocket League Season 21 featuring the Parc de Paris Arena!

name: Roguie
summary: Fight your way through space and time — alone or with friends — in this fast-paced roguelike shooter.

name: Rogue's Odyssey
summary: Explore, Grind, Loot, Die—and repeat! Face hordes of monsters and challenging bosses in a 2.5D pixel roguelike RPG where you can mix and match skills across classes. Be a potion-brewing Warrior or a Firebolt-casting Cat, the choice is yours!

name: Roadside Store Simulator
summary: Roadside Store Simulator is a cozy and detailed simulation game where you build and run a roadside general store. Stock shelves, serve customers, hire workers, and grow your business over time while traffic and daily routines flow endlessly around your store.

name: Rogue Patterns
summary: Rogue Patterns is a brick breaker roguelike. Collect patterns with varied designs and effects that grow in power as you break bricks. Relics can be acquired to increase your power in unique ways.

name: Rogueblock
summary: Classic puzzle mechanics meet roguelite chaos. Stack blocks, draft powerful upgrades, and survive the ever-changing challenges in this adventure.

name: Roll or Die
summary: Roll or Die is a fast paced arcade survival game where players control a rolling boulder across collapsing platforms. Survive as long as possible while tiles fall away beneath you, pushing reaction speed and positioning to the limit. Compete for high scores, master precise movement, and see how long you can last before the world gives way.

name: Rogueknight
summary: Slice through endless waves of dungeon monsters, setting new high scores! Collect gold and XP while creating unique builds to become stronger and survive longer!

name: Rogue Cave
summary: Descend into a crystal filled cave in this roguelike rail shooter. Smash ammo gems to mine more ammo, destroy traps, gather EXP, and adapt your strategy with game changing perks, but run out of ammo, and it’s all over…

name: Room Rules
summary: Room Rules is an experimental simulator focused on the study of anomalous rooms. Follow the protocols, complete test sessions, and analyze the behavior of anomalous “Rooms.”

name: RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business - Prime Directives Pack
summary: The ''Prime Directives'' pack includes a frosted armour skin for RoboCop, an alternative police uniform for Murphy, and a scarlet version of the all-new OCP weapon: the Cryo Cannon.

name: RoboCop: Rogue City - Collection
summary:
The Rogue City Collection brings together RoboCop: Rogue City and RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business, with all the bonus content from both titles: Vanguard Pack and Alex Murphy Pack for the base game and Prime Directives Pack for the expansion.

The physical edition comes with updated discs that contain the add-ons and a metal case.

name: Roland Garros Paris 2005: Powered by Smash Court Tennis
summary:
By combining a Roland Garros license with their tried and tested tennis engine, Namco brings a third Smash Court Tennis title for the PlayStation 2. It was released exclusively in Europe, and was based on Smash Court Tennis Pro Tournament 2.

In gameplay, the game isn't much different from other tennis games in the market, but it differs from games such as Virtua Tennis by having some emphasis on stamina (some players get tired faster than others, and not only run slower but also lose power to return the ball on longer matches) and by forcing the player to hit the ball as well-timed as possible - a "nice" ball (with a yellow visual cue near the racquet) will be much harder to return, as it will bounce away faster from the player.

Featuring 15 real players from both ATP and WTA, the game features several game modes: Roland Garros allows the player to compete in the namesake, exhibition, and spectator, where the player can just sit back and see a game played by the computer, choosing one of the many cameras available, including the classic TV presentation or from the main stand.

The beefier mode is the ProTour, where the player creates and customizes his own player, from appearance to playing style, and start a career, taking part in tournaments and completing training sessions in order to improve the player, so he or she can break into the elite. Challenge mode includes the training session mini-games of ProTour, as well as Bomb Tennis, a special mode where the court is filled with bombs, and as a player wins points, the opponent's side is flooded with even more. The goal is to detonate the bombs by pushing them into the flames, and forcing the opponent to get caught in one explosion. Also included is a complete training mode, which explains in detail the differences between shots and allows newcomers to adapt themselves to the gameplay style of this title.

By completing certain goals, the player unlocks additional items, such as clothing, music tracks, trivia cards, player information and even secret players.

name: RogueDiceR
summary: RogueDiceR is a Roguelite Dice-builder. Buy randomly generated dice and modify their values. Attach stickers to grant special effects or strengthen your dice deck with powerful artifacts. Fight your way through randomly generated dungeons filled with monsters, events and bosses.

name: Robot Rampage
summary: *Robot Rampage* is a thrilling multiplayer robot shoot 'em up that immerses players in fast-paced, high-stakes combat. Set in a futuristic world where advanced robotic warriors clash in fierce battles.

name: Rogue Signal Protocol
summary:
Rogue Signal Protocol is a traditional turn-based coffee break stealth roguelike where you play as an escaped digital consciousness navigating hostile corporate networks. Quick 10-15 minute runs with permadeath - each death teaches lessons, each run reveals more truth.

Navigate procedurally-generated corporate networks using strategic stealth and cunning. Hide in blind spots to avoid detection, manage your heat levels to prevent overheating, and carefully choose when to use your limited exploits. Every move counts in this purely skill-based tactical challenge.

name: Roguelyte
summary: A fast 2D roguelite where you move, dodge, and auto-attack through endless waves, stacking upgrades and scary bosses!

name: Room 713
summary: You find yourself in the endless, looping corridors of a mysterious, liminal hotel. Spot anomalies to climb floors and reach your room... or be trapped forever.

name: Roof Leak Hero
summary: Keep things from flooding as long as possible and get the highest score! Throw your containers and make trick shots to land them directly where you need them to be. Dump excess water into the drain and advance to the next point level to get point multipliers and reach even crazier scores!

name: Rock Bottom
summary: Mine. Smelt. Upgrade. Repeat. An incremental mining game where every swing makes you stronger. Descend through 8 unique layers, unlock devastating abilities, and discover what lies at Rock Bottom

name: Robo Dolphin Escape
summary: Break out of a top-secret military operation! To enter the portal that leads to your escape, you must thwart an army of fish-like machines and collect their power-ups.

name: Rogue 21
summary: The House always wins... unless you rewrite the code. In this blackjack-based roguelike card game, you don't just play the hand you break the system. Stack illegal exploits, distort probability, and bankrupt the Gamble-State. Hit. Stand. Exploit. Survive.

name: Roommates, Romance, and Ringing Hearts
summary:
Roommates, Romance, and Ringing Hearts is a live action FMV romance simulation game where your choices shape a year of love and relationships with five unique heroines.

Experience cinematic storytelling, heartfelt moments, and branching outcomes as everyday roommate life turns into romance.

Produced by TV Asahi Japan and Aiming Inc..

name: Robber
summary: ROBBER is a top-down pixel art adventure game where your goal is to overcome each challenge. Run, dodge, collect souls, and face every obstacle!

name: RogueFlip
summary: RogueFlip is a perfect marriage of a logic puzzle with a roguelike deckbuilder! Deduce the right cards to flip to score points, dodging damaging bombs along the way, then power up your run with crazy run-bending trinkets and manipulate your cards with stickers and upgrades.

name: Rollimals
summary: Roll and bounce across whimsical environments and eat as much as you want to gain bonus points and rewards.

name: Roadside Reseal
summary: A roadside store where the night never feels safe. Flickering lights, endless aisles, whispers from the dark. Each task feels like research into fear—you restock, you lock, you fight to keep the seal closed.The silence breaks, the air is heavy, and every moment is research into survival.

name: RoadCraft: Timberworks Pack
summary:
Bring the power of logging to your worksites.

Expand your RoadCraft fleet with the Timberworks Pack, a collection of three specialized forestry vehicles built for cutting, transporting, and exploring deep woodland terrain. Each machine is crafted for tough off-road conditions and adds new possibilities for resource gathering and industrial missions.

name: Rogue Slots
summary: A deckbuilding roguelike, with a slot machine as your Dungeon Master. Spin to strike in a roguelike where every action comes from your custom slot machine. Load the reels with weapons, coins, and cursed relics, then let fate take the reel. Collect Knobs and trade them with your friends.

name: Rogue Bytes
summary: Rogue Bytes is an in-depth, incremental roguelite game about going rogue in the byte-verse! Defeat enemies, collect Bytes and other loot, research and unlock upgrades, level up your weapons, and become a byte legend!

name: Rodent Company
summary:
In this fast-paced action roguelike, play as the Rodent Company, a ragtag team of mice, rats, hamsters, guinea pigs, and others, trying to save their kind from going hungry in the coming winter. Competing factions like pirate roaches, raccoon gangs, heathen lizards, and others stand in your way. Defeat them, loot them, and search for abundant lands and treasures beyond!

In solo or co-op (up to 4 players), use powerful weapons and special, rodent-based, abilities to mow down deadly pest hordes, defeat epic bosses, and make your way to the bountiful lands beyond the borders of your lands.

Build Your Arsenal and Wipe Out Pests!
Wield randomly-generated weapons with different add-on modules like scopes, stocks, under-barrel attachments and magazines with MILLIONS of possible combinations. Find new weapons in chests, loot them from your enemies, or buy them from shops!

Play with friends!
Rodent Company is best experienced with friends! Featuring local co-op up to 4 players, arenas are designed for player counts individually so difficulty doesn't simply scale enemy health and damage - it adjusts battle size too!
